comments: Only given a 1 star so the devs hurry up and get the game working again or else it would be a 5 star. This is the best game on play store currently and square Enix have done a brilliant job. No complaints... No p2w... and the graphics if you set them to full are just phenomenal!!! Keep it up guys!! But fix the loading issue so we can get back to akademia!!

Great game so far. Not sure if there is a community forum or something somewhere which would be nice. I had a character on some other server and it seemed to be erased when the new server opened? Its fine though, previous character did not have too much progression. Music is not the greatest though, would be good if you could include more classic FF music in the game.   Dailys seem a bit overwhelming. There are so many quests to complete each day to get all the chests.   Other than that im quite enjoying it. If you can't load the game after update clear data and dl again

Support is incredibly slow, they will happily take your money and not let you have access to the items you payed for. Will update this review if they ever actually resolve my issue. It has been 5 days since I submitted a support issue with no useful responses made by them. Update: over 48 hours since last response still not any closer to having my issue resolved

I installed the game. I was enjoying it then suddenly it stoped working giving me an error message of "license stoped working". I uninstalled it and will try to install it. I hope this time it won't happen again.   What?? Still having the same error! Please do something about it, since the game is really nice.

I was hooked up playing this game as you can still get stronger without spending. Unfortunately looks like something broke during the update and was stucked in the FF splash screen. Hoping that the devs are on top of this and release an official announcement to players.

Characters repeat the same thing over and over and it gets really irritating. And now the game doesn't even start, i love the final fantasy franchise and you have a really great game, and i like that you have to interact with the game to stay alive and it's not just automatic bullcrap, please keep updating the game.
description: „ÄêGame Introduction„Äë:An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.„ÄêFeatures„Äë:-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0‚Äôs console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
descriptionHTML:
【Game Introduction】:

An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)

Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.

【Features】:

-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.

-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.

-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.

-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.

Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/
Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
recentChanges: The bugs on account connecting and switching are fixed.
summary: The Sole SQUARE ENIX Official Licensed "Final Fantasy" Action Game
title: Final Fantasy Awakening: SE Licensed

description: Can you build a tower of words without toppling over?Ascend to new heights as you add and connect thousands of words to form a rising skyscraper! But gravity is your enemy. Lean too far to one side, or risk placing a word that is too long without support, and your entire tower can collapse before your eyes!Expand your vocabulary by entering a world of words, towers, and magical wells!Catch words out of thin air in Mishmash mode and build your way up the word tower without collapsing! Or construct your own words in the epic challenge of Classic mode! Conquer magical wells in the sky, collect shamrock letters, get lucky with the keys to unlock treasure chests, collect runestones and accumulate wealth! Embark on the quest to unravel the mystery of the Book of Words!Features:- Real physics-based tower building- Two game modes, Mishmash for beginners, and the more challenging Classic- Endless tower building, construct the highest word tower ever- Includes word definitions- Numerous hints to keep you going- Videos of towers for viewing and sharing with friends- No annoying banner ads; Watch ads only by choice- Leaderboards for the highest towers and highest levels. Challenge your friends!Crossword players who enjoy how words connect will certainly like Mishmash, while Scrabble fans will have fun creating their own words in Classic mode! If you love addictive word games, anagrams, puzzles, brain games, spelling, strategy, or tower building using real physics, then look no further, WordCrafting: A Tower of Words is the game for you!Have fun!Visit us at www.happyskellies.com/wordcrafting to watch trailers and tutorials.Watch how others are building their towers at https://everyplay.com/wordcrafting/homeQuestions? Comments? Feel free to email us at support@happyskellies.comWordCrafting is free to download.
descriptionHTML:
Can you build a tower of words without toppling over?

Ascend to new heights as you add and connect thousands of words to form a rising skyscraper! But gravity is your enemy. Lean too far to one side, or risk placing a word that is too long without support, and your entire tower can collapse before your eyes!

Expand your vocabulary by entering a world of words, towers, and magical wells!

Catch words out of thin air in Mishmash mode and build your way up the word tower without collapsing! Or construct your own words in the epic challenge of Classic mode! Conquer magical wells in the sky, collect shamrock letters, get lucky with the keys to unlock treasure chests, collect runestones and accumulate wealth! Embark on the quest to unravel the mystery of the Book of Words!

Features:
- Real physics-based tower building
- Two game modes, Mishmash for beginners, and the more challenging Classic
- Endless tower building, construct the highest word tower ever
- Includes word definitions
- Numerous hints to keep you going
- Videos of towers for viewing and sharing with friends
- No annoying banner ads; Watch ads only by choice
- Leaderboards for the highest towers and highest levels. Challenge your friends!

Crossword players who enjoy how words connect will certainly like Mishmash, while Scrabble fans will have fun creating their own words in Classic mode! If you love addictive word games, anagrams, puzzles, brain games, spelling, strategy, or tower building using real physics, then look no further, WordCrafting: A Tower of Words is the game for you!

Have fun!

Visit us at www.happyskellies.com/wordcrafting to watch trailers and tutorials.

Watch how others are building their towers at https://everyplay.com/wordcrafting/home

Questions? Comments? Feel free to email us at support@happyskellies.com

WordCrafting is free to download.
recentChanges: - Build an endless word tower! Completing the Book of Words is just the beginning. Continue building your tower beyond the final page and go higher, without end!
- Leaderboards have been added! Take the challenge of building the highest tower!
- The screen now follows the device Auto-rotate setting.
summary: Connect thousands of words to form a rising skyscraper!
title: WordCrafting: A Tower of Words

comments: This game was practically stolen from Piano Tiles 2, even the sounds and they copied the design terribly. Sure, they bring new things that are different from Piano Tiles, but it's done terribly. The one thing I saw different was the bar at the bottom and getting the actual score, but after more playing, I realised that the bar was just there so they could sync up the music with when the blocks would come to the bar. They didn't even at least sync up the music to when you hit the black boxes, I experimented. All in all the game is terrible because of my own experiences and things they didn't do very correctly.

The frequency and duration of ads felt like the player is being mocked since the gameplay and UI are pretty poor to begin with. Between so many ads and an overall mediocre game, it's not worth the download.

descriptionHTML:
“Tây Du Phong Thần Ký là tựa game tiên hiệp nhập vai duy nhất lấy cảm hứng về chủ đề Tây Du Ký và Phong Thần Bảng ra mắt đầu 2018, hứa hẹn mang tới một làn gió mới lạ trong thị trường game online đã bão hòa kiếm hiệp, võ hiệp. Bằng những tính năng đặc sắc của MMORPG truyền thống và là game duy nhất trên game mobile hiện tại sở hữu như PK 24/7 ngay cả trong thành chính, đồ sát rớt đồ Hoàng Kim hay cho phép người chơi giao dịch trực tiếp với nhau không mất phí, đấu giá tự do toàn server… trò chơi này đã tạo được dấu ấn đặc biệt trong cộng đồng game thủ Việt Nam” – SendorGrimer – BTV Gamek.vn
SỰ KẾT HỢP HOÀN HẢO CỦA TÂY DU KÝ VÀ PHONG THẦN BẢNG – TỰA GAME TIÊN HIỆP KHỞI ĐẦU 2018
Tây Du Ký và Phong Thần Bảng là hai bộ tiên hiệp lớn nhất và quá đỗi quen thuộc với cộng đồng game thủ. Sự kết hợp “vô tiền khoán hậu” giữa hai chủ đề này trong Tây Du Phong Thần Ký sẽ đem lại những trải nghiệm cực kì bất ngờ cho người chơi để khám phá thế giới tiên hiệp huyền ảo và gần gũi như trong những bộ tiểu thuyết hay như những tác phẩm điện ảnh.
GAME DUY NHẤT CHO PHÉP NGƯỜI CHƠI GIAO DỊCH TRỰC TIẾP
Tây Du Phong Thần Ký mang tới game thủ hệ thống train quái ra item giá trị và cho phép người chơi thoải mái giao dịch trực tiếp với nhau, hoàn toàn miễn phí. Người chơi có thể cày đồ, săn boss mang bán hoặc đấu giá để đem lại lợi nhuận thông qua giá chênh lệch. Trở thành con buôn, chơi game không cần nạp thẻ chưa bao giờ đơn giản hơn thế.
THỎA SỨC PK 24/7 MỌI LÚC MỌI NƠI
Trong Tây Du Phong Thần Ký, không hề có chế độ hòa bình mà chỉ có PK mọi lúc mọi nơi. Ngay cả trong thành chính cũng không phải nơi an toàn cho bạn. Muốn sống sót trong trò chơi này, bạn phải trở nên mạnh mẽ hơn, bản lĩnh hơn và luôn chiến đấu bên cạnh động đội trong các hoạt động PvP ngàn người.
CÔNG THÀNH CHIẾN KHỐC LIỆT NGÀN NGƯỜI
Một trong những sự kiện lớn nhất trong Tây Du Phong Thần Ký chính là Công Thành Chiến không giới hạn người chơi cùng tham gia, tạo nên một trận chiến cực kì lớn và quy mô. Nơi thể hiện sức mạnh và đẳng cấp của từng bang hội, cũng như những cao thủ hàng đầu trong server.
CÁC TÍNH NĂNG HẤP DẪN KHÁC
Tiên Vực Chiến
Hỏa Diệm Sơn
Phong Thần Chiến
Boss Thế Giới
Hệ thống cánh đặc sắc cực ngầu
Tọa kỵ là thú cưỡi truyền thuyết
Đốt lửa trại

description: Unique duel fighting game in an age of myth and legend epic fight!The souls of the most powerful warriors & undefeated fighters are prepared to brutal battle. Slash villains and fights to restore peace in the kingdom rush towards prosperity. Many mortal champions are yours to train your blade & arms, get prepared to duel and Hack through enemies as the mighty Warrior inside the war as you enter an epic story full of arena battle royale, mystical prizes, PvP combat and mythical battles!Enjoy various fighting styles as taekwondo, thai boxing, chinese fighting from Ancient China, magic fantasy battle! Descend into the chaos of the three Kingdoms era and discover your destiny in an action-packed classic warfare adventure. Become the greatest fighting legend in the #1 championship, where explosive firearms and all kind of weapons are allowed, to summon epic battles!Dare entering the arena and challenge mythical creatures and dynasty heroes into a justice battle in the land of shadow fighters. As you slay more enemies, you climb the ladder towards harder immortal conquest fighters. You can use punching, kicking, catching, throwing, and dodge to defend yourself in the arena. You could also combine these fighting skills to Knock and kick with dazzling Kungfu combos. WARRIORS ARENA FEATURES:- Sword Attack, Fighting with Katana and Chinese longsword. - Sensitive and special 3D fighting control system - Unique lethal weapons for each ninja warrior.- Sophisticated 3D characters- 16 characters with Semi RPG features at your Command.Enjoy!
descriptionHTML:
Unique duel fighting game in an age of myth and legend epic fight!
The souls of the most powerful warriors & undefeated fighters are prepared to brutal battle. Slash villains and fights to restore peace in the kingdom rush towards prosperity. Many mortal champions are yours to train your blade & arms, get prepared to duel and Hack through enemies as the mighty Warrior inside the war as you enter an epic story full of arena battle royale, mystical prizes, PvP combat and mythical battles!

Enjoy various fighting styles as taekwondo, thai boxing, chinese fighting from Ancient China, magic fantasy battle! Descend into the chaos of the three Kingdoms era and discover your destiny in an action-packed classic warfare adventure. Become the greatest fighting legend in the #1 championship, where explosive firearms and all kind of weapons are allowed, to summon epic battles!

Dare entering the arena and challenge mythical creatures and dynasty heroes into a justice battle in the land of shadow fighters. As you slay more enemies, you climb the ladder towards harder immortal conquest fighters. You can use punching, kicking, catching, throwing, and dodge to defend yourself in the arena. You could also combine these fighting skills to Knock and kick with dazzling Kungfu combos.

WARRIORS ARENA FEATURES:
- Sword Attack, Fighting with Katana and Chinese longsword.
- Sensitive and special 3D fighting control system
- Unique lethal weapons for each ninja warrior.
- Sophisticated 3D characters
- 16 characters with Semi RPG features at your Command.

Enjoy!
summary: Mortal duel Sword fighting using the Blade of your best Medieval Warrior Hero
title: Warriors Arena: Dynasty of Glory

description: US Army strike with terrorist and professional war is need to obliterate them. Frontline Special Forces Army Strike Commando Attack Game is an action filled top shooting game of war hero and brave assassin against the enemy forces and terrorist warlord. US Army team with help of Special Forces and CIA agents have planned strikes against the ISIS terrorist to end the brutal crime of terrorist. You have to be an elite commando to attack death. Remember all rules of war so that you can get out of survival battleground if the need arises during the frontline world war battle. In this game you also use sniper as a sniper killer shoot and finish to win the war against. A call of sniper battlefield was a necessity of such times where the people are desperate of their miseries and willing for battle of freedom.Frontline Special Forces Army Strike Commando ops is to destroy the existence of the civilian killer from country, to wreck their weapons in secret basement storage, to help the civilians to escape the deadly prisoner till the last day battle. It‚Äôs such a big attack from the terrorist that multiple missions are being carried out at the same time, including the army rescue mission and special forces commando mission. Enjoy these army games for free.This is not the first war of terrorist on the Earth, so you are well aware of the actions required for the final battleground. You would have to do cover shoot for your companions, carry out commando strike during final battle.  IGI Commando Ops brings to you a saga of fps shooting games, free shooting games and modern warfare games. Leading various operation against terrorist, find ways to eliminate the terrorism, shooting and training, do gun strike, giving out strike force training and fighting behinds the enemy lines to destroy every thread of terrorism.With the joint collaboration of world war heroes, special forces team, special operation forces, you have to carry out army frontline mission as a counter terrorism attack. Brutal criminals are spreading deadly assault everywhere throughout your country, the peace of your country is in grave danger. US Army Frontline Special Forces Army Strike Commando Mission makes out a call of sniper battleground where there will be action and adventure to counter terrorists and killers.Game Features‚Ä¢	Realistic Battlefields‚Ä¢	3D Environments‚Ä¢	Variety of weapons‚Ä¢	Precise and smooth controls‚Ä¢	Dangerous Missions
descriptionHTML:
US Army strike with terrorist and professional war is need to obliterate them.


Frontline Special Forces Army Strike Commando Attack Game is an action filled top shooting game of war hero and brave assassin against the enemy forces and terrorist warlord. US Army team with help of Special Forces and CIA agents have planned strikes against the ISIS terrorist to end the brutal crime of terrorist. You have to be an elite commando to attack death. Remember all rules of war so that you can get out of survival battleground if the need arises during the frontline world war battle. In this game you also use sniper as a sniper killer shoot and finish to win the war against. A call of sniper battlefield was a necessity of such times where the people are desperate of their miseries and willing for battle of freedom.

Frontline Special Forces Army Strike Commando ops is to destroy the existence of the civilian killer from country, to wreck their weapons in secret basement storage, to help the civilians to escape the deadly prisoner till the last day battle. It’s such a big attack from the terrorist that multiple missions are being carried out at the same time, including the army rescue mission and special forces commando mission. Enjoy these army games for free.

This is not the first war of terrorist on the Earth, so you are well aware of the actions required for the final battleground. You would have to do cover shoot for your companions, carry out commando strike during final battle. IGI Commando Ops brings to you a saga of fps shooting games, free shooting games and modern warfare games. Leading various operation against terrorist, find ways to eliminate the terrorism, shooting and training, do gun strike, giving out strike force training and fighting behinds the enemy lines to destroy every thread of terrorism.

With the joint collaboration of world war heroes, special forces team, special operation forces, you have to carry out army frontline mission as a counter terrorism attack. Brutal criminals are spreading deadly assault everywhere throughout your country, the peace of your country is in grave danger. US Army Frontline Special Forces Army Strike Commando Mission makes out a call of sniper battleground where there will be action and adventure to counter terrorists and killers.

Game Features

• Realistic Battlefields
• 3D Environments
• Variety of weapons
• Precise and smooth controls
• Dangerous Missions

description: THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER DEATH RACE IS HERE‚Ä¢	Experience the thrill of racing and shooting in one game. ‚Ä¢	Engage in fast-paced car battles against players from all over the country.BATTLE IT OUT IN 3 DIFFERENT GAME MODES‚Ä¢	Deathmatch ‚Äì It‚Äôs all-out war against 5 other players. Expect full scale madness and mayhem.‚Ä¢	Team Deathmatch ‚Äì Work with your teammates to eliminate the other team in this 3v3 battle for supremacy. ‚Ä¢	Capture the Point ‚Äì Outwit the enemy team and control the arena. Only the strongest can survive. CHOOSE YOUR CAR FOR BATTLEChoose from 10 different cars ‚Äì from monster trucks with rapid-firing Gatling guns to hybrid motorcycles with deathrays. It‚Äôs your choice. How would you like to eliminate your enemies? CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR AND UPGRADE YOUR WEAPONSEnhance your car‚Äôs performance with Skill Points and Chips. But it‚Äôs not enough that you kill your enemies. You have to kill them with style. Choose from a wide variety of skins to match your killer persona. Kill them fast while looking good! THE STORYThe world is in chaos ‚Äì governments have fallen, cities lie in ruins, and the people struggle to survive. The World Organization of Assassins is leading the plunge into a new dark age, wreaking havoc wherever they go. Equipped with the best cars, outstanding racing skills, heavy firepower, and devil-may-care attitudes, they satisfy their lust for blood, money, and power through their favorite game: the death race. With the whole world as their battle arena, anyone caught in the crossfire dies. But the death race isn‚Äôt just for the assassins. Everyone can join and take home the bounty‚Ä¶ that is, if you can survive until the end. Do you have what it takes to beat the assassins at their own game? Load up your guns, rev up your engines, and get ready for a killer ride.For more info, please visit our website: http://playoverload.ioLike our Facebook page for more updates: https://www.facebook.com/OverloadGlobal/
descriptionHTML:
THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER DEATH RACE IS HERE

• Experience the thrill of racing and shooting in one game.
• Engage in fast-paced car battles against players from all over the country.

BATTLE IT OUT IN 3 DIFFERENT GAME MODES

• Deathmatch – It’s all-out war against 5 other players. Expect full scale madness and mayhem.
• Team Deathmatch – Work with your teammates to eliminate the other team in this 3v3 battle for supremacy.
• Capture the Point – Outwit the enemy team and control the arena. Only the strongest can survive.

CHOOSE YOUR CAR FOR BATTLE

Choose from 10 different cars – from monster trucks with rapid-firing Gatling guns to hybrid motorcycles with deathrays. It’s your choice. How would you like to eliminate your enemies?

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR AND UPGRADE YOUR WEAPONS

Enhance your car’s performance with Skill Points and Chips. But it’s not enough that you kill your enemies. You have to kill them with style. Choose from a wide variety of skins to match your killer persona. Kill them fast while looking good!

THE STORY

The world is in chaos – governments have fallen, cities lie in ruins, and the people struggle to survive. The World Organization of Assassins is leading the plunge into a new dark age, wreaking havoc wherever they go. Equipped with the best cars, outstanding racing skills, heavy firepower, and devil-may-care attitudes, they satisfy their lust for blood, money, and power through their favorite game: the death race.

With the whole world as their battle arena, anyone caught in the crossfire dies. But the death race isn’t just for the assassins. Everyone can join and take home the bounty… that is, if you can survive until the end.

Do you have what it takes to beat the assassins at their own game? Load up your guns, rev up your engines, and get ready for a killer ride.

For more info, please visit our website: http://playoverload.io
Like our Facebook page for more updates: https://www.facebook.com/OverloadGlobal/

descriptionHTML:
You might not be a tycoon in the real world but here - in the world of Seven Idle Dwarfs- Idle game, you can become one! Hard working dwarfs are mining day and night to help you accumulate wealth.
You don’t have to be present all the time, fairy godmothers and Snow White will supervise these little miners for you. Even if you’re offline, the money keeps flow into your pocket.
Explore new mine continents to boost your idle money. You’ll need to use different strategies to get money from different continents.
3 continents with 15 kind of minerals, 4 tiers of mining dwarfs, 3 tiers of dwarfs, you will be rich in no time!

FEATURE:
- Mining Dwarfs keeps working when you’re offline or in idle mode.
- Become a tycoon by getting money from idle mode.
- Fairy tale-like graphics
- 15 different minerals: coal, gold, ruby, emerald…
- 2400 levels of elevator and warehouse
- 800 mine shafts
- No need to connect to the internet - offline game
- Fun with friends

descriptionHTML:
[Introduction] 
War of Rings is a 3D MMORPG mobile game, in which players travel to the wondrous homelands of the elves, dwarfs, gnomes, orcs, cyclopses among others in order to collect 27 powerful rings and create a brand new world order! This game features many unique game modes and systems, such as the free equipment system, where equipment is obtainable only via killing monsters. The free trade system, in which players can freely trade items without price restrictions. A powerful and diverse social system, where guild members and friends fight alongside each other. And a balanced and exciting world boss system where bosses can be found across the world map and refresh all day round. 

[Game Features]
——New Era, offline auto-combat
Unique auto-combat system design that even offers offline auto-combat will help you to upgrade and kill bosses, creating a win-win situation for both work and play.
——Advancement, exclusive customization system
This game features a fully customization system, in which you can advance as you see fit, outside the constraints of a traditional class system. You can acquire your very own exclusive titles, spectacular skills and featured looks. 
——Cool mounts, customizable looks
Dozens of cool mounts including tyrannosaurus, skyfyre and griffins are at your service, customizable equipment and splendid wings will make you stand out of the ordinary. 
——Trade freely, buy or sell equipment
In the trade market of this game, you can freely sell any unused or extra equipment you obtained from killing bosses or completing quests. None of your resources or time shall be wasted. 
——Team PvE, fierce PvP
PvP is allowed on all maps. You can team up to take on high level players and if you are lucky enough to give the finishing blow, then the ultimate equipment is yours. Team up to tackle the World Bosses, high drop rate makes this game more thrilling and exciting.
——Contact Us
If you like our games, please follow our Facebook to get more information and events. Just feel free to give us your comments
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ujoyrings/
Official webside: http://www.ujoy.com/rings/

description: Do you love animal transport games? Are animal zoo games or animal rescue games are fun? If yes then it's time to drive  off road Safari Animal Transport Truck 2018 to rescue animals on hills and mountains. Your transporting cargo is wild animals including Elephants, Gorilla, Lion, Panther, Leopard, Crocodile, Rhinoceroses & Giraffe and they need to be transported from the city to the Zoo and from the farm to the Village. In this animal trucking job you need to load up the Wild animals and transport them carefully by driving heavy loader trailer truck on Safari jungle off road tracks. You need to transport all the zoo animals by saving wildlife animals. Don't scare the animals during safari jungle transport adventure and complete cargo truck transport missions by following basic off-road driving rules. You can also enjoy the real animals sounds while playing animal cargo truck simulator 2018 game.

description: Climb! A Mountain in Your Pocket, a challenging game about climbing a mountain with an easy to learn, hard to master control.One button to grab with the left hand, another for the right; swing, jump, use your momentum and grab the diverse rocks to help you ascend through the mountain. But be careful, a single mistake could mean a fall down to the base camp.Reach to the main bases before your run out of stamina, find the best paths to go up, and overcome the different obstacles you will find in each level of the mountain.foot by foot, improve your record and climb higher each time mastering jumps and grabs.Compare and share your records with the rest of the players.Fight for the best time finishing the climb, if you achieve to reach the summit.
descriptionHTML:
Climb! A Mountain in Your Pocket, a challenging game about climbing a mountain with an easy to learn, hard to master control.

One button to grab with the left hand, another for the right; swing, jump, use your momentum and grab the diverse rocks to help you ascend through the mountain. But be careful, a single mistake could mean a fall down to the base camp.

Reach to the main bases before your run out of stamina, find the best paths to go up, and overcome the different obstacles you will find in each level of the mountain.
foot by foot, improve your record and climb higher each time mastering jumps and grabs.

Compare and share your records with the rest of the players.
Fight for the best time finishing the climb, if you achieve to reach the summit.
summary: Climb using two buttons, improve your skill, and reach as high as you can.
title: Climb! A Mountain in Your Pocket - Free

descriptionHTML:
The wildly popular Toca Kitchen is back! With new guests to cook for, more tools to play with and new food combinations to test out, Toca Kitchen 2 invites all chefs to get messy and start playing!

GET CREATIVE
Who said dishes have to be pretty and tasty? In Toca Kitchen 2 you can cook however you want! Juice tomatoes, boil the salad or make a burger. Come up with your very own recipes and treat your guests to something special.

MAKE A MESS
With six different kitchen tools to choose from, you have the perfect setup for preparing fun foods! Load up with your favorite ingredients, add a squeeze of messiness and finish off with a pinch of weirdness. Time to let your guest have a bite! Was it a winner?

WATCH THEIR REACTIONS
Discover your guests’ preferences by watching their reactions. Oven-baked fish head with fried leftovers and lettuce juice coming right up! Oh, they didn’t like it? Try adding some salt. It’s fun to get the “ew”!

We added a whole lot of fun stuff! You can now enjoy cooking:

New foods!
- Chicken
- Prawn
- Pineapple
- Corn
- Peach
- Strawberry
- Watermelon
- Onion
- Octupus leg
- Spaghetti
- Rice

New condiments!
- Ketchup
- Dressing
- Soy

Watch the characters react on burning hot sauce, sour lemon and laugh at loud burps.

At last but not least, we added more levels of grossness to the characters. Have fun!

Features:
- New ingredients in the fridge
- New characters to feed
- Stronger character reactions
- New juicer and oven
- Deep fryer! You can now deep fry anything. Get your crust on.
- No rules or stress - just open-ended, kid-directed fun!
- No third-party advertising
- No in-app purchases

***

Subscribe to our YouTube channel!
http://bit.ly/YouTube_GooglePlay

***

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

summary: The wildly popular Toca Kitchen is back!
title: Toca Kitchen 2

comments: For a mobile rpg (free at that) it has a lot to offer and lots to do. Lot of grinding but very addictive and you don't need to pay to win! You can attain everything through grinding without having to spend any money at all.. 5 stars for sure.. It's my new time killer.

This is one the best RPG phone games out. It is addictive and fun with lots to do at everyone point in the game. At the moment it is my favourite phone game. It is a bit complicated at the start, however you start to understand it more and more as you play. There is in game purchases but these are not necessary to enjoy the game. Definitely a 5* game! Only thing I find slightly annoying is that I never seem to have enough gold but this might change as I level up.

I recently switched to mobile gaming only, and I have a g stylo phone and a Nvidia shield k1 tablet. On my phone I get network error (I'm data only) and my tablet says the game isn't compatible. It's marshmallow OS on the shield tablet and the thing can run borderlands 2 natively so I know it's not a hardware issue. This game looks cool. Wish I could find out for sure. And no, I'm not running a speed test.

Requires some patience but is a really fun game. Don't expect to fly through the tutorial but they make it fun learning the steps. What I enjoy the most, is its NOT lagging down my processor with ads. Only thing I wish is that the home base was a little more organized.

The features of the game are cool.. i like all the pvp dungeons.. but most of the dungeons with event goes in certain time and limited.. if i miss them..then i hardly get the purpose of installing this game meaning.. nothing else to do.. it's getting boring for player like me who wants to spend hours online but no more rewarding pvp dungeons available overnight.. maybe create some entertaining 24 hours pvp features? I can tell many players tend to be inactive for more than 1 day...so hope for more crowded and better LOD..

Love the game, would give 5 stars, but lost 2 high-level characters and quite a bit of $ due to lack of anything resembling customer service. If you have to reinstall for any reason, and can't remember your password, be prepared to lose all progress because if you can't sign in right the first time, there's no way to sign out, or to contact someone to help recover your character.

description: B.E.A.T.  MP3  is an exciting musical rhythm game.All music tracks from your device in MP3 format are available for playing. The new gameplay mechanics and amazing visualization will make you forget about everything except the rhythm of your favorite melodies. 100 levels of difficulty.  From leisurely immersion in your favorite tunes to playing to the limit of their capabilities.  Test your sense of rhythm, reaction and finger motor skills in trying to set world records and become a world championship leader.Feature of game:1. All music from your device in mp3 format is available for playing.2. The new mechanics of the gameplay-pleasant and exciting. The rhythm of your fingers always coincides with the rhythm of the song.3. Exciting rendering of music in the form of a spectrum analyzer and lighting effects. That's what the rest of these games lack. Visualization increases the degree of immersion in the game by an order of magnitude. As if you are in a disco, but instead of a dance floor, your fingers flutter across the screen of the phone in an exciting wonderful dance!4. One hundred levels of difficulty from the simplest-for beginners to the level of a Pro, designed to achieve world records. 5. A completely new system of records and ratings. Records are recorded for each track separately. You are always aware of the world records of your favorite songs and the number of rivals. Information about records and the number of opponents is updated in real time.  As soon as you set a new track record, this information will be displayed on the screens of all your opponents around the world.6. The world rating of the player is set depending on the number of defeated opponents. You are always up to date with your own rating and TOP-100 leaderboards. But keep in mind, the rating is assigned only to those players who are the current Champions of at least one track!7. Unlimited version of the game does not contain advertising, as well as allows you to play in off-line mode.
descriptionHTML:
B.E.A.T. MP3 is an exciting musical rhythm game.

All music tracks from your device in MP3 format are available for playing.

The new gameplay mechanics and amazing visualization will make you forget about everything except the rhythm of your favorite melodies.

100 levels of difficulty. From leisurely immersion in your favorite tunes to playing to the limit of their capabilities. Test your sense of rhythm, reaction and finger motor skills in trying to set world records and become a world championship leader.

Feature of game:

1. All music from your device in mp3 format is available for playing.

2. The new mechanics of the gameplay-pleasant and exciting. The rhythm of your fingers always coincides with the rhythm of the song.

3. Exciting rendering of music in the form of a spectrum analyzer and lighting effects. That's what the rest of these games lack. Visualization increases the degree of immersion in the game by an order of magnitude. As if you are in a disco, but instead of a dance floor, your fingers flutter across the screen of the phone in an exciting wonderful dance!

4. One hundred levels of difficulty from the simplest-for beginners to the level of a Pro, designed to achieve world records.

5. A completely new system of records and ratings. Records are recorded for each track separately. You are always aware of the world records of your favorite songs and the number of rivals. Information about records and the number of opponents is updated in real time. As soon as you set a new track record, this information will be displayed on the screens of all your opponents around the world.

6. The world rating of the player is set depending on the number of defeated opponents. You are always up to date with your own rating and TOP-100 leaderboards. But keep in mind, the rating is assigned only to those players who are the current Champions of at least one track!

7. Unlimited version of the game does not contain advertising, as well as allows you to play in off-line mode.
summary: B.E.A.T.  MP3  is a new music rhythm game that will not leave you indifferent.
title: B.E.A.T.  MP3

description: The Magical Hair Salon 2 is coming now! More interesting & funny! In this New version princess hair salon, we have 2 new game mode: Color Lab & Dressing Room. The other 2 main game modes: Hair Salon Mode & Free Design Mode have been updated too. New hair tools, new game mode and hair accessories are included. All of game modes will get rewards. All the game props and hair accessories are FREE! Just enjoy this game with your friends and family! ===================New Mode: Color Lab!===================In the new game mode: Color Lab, you could choose two of colors which you like and pour them to the bottle. And then the magic is here. A new color is generated. You can also adjust the new color darker or lighter. It will cost you 2 tubes to save the new color. Don't worry! Everyday you will get 2 tubes for free.=======================New Mode: Dressing Room!=======================Beautiful hair style, fashion princesses, lovely hair accessories, magic wings and dresses... all of your imagination are in dressing room. Choose a beautiful dresses and hair style for your lovely princess. There are so many dresses are waiting for unlocking.==================New Mode: Daily Task==================Magical Princess Hair Salon prepares a lot of different daily tasks. Complete daily tasks to earn coins and diamonds! Different day has different tasks, so don't forget complete the task and get bonus in one day.==============Hair Salon Mode==============Cut hair, color and style hair any way you want, using lots of different hair styling tools ‚Äì from a simple comb and scissors to a curling iron and a straightener. Design hair styles for princess and girls and makeup in style! Run your own Magical Princess Hair Salon! Customers are looking for a new hair style and you are the one to give them the haircut of their dreams with this Magical Princess Hair Salon Makeover.The hair games provides a cute character for you, she will tell you what she wants to be, help her to make up like a princess! First wash and dry her hair,  then you can cut hair, color, curl or straighten the hair. If you make a mistake and cut too much hair off, don‚Äôt worry! Just use the hair grow gel and you can correct any accidental haircut. Next, you can get even more creative by using hair color dyes or hair decorations to make your customer happier, let them look like a princess! Haircut, makeover for the girl! Could you make your customers satisfied 100%? In this Magic Princess Hair Salon games, each level you can unlock a different hair tool, and you can buy a lot of hair decorations for your customers. There is a tip for you : you can exchange diamonds to coins when you have no enough coins. ================Free Design Mode================In the FREE DESIGN MODE of this hair games, you could use all the hair tools which you have seen in hair salon mode. Just do your hair style as your imagination, have a haircut for girls! If you match the design conditions such as color, hair style, hair accessories, you'll get bonus after submitting. I can't wait to see your great arts in this hair salon games! Come and enjoy this Magical Princess Hair Salon!===================HAIR SALON FEATURES===================- Realistic hairdryer to create any look you wish- Styling tools such as scissors , hair straighter, curling iron, and hot air brush- Dozens of hair colors, cut hair styles- Fun accessories to complete the makeover- Get cuvettes and make new colors in Color Lab- Complete Daily Task to earn coins and diamonds- Dress up princess with beautiful dresses and fashion hair style.- Save your hair style for your princess.- Limitless haircut games mode.At last, once you and your customer are happy with the way they look, don‚Äôt forget to take them to the camera booth for a snapshot! Hope you like this Magic Hair Salon: Girl Makeover Games! Let us know if you have any ideas to this hair games!
descriptionHTML:
The Magical Hair Salon 2 is coming now! More interesting & funny!

In this New version princess hair salon, we have 2 new game mode: Color Lab & Dressing Room. The other 2 main game modes: Hair Salon Mode & Free Design Mode have been updated too. New hair tools, new game mode and hair accessories are included. All of game modes will get rewards. All the game props and hair accessories are FREE! Just enjoy this game with your friends and family!

===================
New Mode: Color Lab!
===================
In the new game mode: Color Lab, you could choose two of colors which you like and pour them to the bottle. And then the magic is here. A new color is generated. You can also adjust the new color darker or lighter. It will cost you 2 tubes to save the new color. Don't worry! Everyday you will get 2 tubes for free.

=======================
New Mode: Dressing Room!
=======================
Beautiful hair style, fashion princesses, lovely hair accessories, magic wings and dresses... all of your imagination are in dressing room. Choose a beautiful dresses and hair style for your lovely princess. There are so many dresses are waiting for unlocking.

==================
New Mode: Daily Task
==================
Magical Princess Hair Salon prepares a lot of different daily tasks. Complete daily tasks to earn coins and diamonds! Different day has different tasks, so don't forget complete the task and get bonus in one day.

==============
Hair Salon Mode
==============

Cut hair, color and style hair any way you want, using lots of different hair styling tools – from a simple comb and scissors to a curling iron and a straightener. Design hair styles for princess and girls and makeup in style!

Run your own Magical Princess Hair Salon! Customers are looking for a new hair style and you are the one to give them the haircut of their dreams with this Magical Princess Hair Salon Makeover.

The hair games provides a cute character for you, she will tell you what she wants to be, help her to make up like a princess!

First wash and dry her hair, then you can cut hair, color, curl or straighten the hair. If you make a mistake and cut too much hair off, don’t worry! Just use the hair grow gel and you can correct any accidental haircut.

Next, you can get even more creative by using hair color dyes or hair decorations to make your customer happier, let them look like a princess! Haircut, makeover for the girl! Could you make your customers satisfied 100%?

In this Magic Princess Hair Salon games, each level you can unlock a different hair tool, and you can buy a lot of hair decorations for your customers. There is a tip for you : you can exchange diamonds to coins when you have no enough coins.

================
Free Design Mode
================

In the FREE DESIGN MODE of this hair games, you could use all the hair tools which you have seen in hair salon mode. Just do your hair style as your imagination, have

a haircut for girls! If you match the design conditions such as color, hair style, hair accessories, you'll get bonus after submitting.
I can't wait to see your great arts in this hair salon games! Come and enjoy this Magical Princess Hair Salon!

===================
HAIR SALON FEATURES
===================
- Realistic hairdryer to create any look you wish
- Styling tools such as scissors , hair straighter, curling iron, and hot air brush
- Dozens of hair colors, cut hair styles
- Fun accessories to complete the makeover
- Get cuvettes and make new colors in Color Lab
- Complete Daily Task to earn coins and diamonds
- Dress up princess with beautiful dresses and fashion hair style.
- Save your hair style for your princess.
- Limitless haircut games mode.

At last, once you and your customer are happy with the way they look, don’t forget to take them to the camera booth for a snapshot! Hope you like this Magic Hair Salon: Girl Makeover Games! Let us know if you have any ideas to this hair games!
developerAddress: Shanghai Minhang District, Lian Hang Road No.1588, Technology Center Building 119
summary: üë∏Princess Hair Salon for girls!Dress up, Makeup, design hair, spa, color labs
title: Magical Hair Salon 2:Girl Makeover & Dress up

comments: Ads for a kids game? Some were highly inappropriate. 3 year old didn't care for this and neither did I. Maybe it can teach but from what I see you have a few minutes then ad. Then a minute and 2 ads. Don't bother with this people. There's other ones out there

This is a good app that I think with a little tweaking could be a great app!!The train does nothing (like move to the next one) when you match the fruit correctly. You have to leave the page and start over after each correct response. In the alphabet & flash card games, can the option be included that the sound can be turned off so the child hear him / herself say the item alone? Finally, can a counter be installed so that the child can know that he /she "did them all", "finished" or "did more than yesterday"?

A reasonable app. My biggest issue is that the letters would be better represented by the sound for young children . Why do they need the ay bee cee when a for apple b for ball etc are building blocks for reading? It is in my opinion confusing for young children.  I like some of the other parts of the app though.

I love this app so are my girls. I have 34months old twin girls and love it too. I wish the alphabets can be made plan or at least have an option to make them plan, it confuses the child who is still learning how to write. They love the train on the practise but maybe if instead of the train sound if it can repeat the instruction to get their attention back to the exercise. Overall I love the appü§£ü§£ü§£

My son really likes this. He's 2 and having trouble with speech.  The matching train games, he's been completing by himself.  I'm so proud of him.  Sometimes a card will disappear and we can't finish it. I always have to restart the game.
The adds ruin it. Every five seconds I'm taking it away from my son because he clicked the add. Not worth it. Better off paying for an app if you plan to use it for your kids!

descriptionHTML:
🌀 A Brand new type of game, brought to you by Pinka! 🌀
Unlike our previous games, this game has a new gameplay.
Here you tap 2 or more bubbles of the same color, in order to increase your score.

Features:
* Tap two or more Bubbles of the same color to score.
* Each stage has a different target score you must reach.
* Increasing difficulty level, so you don't get bored.
* An Undo button, so you could rethink your strategy without restarting!
* You don't need to clear the screen of bubbles, only to reach the target score.


★ Tips on Scoring:
- The more bubbles you pop, the higher score you get for each bubble.

Follow us to get news and updates:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pinkagames/
Site: https://www.pinka.biz/

Need to report an issue? Contact us at support@pinka.biz 📧

description: Slendrina is back in a new scary game!This time you are in an old school where Slendrina at young age use to go to.Try to find 8 fuses that are scattered throughout the school.The 8 fuses will be used to open a locked door.You must also find one of Slendrinas belongings and give it to her, to get something in return.You also need to find keys to open certain doorsand health boxes that give you a little more health when you have been injured.Thank you all for your kind ratings you have given me! You are the best!If you want to send an email to me, please write in English or Swedish.The game is free but it contains advertising.Have fun!
descriptionHTML:
Slendrina is back in a new scary game!

This time you are in an old school where Slendrina at young age use to go to.

Try to find 8 fuses that are scattered throughout the school.
The 8 fuses will be used to open a locked door.
You must also find one of Slendrinas belongings and give it to her, to get something in return.

You also need to find keys to open certain doors
and health boxes that give you a little more health when you have been injured.

Thank you all for your kind ratings you have given me! You are the best!
If you want to send an email to me, please write in English or Swedish.

The game is free but it contains advertising.

Have fun!
summary: Another scary game in the Slendrina series.
title: Slendrina: The School

Summon brave heroes of war to your cause, hone their skills or magic in combat, send them to the frontier, and use their unique abilities to turn the tide of battle, watch the epic scene of clash of elites! Form alliances with other players, defend Alliance Strongholds and castles against your enemies and take your revenge with your ally by Rally Attacks, take the chance and wow the world! descriptionHTML:
War Storm: Clash of Heroes is a Global Strategy MMO mobile game. Players take control of the legion of heroes and a castle, a stronghold, a nation, and all its subjects. Summon brave heroes of war to your cause, hone their skills or magic in combat, send them to the frontier, and use their unique abilities to turn the tide of battle, watch the epic scene of clash of elites! Form alliances with other players, defend Alliance Strongholds and castles against your enemies and take your revenge with your ally by Rally Attacks, take the chance and wow the world! Become a royale king of civil age and clash off the invading demon legions, or those vicious warlord armies who surge into ally's city. Write your own epic story in chaos; let the glory of might shine in honor!

-GAME FEATURES-

● Free Social Strategy MMO Mobile Game
● Innovative world map tactics! Take control of resources to expand your royale empire and position your forces in camps around the map to protect the kingdom in chaos!
● Complete Quests to win Heroes to your cause, or Summon them from beyond with Soul Shards recovered in the frontier of battle.
● Craft weapons & armor for your Heroes from rare hearth materials found around the world map.
● Form alliances with friends around the world to complete Alliance Quests, Send Aid to ally's nation, and Rally Attack your enemies!
● Seize, develop and defend an Alliance Stronghold with your allies.
● Sectioned World Map - growing your empire might give you access to new places!
● Build diverse legions of foot soldiers, archers, mages, catapults and more! Outsmart your enemies by outfitting the winning combinations in battle.
● Fight hellish monster legion under the leadership of Arch Demon. Become a powerful clasher and you might have to fight the Demon himself!

Problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support via email: support@hourgames.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarStormCOH
developerAddress: Rm. 19C, Lockhart Ctr., 301-307 Lockhart Rd., Wan Chai, Hong Kong

comments: Was more enjoyable to play before the update. Before I could move items I bought now everything I buy ends up in upper left corner. Cannot really even see each item. I basically watch each time a purchase is made to see the stars before moving on.  Also agree the game was easier but now is much harder and takes longer to open treasure chest.

Can't create your own tanks,  things just get placed there and you can't move them. The game itself is okay,  but if you take more than two seconds to find a move you want to do,  it starts flashing a move hint,  and not the best move either.  Nothing different to make this game stand out from most match three games.

Only played until level 8. It's an okay game but you can't really decorate your reef. You buy items and they plop down but you can't move them, so they stay where they fell. Not impressed. Used to play Fishdom and it was SO much better. The graphics were better and you could really decorate your tanks by moving items to where you wanted them not where they plopped down. You could also rename your fish. This game is like expecting Oreos and getting generic, chocolate sandwich cookies. Just a cheap imitation. Uninstalling

I would give it a 5 IF it had some instructions.  How do you choose a picture for the character frame?  I choose a house for my tank and it didn't show up.  I checked out all of the icons and couldn't find any help.  I really don't want to delete game but I would like some help, and I see that other players would too.  Thanks.
The game is listed as Everyone, but it is likely up to age 10. Helping fish friends? No, even less than 10. Dont understand why the game occupies 123 Mb of space, that is over the average.
Cute,fun ,but you can't even design your own tank. It would be a much better game if some things were changed in favor of your players. Please let us design our on tank.I

descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for Airforce X - Real hottest aircraft shooting game 2018 is now coming! - "Airforce X - Real Space Shooter Wars" - space wars and galaxy strike in the future!
The world is hanging on a thin thread! Our lovely Earth is under attack of mysterious alien space instruders. Enormous Bosses and evil enemies are threating our peace. We have no choice but to stand up and fight this relentless warfare.

Hurry up, galaxy warriors! The safety of ordinary human beings all depends on you. Get on your stunning jet, travel through the bullet hell & join fierce galaxy war. Let's knock out all the alien invaders and save the world!

AirforceX is a cool adventure - aircraft shooting game with diverse missions to complete. Getting bored with familiar classic shooting games? Airforce X brings you a whole new shooting experience with a broad range of fighter planes and upgrades to select.
Various maps, numerous characters, breathtaking battles and you'll surely never get bored! Aircraft war is full of excitement! Squadron attacks, rocket army or figher pilots make this space shooter game highly addictive.

BEST GAME FEATURES
- Unique characters with plenty of strength points: dame main, dame sub, hp, attack speed, skill...
- Customize and upgrade airplane at your disposal.

- Deadly alien Bosses and enemies.
- 13 achievements with hundreds of challenging sky force mission.
- Great HD graphics and lively shooting effects.
- Giant items collection such as shield, health, ammunation... to choose from.

comments: The game itself is actually quite fun to play.   What's less fun is all the rest of it. They've added an upgrade system for the planes and the pilots which requires that you spend money or wait an eternity for each upgrade. You have to spend "wings" in-game to play a level which of course you can buy. There are ads after each level. I understand that they need to make some money, but I think they've gone too far.

Me and my wife both love this game!!! I just finally passed level 30 and then poof my game is gone. I've saved to facebook and when I try to load it back it says no saved data found. My wife is gonna be livid whens he finds out. Played level 30 for 2 weeks. I need this to be restored!!
There seems to be some error in level 92. It's utterly impossible to get the score to pass. The level is too short. Please fix this otherwise great game.
please fix ur error... level 92 onwards is a big no no to pass through... 400000, y not u come n play? show us how to play...
I want my profile back!!!!! My rubies my operator my aircraft... Why back to square one? I already connected to FB... I will never play this game again, if my profile not restore..

Every single time I get up to lvl 20 or so,  it freezes up and after I rest the game, everything I've done is erased and I have to start all over again! It's happened at least 3 times now! If it happens again I will give it 1 star for everything and if I could it would be 0 stars! Love this game, I just wish it would freaking work!

descriptionHTML:
The one and only original shooting game!! The heroes of the arcade shooters have returned!!
The beloved arcade shooters of the past have come back in style to rekindle your senses!

ⓒ2017. X-nauts·psikyo & KM-BOX, APXSOFT all rights reserved.

★ STRIKERS1945 - World War Grand open!!★

■ Game Description ■
The final battle for the world has begun!
The original shooting game that will reign over all others!
STRIKERS1945 - World War!! Dive into the battle right now with this newest incarnation of the past masterpieces!

■ Game Features ■
▶ A collaboration of the arcade classics such as the Strikers series, Gunbird and Tengai!! ◀
- The beloved game characters of the past are now back as Operators!! Select and power-up your favorite one!
- Use the special powers of each Operator to immerse yourself in strategic battles!
- Manufacture and dismantle aircraft to create your ultimate fighters!

▶ Countless types of missions and hundreds of stages! ◀
- Choose from normal and hard modes to suit your style!
- Complete the missions for each stage!! Achieve perfect victory by earning three stars!
- Utilize numerous partners and items to conquer difficult stages!

▶ A Shooting Fest of Global Proportions!! ◀
- 14 languages supported! Enjoy the game with players from all over the world!
- Challenge players worldwide to conquer the global rankings!

▶ Thrilling Shooting Mayhem! Unique Battle Progression! ◀
- Enjoy longer battles with the new HP system!
- Unleash multiple levels of skills to engage in spectacular thrill-packed battles!

Download STRIKERS1945 - World War for free right now to experience classic arcade shooting fantasy!
Visit the Facebook page and click ‘Like’ and receive the latest news and update information.

[Controls]
Screen slide: Move aircraft
Super Shot button tap: Fire Super Shot using the gauge on the top of the screen.
Bomb button tap: Summon air support to temporarily block enemy attacks.

* Save (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
: Used to change the profile picture and to attach photos when sending messages to friends on the Facebook & Social Network platform on devices with Lollipop (OS 5.1.1) or below.
Strikers 1945 – World War requires the authority as it supports OS 4.0.3 and above.

comments: Overall, the game is pretty cool. But, I feel much more can be added though. Great game. Just more needs to be added. It's a great app I wish the devs could make like, Sandbox modes where you can build your own... Em... Coasters? I dunno. You had to verify them first. Annnd in order to verify them you had to complete them yourself. Then you could publish them. And maybe a two player mode? Not sure how that's gonna work out. That's all that could be added. Most of all. 3 and a half out of 5 stars.

The only way to play online is Facebook and Google play! First, you can make a 3rd option for an in-game name, like in Clash Of Clans,  and make the Google play account optional if you don't want to download Google play (not meaning that Google play is bad). Many people can not even think of any name that is not already taken in Google play (including me). It still is a good game,just it needs some more work.

Don't get me wrong, it's amazing and seems to be fun, but there's one thing that ruins it all. Whenever I open the game, everything shifts to the right quite a bit, so I can't see about one fifth of the screen, which doesn't allow me to use the button control setup, and some other things. Would love to see this get fixed, as the game has some nice potential.

Love this game for the cool clip art graphics with all the chaos. Relly funny when they crash. Lol i just dont like the constant ads gou have to watcg when ever you have to open a prize chest and when you win. I mean you win and then you gotta watch a clip for 30 secs, then it feels like you lose. Lol

As much as I want to love this game, its also quite cheap. Every single race, the same "real" players are always there regardless of time of day. They follow the same route and incredibly make no mistakes at all! Meanwhile, I'm getting stuck on every edge, my wheel gets stuck in the ground and every single gate smashes only me. Amazing!! Its a super fun game but don't think for a second that it plays fair.

Its a fun game where you actually get rewarded for watching ads. Multiplayer is a little laggy but its a fun game over all. Only thing i would like to see is the aftermath after your character either dies or falls out of the vehicle (level automatically resets after about a second after you die). Maybe even move around like you can in happy wheels, even if its just in single player mode. But overall a good game.

descriptionHTML:
Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‘sniper vs. sniper’ LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it’s FREE TO PLAY!

• Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world’s best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.

• Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.

• Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.

• Ally with your friends and create an UNSTOPPABLE SQUAD! Lead them to the top of the leaderboard, defeat other teams and win territories in Domination mode.

This game requires stable INTERNET CONNECTION to play. The gameplay involves real-time online match ups with players across the globe, shared server for any mobile device, and LIVE-CHAT.

For more info and all the latest news check out: https://www.facebook.com/SniperArenaGame/

Better than ML. Honestly, I play all sorts of Moba (or any video game), but this one really is different.  This game has issues, no argument with that. But when you compare it to "Mobile Legends: Bang Bang", you really see the difference. This one has top-notch graphics that I can probably compare to VG or PC Mobas. descriptionHTML:
Experience AOV - Arena of Valor, an epic new 5v5 MOBA by Garena!

Garena 1st mobile MOBA, AOV, is now available in Philippines, Malaysia, and Singapore! Choose from a legion of unique heroes and become a legend in the Arena!

Call on your teammates to join you in the jungle! Crush your enemies in classic 5v5 combat in real time! Draw first blood, carry your team, and conquer the Arena!

Features:

- Classic 5v5 MOBA, Perfected for Mobile -
Battle in a familiar three-lane map filled with brushes, nooks and crannies that allow you to pull off amazing jukes. With intuitive controls tailored for mobile, you will dominate the battlefield in no time!

- Play as any hero or legend -
Explore and command a roster of over 30 heroes and counting. Enjoy a wide variety of playstyles as you lead the front lines as a tanky vanguard or infiltrate formations as an agile assassin.

- The Ultimate MOBA Experience -
All the familiar features that you have come to know and love, right at your fingertips! With 5v5, 3v3, 1v1, and a unique "Hook Wars" mode, AOV will provide you with endless replayability!

Enjoy the full MOBA experience in just 15 minutes! Enjoy fast matchmaking with players around the world and become a legend!

Enjoy fast-paced combat and forge friendships with players around the world. Interact with friends and guild buddies any time! Share the load, work together, and fight strategically. Team up with your friends in Tourney Mode and craft your own eSports legend.

- Got What It Takes? Free to Play Forever -
In AOV, it’s all about skill. We strive to create the most riveting and balanced gameplay, so you can turn the tide of battle and vie for glory no matter the odds. Win or lose, every action counts!

Very fun addicting game. Nice storyline through out. But not with out it's problems, Why are you only allowed backups on certain missions and not on others?? I find this especially during the boss battles where they are most needed?? And if you opt out of paying the 20 gems to use one of your back ups it takes FOREVER. Which brings me to my next point,  some of these levels are WAY too hard for the reward. I have no problem with playing a challenging level, but to only get 20 gems 1st go around and then 5-10 üëç for a repeat?? When it takes 2900 gems to purchase an elite HAWK plane? That's not worth it.  One last thing, there has to be some reprimand for those that sign up to partner but then bail before the start, I'm invested with the Veridium I pay but they lose nothing if they bail? Not fair. Other than that good game, fun, but please fix these issues!
description: One body is nobody! Gather your bros and kick the living heck out of tyrannical Autocrat's armadas in a series of breathtaking aerial battles! The enemy outnumbers you, but you're never alone -- the unique co-op mode allows you to join forces with either your bro or a new friend! Shooting never ends.With a broad range of aircraft and upgrades to choose from, a variety of missions and challenges, Hawk is a good ol' adrenaline overdose. There's absolutely no way you'll ever get bored! So be ready to attack.Maniac bros will help you choose the best guns and surprise the enemies with destructive missiles. Keep your strongest weapons reloaded to deliver a crucial strike to the enemies‚Äô fighter jets. True bullet hell where metal melts.‚Äì Exciting campaign: more than 190 levels full of enemies and breathtaking action!‚Äì Unique co-op multiplayer: team up with your battle brothers to overcome challenges or join forces with random players for even more fun!‚Äì Additional modes: Arcade, Team-up and Assault, each of them radically changing the gameplay!‚Äì Perfect Shoot ‚Äòem up: Lots of fighter jets, battle companions, ammunition and guns, and devices to choose from: your personal armory is packed with hi tech!.‚Äì Huge bosses: battle and defeat enemies that are so big they don't even fit the screen! And wipe out swarms of their minions! Find pieces of the Danmaku barrage of bullets. ‚Äì Great visuals: Tired of space and lasers? Try out flying! Amazing 3d graphics will make you forget that this game genre is old school. Vertical shooters have never been better. Epic sky wars are full of excitement. Choose your ¬´phoenix¬ª and free the country from invaders. The symphony of air war and heroes' charisma are unforgettable!‚Äì Retro modernized: Played Shmup (STG) games before? Think this is retro? We prove you are wrong. This top-down shooter will make you say ¬´wow¬ª and revive the best impressions of your scroll childhood. No matter you are a fan of Strikers, Tyrian, Ace Squad, Razor or Airborn or you participated in battle actions in 1945. You will become the fan of our freedom squadron!  Take your Broforce to victory. Feel the bullet force.
descriptionHTML:
One body is nobody! Gather your bros and kick the living heck out of tyrannical Autocrat's armadas in a series of breathtaking aerial battles! The enemy outnumbers you, but you're never alone -- the unique co-op mode allows you to join forces with either your bro or a new friend! Shooting never ends.
With a broad range of aircraft and upgrades to choose from, a variety of missions and challenges, Hawk is a good ol' adrenaline overdose. There's absolutely no way you'll ever get bored! So be ready to attack.
Maniac bros will help you choose the best guns and surprise the enemies with destructive missiles. Keep your strongest weapons reloaded to deliver a crucial strike to the enemies’ fighter jets. True bullet hell where metal melts.

– Exciting campaign: more than 190 levels full of enemies and breathtaking action!
– Unique co-op multiplayer: team up with your battle brothers to overcome challenges or join forces with random players for even more fun!
– Additional modes: Arcade, Team-up and Assault, each of them radically changing the gameplay!
– Perfect Shoot ‘em up: Lots of fighter jets, battle companions, ammunition and guns, and devices to choose from: your personal armory is packed with hi tech!.
– Huge bosses: battle and defeat enemies that are so big they don't even fit the screen! And wipe out swarms of their minions! Find pieces of the Danmaku barrage of bullets.
– Great visuals: Tired of space and lasers? Try out flying! Amazing 3d graphics will make you forget that this game genre is old school. Vertical shooters have never been better. Epic sky wars are full of excitement. Choose your «phoenix» and free the country from invaders. The symphony of air war and heroes' charisma are unforgettable!
– Retro modernized: Played Shmup (STG) games before? Think this is retro? We prove you are wrong. This top-down shooter will make you say «wow» and revive the best impressions of your scroll childhood. No matter you are a fan of Strikers, Tyrian, Ace Squad, Razor or Airborn or you participated in battle actions in 1945. You will become the fan of our freedom squadron!

Take your Broforce to victory. Feel the bullet force.
summary: Grab your bros and plunge yourself into a breathtaking air combat action!
title: HAWK ‚Äì Force of an Arcade Shooter. Shoot 'em up!

description: Welcome to Off-Road Trucker Muddy Driving: Heavy Trucks Drive!Driving a dirt trucker on muddy hills and offroad dirt tracks is surely a difficult job, but one does not have to bother by the intense driving required on dirt tracks and mud patches in this offroad delivery mountain trucker game. Get ready to enjoy this cargo delivery Russian trucker on deep mud tracks and wet silt offroad journeys. Spin tires of this mud runner mountain truck will help you to not get stuck in wet mud during an offroad journey. Previously you need to call a tow truck to pull out Russian trucker. Spin tires help to get through deep mud tracks and wet silt offroad journeys quite comfortably. Drive mountain trucker though extreme swamps in order to get used to the idea. Drive multiple mountain trucks like 4x4 SUV cargo trucker. crazy offroad jeep, 6x6 mud runner or a 4 wheel centipede trailer. You can not only drive these heavy duty mud runner trucks but also provide mountain cargo delivery services. Experience bouncy dunes and silt tracks on your way back to a parking garage. Park your dirt trucker in the parking garage before you start pulling another loaded cargo trolley. Be the champion of offroad truck evolution in dirt environment without any speed limit to follow. Start your dirt drive as a rally racer and enjoy tyres suspension structure on a rough terrain. Complete cargo delivery and trolley pulling adventures to e the ultimate offroad truck driver. Enjoy various tasks in this truck evolution rally racer drive such as mud power drive, traverse river crossing, mud obstacles hitting, ramp climbing, narrow trench crossing, and passing over hillock bridge. Do not account for any speed limit on rough terrain and become the most successful offroad truck driver. comments: To many glitches. Kicks me out when i have correct answer marked before time is up. Every time I have played its eliminated me as soon as the question comes up and ill have the right answer in right amount of time left. Wanted to like this game but its frustrating to get kicked out every time Id like to play.

Ref code : dodomcbirdie. The game is super fun! No glitches runs smoothly the hosts are fun and plus all the knowledge even if you don't win is still great. Would still like if it involved questions from around the world and not just America. Otherwise it's perfect.  EDIT: I used to love the game but recently it just gets stuck during the questions and I am unable to select the answer. Today I got eliminated in the first 2 questions and a life got used too. Please fix this!!!!

It's a simple game, and easy to play. I just wish that I could review the questions after the game. I want to know what I got right or wrong, what I found easy or hard. I wish there was some sort of stats page to view how I'm doing. I also found that I head an extra life that mysteriously went missing.

Despite what the head of HQ says, this is still a beta. It's not on par with the iOS version, lots of things missing like the weekly free life,  high score display when you get eliminated, winner animations, and video inside the question timer. The current Android screenshots show the video inside the timer, so I'm wondering what happened there... Just iOS screenshots with an Android status bar?

Not enjoying the game as much as I used to. Game starts late a lot more often and gimmicks, like winner takes all games, are just more opportunities for you to lose. If you do manage to win there are so many people playing now that the jackpot has been shrinking more every week. It can still be a fun game but the competition is doing a better job. Use referral code ritzgit for extra lives.

Not getting game beginning soon notifications. STILL. Questions asked and no answers pop up to choose from. Glitch city with this app. Also, how do you use your extra life??? I've had one forever and can't use it.

description: Fun games to learn numbers for kids. This educational game will help kids and preschoolers to learn numbers and counting.These counting games help kids work on counting concepts from preschool through second grade, covering speed counting, the count sequence, and everything in between.Math Mania features :=> Counting - Learn to count objects in this simple game of addition.=> Compare - Kids can build their counting and comparing skills to see which group of items is bigger or smaller.=> Addition Fun - Count the objects and tap on the missing number.=> Addition Quiz - Put your child's math and addition skills to the test.=> Addition Puzzle - A fun mini-game where kids create math problems by put numbers on the screen.=> Subtraction Puzzle - Fill in the missing symbols in the math problem.=> Subtraction Fun - Count the items to solve the puzzle!=> Subtraction Quiz - See how much your child has improved in their mathematics skills for subtraction.All in all, Math Mania stands out for its variety of math exercises that will help children practice their skills while having some fun.Best of all for your child - they are free!Enjoy With FANTASTIC FUN !!!
descriptionHTML:
Fun games to learn numbers for kids. This educational game will help kids and preschoolers to learn numbers and counting.

These counting games help kids work on counting concepts from preschool through second grade, covering speed counting, the count sequence, and everything in between.

=> Addition Fun - Count the objects and tap on the missing number.
=> Addition Quiz - Put your child's math and addition skills to the test.
=> Addition Puzzle - A fun mini-game where kids create math problems by put numbers on the screen.
=> Subtraction Puzzle - Fill in the missing symbols in the math problem.
=> Subtraction Fun - Count the items to solve the puzzle!
=> Subtraction Quiz - See how much your child has improved in their mathematics skills for subtraction.

All in all, Math Mania stands out for its variety of math exercises that will help children practice their skills while having some fun.

Enjoy With FANTASTIC FUN !!!
