descriptionHTML:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant!

Features:
* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients
* 19 unique locations
* More than 400 levels to complete
* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

Cooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:
* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers
* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress

descriptionHTML:
Mountain Sniper Shooter FPS is a thrilling action sniper game with real-life 3D graphics and sound effects. Hold your breath, lock the enemies at Mountain, Desert, Forest and Rural. In a limited time use your limited ammo rationally at a distance, kill them all. The game gives an exciting experience to complete the mission.

You must use all of your specialized skills to survive in the enemy forces. Faced with this situation of you have no choice. From the sniper guns, as you have access to a variety of weapons, as well as powerful. In the battle you will be sent to different locations to perform the difficult task. Such as Desert, Mountain, Forest and Rural.

Once you enter the target location, the enemy is aware of your presence, search everywhere for you, attack you. There is no turning back, so you need to be very careful, fast, accurate, ruthless onslaught. You can air-attack with aircraft and be the best fighter in the field and destroy aircraft carriers. Just start, shooting destroying the enemies with missiles and machine guns.

How to play:-
- Touch and slide the screen to aim and kill the enemy
- Use sniper mirrors to zoom in and out and aim and kill enemies
- Click the Shoot button. Launch bullets
- Switch weapons in combat Sniper/Air-attack

★★★FPS Game Features★★★
• Challenging 3D First Person Shooting (FPS) gameplay
• Thrilling & exciting missions.
• Immersive 3D environment
• Exciting gameplay
• Adventurous and thrill filled levels
• Various deadly missions
• HD quality audio and video sounds

+ Glassical gameplay
+ Amusing graphics and sounds
+ Plenty of monsters/ over 30 monsters in the game
+ Epic boss fights/ 8 boss fights in 4 different worlds/ in each world you will have to kill 2 bosses
+ Pj the red wonder girl going through the jungle adventures/ Mask the blue strong kid killing monsters easily
+ Multiple levels/ 80 levels overall/ 80 levels in 4 different worlds, each world contains 20 levels
+ 4 different worlds/ The wild desert, the dangerous rainforest, the far wild west, and the hot lava cave

How to play:
+ click right or left on your control pad for moving Sophia the frst super hero girl!
+ down-button is for ducking and also to get to some bonus levels (under tree stumps)
+ press B-button to make Super Princess jumping!
+ press A-button AND right or left for running; press A and B together for a higher and wider jump!

The game develops attention and reaction of the child!

description: Shadow Revenge 2 - Super BattleThis is the MEGA fight, so you (Shadow Warrior) have to fight, take your weapon and let's play Shadow If you wanna test your competence, reaction & intelligence , here is the best game Shadow Revenge 2 - Super Battle, simple & amazing. the levels will become hard, the ninja in the game is a shadow, your task is to complete the game, there are 3 levels of difficulties, be quick and avoid the all the obstacles ( weapons on the road ), keep on going to improve your skills, fight and win.Basing on fiction comic, when a Shadow save the Earth by fighting with Monsters outside planet. Step by step, the warrior prevents the invasion of monsters. ‚òÖ Game Story ‚òÖEach hero has his background story. Meanwhile, An AI (Artificial Intelligence) has been created to study their stories and interpret them to you. Most of the time, it will walk you through the basics. Unfortunately, due to a critical mistake of its creator, that gave AI such gloomy vision of understanding any hero's form. Other than that, little AI is still learning things to get better at guiding players.You can't predict the enemies and dangers ahead of you. But whatever out there, you need to be fearless and unstoppable. Let the enemies hear your roar and the majesty of the master is enough to deter the enemy. Timidity is never the name of the master of the arcade! ‚òÖ FEATURES ‚òÖ- 4 Shadow Warriors- Learn 5 amazing skills- Easy to control movement- High quality graphics- Amazing Movement- Best of Shadow.- Upgrade your character's skills, skin- Challenge yourself with tough battles- Get and Train Pets to support the warriorYou can upgrade abilities using gold and Gems, Diamond collected from enemies and the environment in order to keep tracks with the difficulty of the game. move through traps, kill all enemies who try to stop you!
descriptionHTML:
Shadow Revenge 2 - Super Battle

This is the MEGA fight, so you (Shadow Warrior) have to fight, take your weapon and let's play Shadow If you wanna test your competence, reaction & intelligence , here is the best game Shadow Revenge 2 - Super Battle, simple & amazing. the levels will become hard, the ninja in the game is a shadow, your task is to complete the game, there are 3 levels of difficulties, be quick and avoid the all the obstacles ( weapons on the road ), keep on going to improve your skills, fight and win.

Basing on fiction comic, when a Shadow save the Earth by fighting with Monsters outside planet. Step by step, the warrior prevents the invasion of monsters.
★ Game Story ★
Each hero has his background story. Meanwhile, An AI (Artificial Intelligence) has been created to study their stories and interpret them to you. Most of the time, it will walk you through the basics. Unfortunately, due to a critical mistake of its creator, that gave AI such gloomy vision of understanding any hero's form. Other than that, little AI is still learning things to get better at guiding players.

You can't predict the enemies and dangers ahead of you. But whatever out there, you need to be fearless and unstoppable. Let the enemies hear your roar and the majesty of the master is enough to deter the enemy. Timidity is never the name of the master of the arcade!

★ FEATURES ★
- 4 Shadow Warriors
- Learn 5 amazing skills
- Easy to control movement
- High quality graphics
- Amazing Movement
- Best of Shadow.
- Upgrade your character's skills, skin
- Challenge yourself with tough battles
- Get and Train Pets to support the warrior

You can upgrade abilities using gold and Gems, Diamond collected from enemies and the environment in order to keep tracks with the difficulty of the game. move through traps, kill all enemies who try to stop you!

comments: It's an OK game. If it doesn't lock up in the next few days I'll come back and give a better review.  So many of these games end up costing you a bunch of money, then the errors start. I've already put 3 games on my pad, spent money on them, and now they're useless so I will reserve my review until I see what happens with this game.

Very good time killer. Do not buy other vehicle than Titan, it is waste of money/time. I'm not sure if multipkayer is really online, maybe its a fake only (continues even if you leave the app and return back)

Hill Climb meets Tank Wars. Simple but fun time-burner. You can upgrade your tank with in-game coins. Purchase option available but then you don't get to enjoy the challenge. Grind it out and earn those upgrades. Enjoy!

Move forward, flip over and die Move backward, flip over and die Fire the canon, flip over and die Hit by another canon, flip over and die Ram a tank, flip over and die Rammed by another tank, flip over and die Sit perfectly still, flip over and die.  Terrible, terrible controls.  Edit: I'm happy to say they removed the Flip and Die feature and now the game is quite enjoyable. Well worth playing!

Very pay to win and matchmaking isn't great.  Matches new players against players with tons of upgrades.  I know that's a common tactic to encourage those new players to buy the better tanks with cash, but it just made me remove the game.

Alittle bit boring but it has good graphits and makes the players exciting while beating at the enemies . However, to get more excellent tanks like Tesla , it takes so many long times and difficult to hore the coins. I wonder if this game is easy to get coins .  Bravo!

Now this game really gonna b e so much fun to playüôÇüòçüòçüòç by the way if you have extra time to change indoor stairs like the icon in store or carft can you please do it..right now it's just a wooden ramp..very ugly üò≠ oh sorry I thought I put that 5 star

Board the train safely- Space is no fun without a helmet. Put it on now!- Stop the clothes dryer. It‚Äôs a terrible hiding place!- Scratched the drug dealer‚Äôs ride, now avoid his bat- Taking expired medicine is not recommended- Stitch it up before bleeding out! - Perform a daring rescue from a burning building- Drag appliances back on the shelf to prevent accidents- Remember to stop at level crossings- Everyone loves bacon!  Even rattlesnakes!- Rotate the wires to complete the circuit- Only cross at pedestrian crossings - Remember the sequence for a fireworks show- Swipe to avoid a prickly crash- Sprung a leak?  Sprint to the shore!- Tap to tip toe to the ice cream- Keep the wasp nest from hitting the ground - Avoid eating rotten food- Leap over forest obstacles- Screw down the glue cap- Find the psycho before he finds you!- Smash the asteroids - Hunt for treasure, but don‚Äôt get hunted yourself- Ready, aim, and fire yourself onto an opposing galleon- Walk the plank, but don‚Äôt fall over- Barricade your home to stave off zombies- Follow the recipe to brew the perfect potion- Feed the bear candy before he feeds on you- Build the perfect snowman, but watch out for pointy carrots- Pouring drinks from a rickety ladder is inadvisable- Time your jump or get stuck in a chimney- Package the chocolates or feel love‚Äôs bite- Don‚Äôt Dumb with scissors- Drive up to a scenic lookout (but make sure to brake)PLUS- Perfect your dumb-death prevention skills to unlock the full set of characters for your train station- Create your own Dumb Ways character from loads of facial features, accessories and more!Watch the original Webby and Cannes award-winning video here: www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJNR2EpS0jw
descriptionHTML:
You've seen the video - now the lives of those charmingly dumb characters are in your hands.

Enjoy 52 hilarious mini-games as you attempt to collect all the charmingly dumb characters for your train station, achieve high scores and unlock the famous music video that started it all.

Download the FREE game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe around trains. A message from Metro.

GAMEPLAY
- Why is his hair on fire? Who cares, just RUN!
- Quickly wipe your screen free of puke
- Balance that wobbling glue eater
- Flick the piranhas out of range of those precious private parts
- Swat wasps before it's too late
- Best not invite that psycho killer inside
- Carefully remove forks from toasters
- Help self-taught pilots
- Get back from the edge of the platform you fools
- Have patience at level crossings
- No crossing the tracks! Not even for balloons!
- And who knew rattlesnakes were so picky about mustard?
- Doing your own electrical work? Choose the wires carefully
- Mind the gap! Board the train safely
- Space is no fun without a helmet. Put it on now!
- Stop the clothes dryer. It’s a terrible hiding place!
- Scratched the drug dealer’s ride, now avoid his bat
- Taking expired medicine is not recommended
- Stitch it up before bleeding out!
- Perform a daring rescue from a burning building
- Drag appliances back on the shelf to prevent accidents
- Remember to stop at level crossings
- Everyone loves bacon! Even rattlesnakes!
- Rotate the wires to complete the circuit
- Only cross at pedestrian crossings
- Remember the sequence for a fireworks show
- Swipe to avoid a prickly crash
- Sprung a leak? Sprint to the shore!
- Tap to tip toe to the ice cream
- Keep the wasp nest from hitting the ground
- Avoid eating rotten food
- Leap over forest obstacles
- Screw down the glue cap
- Find the psycho before he finds you!
- Smash the asteroids
- Hunt for treasure, but don’t get hunted yourself
- Ready, aim, and fire yourself onto an opposing galleon
- Walk the plank, but don’t fall over
- Barricade your home to stave off zombies
- Follow the recipe to brew the perfect potion
- Feed the bear candy before he feeds on you
- Build the perfect snowman, but watch out for pointy carrots
- Pouring drinks from a rickety ladder is inadvisable
- Time your jump or get stuck in a chimney
- Package the chocolates or feel love’s bite
- Don’t Dumb with scissors
- Drive up to a scenic lookout (but make sure to brake)

PLUS
- Perfect your dumb-death prevention skills to unlock the full set of characters for your train station
- Create your own Dumb Ways character from loads of facial features, accessories and more!

Watch the original Webby and Cannes award-winning video here: www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJNR2EpS0jw

Metro Trains
Level 16, 700 Collins St
Docklands, VIC 3008
Australia

comments: Hi. It's a nice game and I'm a Star trek fan. Pls fix my mission on art dealer. I can't claim the prize and go on. It would be nice if there were skip mission option. If get stuck. Thanks in advance. I've send a ticket already pls reply

Some of missions unable to complete, lots of bugs and have to restart game. Idea is good but a lot of work needed. Controls way too poor. Cant exit quickly to main screen, need to go through every window separately.  And then, more bugs

The gameplay is interesting but the game is way too slow going from menu to menu and glitchy, my phone restarted twice because the game froze. I'd love to play but until it gets fixed its too frustrating
Increasing my rating as I've become a little obsessed with this game, great graphics and fun to play.

Is the bugiest game that i ever played, it freezes a lot , because of the game i got to restart my phone 3- 4 times a day .The reason that i gave 2 stars and not 1 is because i m a Star Trek fan. Please fix the bugs
Interesting idea for a Star Trek game. I'm looking forward for future improvements and polishing since the game in its current state does not look finished.

description: The Craft Life is a block or voxel building game for creative people. There are cute horses and girl characters that you may spawn. The Craft Life gives you a chance to be creative. It gives you tools to build, create, design for girls and for boys. There is a chance to ride your horse, spawn as much cute horses as possible.There is a plenty of craft blocks to choose from - just drag and drop the blocks from the inventory. Also you may rotate some blocks. This is useful for furniture like chairs tables and wardrobes. There is furniture in this game so you can design home, decorate room and do whatever you like. A new home for girls and for boys? No problem!
descriptionHTML:
The Craft Life is a block or voxel building game for creative people. There are cute horses and girl characters that you may spawn. The Craft Life gives you a chance to be creative. comments: I think WAR ROBOTS is amazing!  I love how you make all kinds of robots to put into battle! I like how the robots can have special defense's like sentry mode and sheilds.  I also think it is cool to have different battlefields and different robots to choose from! I like it when you make more robots for people to buy and put into battle. I wished that everyone would play this game. But, I was wondering if you could lower the prices for the special robots and guns? Thanks!  From, JulianüôÇüòé

Reminds me of the mechs from some Animes. Fun. Easy to upgrades mechs and weapons by watching videos and going into open battles. Haven't joined a clan yet. Been playing for about two months now. The only complaint I have is facing lvl 30 players with lvl 12 Mk II mechs and weapons that clearly belong in higher leagues. I understand Pixonic's loyalties lay with their paying customers first. Because it costs money  to develop new mechs, weapons, and maps.  But something needs to be done about the Tankers. A week in the LP queue doesn't seem to be enough to discourage Tanking.  I still believe that the game is fun. And I won't let cheaters discourage me. Sooner or later I'll be up there in higher levels myself.

game keep disconnecting due to problems since last update  edited after reply from picnic  thanks  for the reply .    connection loss has decreased  for the past two days (update?)  anyhow this is great customer service and just for that you guys deserve a 5 star...great game  great service and maybe some disc bug but that is life and you seem to address them   I'm impressed

This is the longest running game I have on my phone...so that should tell you something. It's fun don't get me wrong but it started out as a great game but has now changed to a 2 star game due to the fact that they keep on making it more and more a pay to play game. If they keep going down this route I will need to quit. I don't mind paying for a good game but in game purchases are getting crazy.

4 downrankers out of 5. The only problem is when people with ridiculously high level gear end up in low ranks. Most games my team gets rolled by a guy that practically insta kills us, everything else is actually decent. I would recommend a pve game mode or a players vs a giant robot that would be fun

This gets one star until the matches are EVEN. I PLAYED AGAINST A RAIJIN ON MY FIRST GAME! Other than that, good game. But pay to win. Bit I'm level 21 and hadn't bought anything and only played for month. And to all those people who claimed to have lost thousands, WHY, JUST WHY, DID YOU SPEND THAT MUCH ON, ON A,  ON A GAME!
description: War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors! "If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won‚Äôt cost you anything." - Droid Gamers"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it‚Äôs such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android PoliceIt's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!MAIN FEATURES:‚Äì 34 battle robots with different strengths;‚Äì more than 30 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?‚Äì many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;‚Äì create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;‚Äì join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;‚Äì complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!Want to talk about the game or find allies?Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_PixonicWatch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.Enjoy the game!
descriptionHTML:
War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors!

"If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won’t cost you anything." - Droid Gamers

"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it’s such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines

"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android Police

It's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!

MAIN FEATURES:
– 34 battle robots with different strengths;
– more than 30 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?
– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;
– create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;
– join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;
– complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.

Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!

Want to talk about the game or find allies?
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_Pixonic
Watch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS
Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/

Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.
Enjoy the game!

descriptionHTML:
With over 5 BILLION downloads and worldwide hits like My Talking Tom and My Talking Angela, Talking Tom and Friends now has a BRAND NEW free app. Introducing: My Talking Hank! Take care of Talking Hank, the cutest puppy out there. Hank needs your ❤️ ! He’s ready for adventure and off to explore the tropical islands of Hawaii, but HE NEEDS YOU to help him!

★ TAKE CARE OF YOUR PUPPY
Adopt your very own puppy, little cute baby Hank. He is one of a kind. A puppy so sweet you can’t look away! Take care of Hank, your new favorite virtual pet. Feed him delicious food, take him to the toilet and swing him to sleep on a hammock under a starry sky.

★ HELP HANK COLLECT ALL THE ANIMALS
Hank loves photography! He wants to take picture of every wild animal living on the island. And there are plenty of them to discover - from a fluffy White Bunny, to a silly Flamingo, gangster Hip Hop Hippo and many more. Travel through different zones of the island. Place toys and food for the animals. Wait for them to show up and… CLICK! ... collect their photos.

★ FUN BEYOND FUN
Talking Hank will not only repeat everything you say with a hilarious voice, Hank takes fun to the next level! Laugh out loud at his constant adventures, his toilet shenanigans and much, much more! If you enjoy tamagotchi-style apps and kitty collector game mechanics you will fall in love with My Talking Hank.

★ FEATURES
Welcome to Hawaii: Check out your wonderful island home! It looks cool night and day!
Raise Hank: Hank needs you to take care of him, from feeding to visiting the toilet!
Take Photos: Help Hank complete his photo album by taking pictures of wild, exotic animals.
Attract animals: Some of them are scared of Hank, you’ll need food and toys to lure them out!
Keep playing: There are more features to discover in My Talking Hank, so keep exploring!

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via YouTube integration
- The option to make in-app purchases
- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (level progress, in-game functionalities)

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/
developerAddress:
Outfit7 Inc.
1 Sansome Street
Suite 3500-#7091
San Francisco
CA 94104
United States

description: - The defense game with over 11 million downloads is back with more advanced graphics and systems!- Kill or be killed! It‚Äôs one or the other! It's the breathtaking confrontation for mankind's survival!- Stay frosty! The tension never lets up as you move to the second half of the stage! Feel the intensity!- Join the S.W.A.T. team and kill all the zombies. You must protect Perfectville, the last remaining safe zone.- Shoot all the guns at an endless zombie horde! Use bombs too!- A new defense game that offers FPS sniper mechanics with strong addictive authentic defense elements! Go and immerse yourself in this fun game!‚ñ† Game Features ‚ñ†- Collect Weapons: Collect around 50 different types of weapons. Improve your FPS skills with them!- Bizarre Zombies: Skateboarding, bowling, spear-wielding, fat, pink-wearing, and even dog zombies! Face all kinds of zombies!- Challenge Hell Mode! Hell Mode Stages stimulate the desire to fight, but will be tough without upgrades! If you have the skills and confidence, try it!- Challenge Infinite Mode! comments: The ads in this game made it unplayable. I used to love this game and I downloaded it to try playing again and I would get minute and a half ads after every third attempt at a level. It felt like nearly every time I failed a level it would ask me if the level was too hard and I needed a hint. This game is incredibly obnoxious to play with ads on

Look, I understand that you have to make money somehow, and ads are how you make money on a free game. But these ads are way too frequent and obnoxious. I listen to podcasts while playing games and every minute or so my sound cuts out completely to prioritize the ad. Earn the ad by giving me a decent amount of playtime before it and stop overriding my audio.

Well i would give this five stars but you cant watch an add to get a power up! And you should lower the ad mount of adds i cant go in for 10 seconds without an add popping up!! Overall good great game
Way too many ads after every time I lose or go onto another level an advert pops up. Verry annoying. But the gameplay is decent.

I really liked this game but the problem is that there are too many ads. I know that this is a free game so we will have some but this to much. Once you pass a level or even you retry you are going to have ad. Also the ads are very big of30to60secs and you can't skip them

I like the game itself but when you have 3 adds coming up after one game you hardly can enjoy the game. Super annoying, so if you download it for free be prepared to buy it otherwise it will drive you crazy!

descriptionHTML:
Magic Kinder - Educational App

Magic Kinder is a world of fun and education designed to help families play and learn together through engaging games, activities, videos and stories in a safe environment.
Play is vital to children’s growth and development and Magic Kinder is designed to deliver learning opportunities through fun and engaging content.
Magic Kinder is completely FREE! There are no ads, no subscription required and no in-app purchases.
And we help parents too! Magic Kinder also contains videos and activities to help you make the most of your time with your children.
The application does not include any reference to Kinder chocolate products.
The physical toy surprises are the only reference to the product. No chocolate is shown!

The app includes the following content and features:

SURPRISERY
The Kinder Surprises toys can now be collected digitally in two different ways:
1. Scan the QR code found in the egg and you get to unblock the same surprise or a random one.
2. Through the ‘surprise of the day’, a random Kinder Surprise toy is unlocked.

PLAY & LEARN
If you are looking for fun games and activities for your child, then the playzone is the right place. It has multiplayer games for 3-10 year old kids geared towards improving children’s educational and cognitive development by focusing on various skills such as perception, attention, visual, motor and problem solving skills.
A selection of the games is focused on various topics such as: music, nursery rhymes, math and language. All designed towards being fun and playful.
Depending on countries and date, Magic Kinder also includes games and activities from some of the most popular characters: Despicable Me, Barbie, Hello Kitty, The Happos Family, Oddbods, Care Bears and much more.

WATCH VIDEOS
New videos are added frequently and they include: tutorials to do together as a family, cartoons, stop motion episodes, documentaries and more. Some of the activities include:
Karaoke Style Sing and dance along videos
Recipe and crafting tutorials to do together with your children dedicated to different festivities around the world like Halloween, Christmas, Easter, Chinese New Year, Ramadan and Diwali
Physical activity tutorials for the whole family
Cartoons and documentaries
Stop-motion videos featuring the Kinder egg surprise toys

DISCOVER THE PLANET
Through a collection of quizzes, facts and curiosities your child can learn about our planet and its wonders, explore nature and the animal world

DRAW & PAINT
Amazing New Feature: Bring your kids' creations to life through Augmented Reality! This functionality enables children to see their colored animals in 3D and interact with them. They will also repeat what your child says.

STORIES
A selection of fun and interactive bedtime stories.
USE THE APP OFFLINE - most of e content is available also without an internet connection
Magic Kinder is certified by the kidSAFE® Seal Program. To learn more, visit http://www.kidsafeseal.com

PARENT SECTION
A pin-protected zone is available for parents to manage the account, personalise and set time limits giving you control over your child's usage of the app.
If you wish to contact us, please do so through contact@magic-kinder.com
If you have any questions regarding the privacy policy please write to privacy@ferrero.com

IMAGINATION is the REAL SURPRISE!

descriptionHTML:
Join Phil in his latest Faily Adventure as he finds himself hurtling through downtown “San Fran Faily” on a Skateboard.

In this physics based game you must maneuver an endless city scape full of dangerous and hilarious obstacles including busy streets, alleyways, parks, buildings and rooftops resulting in the usual Faily fun and near misses and best of all ultimate CRASHES.

FEATURES
• NAVIGATE as far as you can go avoiding obstacles along the way
• AVOID traffic, trams, pedestrians and all types of unexpected obstacles
• DESTROY obstacles with your shield or weapons
• COLLECT coins as you go
• UNLOCK unique boards and costumes
• RECORD gameplay and share to Youtube, Facebook or Instagram
• ENDLESS gameplay
• ENDLESS crashes
• ENDLESS fun!

* Permissions Details *
Faily Skater will require access to photos, media and files on your device. This is only used to cache the advertising in game and to allow the sharing of custom screenshots taken in game.

comments: FIFA mobile peaked with FIFA 14 in almost every way. It had career mode, better controls, more realistic have gameplay and better ultimate team. It's a real shame you can't play it any more. Another thing they had always been lacking from FIFA mobile is the ability to properly customize how your team plays. This means the player who wins is the one who can best adapt to how EA had set the team up to play. This makes the game less rewarding as I do not like my teams to play in the way that EA ways them to. üòîüòî

The game in my opinion is very rewarding. For example you get an Elite Cristiano Ronaldo at the beginning but they could add multiple updates to make it better. I actually have a no like about this game which is that it drains your battery usage fast and that's not good. The overall of the game is OK but they can add updates to make it better.

In the vs attak mode if i lose a game i lose 8000 fans and if i win it i get only 6000 fans. It is a great game but this is a problem. More over in some matches i donot get great chances to score while the opponent gets 10 great chances. It very unfair. Many times if the game hasn't started and my server crashes i loose the match and stamina. And i cannot play the game for a hole day because of server problem evenif my internet connection is quiet strong.  Execpt this everything is gr8.

I request the developers to consider the following points... 1.The team can't be substituted while playing season games. 2.The game shows unknown errors sometimes while playing and crashes. 3.It would be good if getting the elite players become easier.. Rest it's surely one of the best game of EA and undoubtedly for the football lovers..Keep updating... I would like it more if you improve the physics of the game like curving the ball etc....please make it....

Vs mod is so bad after update. I have ovr 99. After update i lost many games from some guys who have ovr 94-95 because u didn't give me as many great chances as u predict. Once i played against 98 ovr player. He had 2 great and 6 good chances, i had 6 good chances and 0 great. It isnt ok.

The only I wanted to tell is that the game shows that the master players are very rare and we have a chance of getting them but trust I have been playing fifa for a lot of time and I never got like a player in like chance or in free packs I do not even get silver players. So I suggest that you increase the chances of getting these kind of players.
description: FIFA Mobile has been reimagined to bring you the most authentic and exciting mobile soccer game you‚Äôll ever experience! Add depth to your roster, manage your lineup on the fly, and quickly tweak tactics before every match. Make the right calls and watch your club become the Ultimate Team. descriptionHTML:
FIFA Mobile has been reimagined to bring you the most authentic and exciting mobile soccer game you’ll ever experience! Get a free Cristiano Ronaldo item to start building and managing your team. Train any player to superstar status, attack opponents, and keep coming back for daily content all season long. Plus, get into the game on the go with a download size of under 100 MB. Whether you’re a savvy veteran or just starting out on the pitch, FIFA Mobile is your source for soccer.

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM™
Develop the most competitive squad when you choose any 11 players from over 550 real teams, including stars from past and present, and train them to over 100 OVR. Add depth to your roster, manage your lineup on the fly, and quickly tweak tactics before every match. Make the right calls and watch your club become the Ultimate Team.

ATTACK TO WIN
Take on thrilling matches that drop you into your offensive possessions with VS Attack mode. This innovative level of competition kicks your game into high gear while you strive to dominate 90-second matches, climb the leaderboards, and earn seasonal rewards year-round.

KEEP UP WITH REAL-WORLD EVENTS
Stay connected to real-world soccer as it happens across the globe. Test your skills in single-player Campaign mode, then challenge yourself with uniquely themed Events where you can earn incredible prizes.

JOIN A LEAGUE, CONQUER THE WORLD
Participate in Leagues, a truly social experience that allows you to join forces and strive for glory with friends and gamers around the globe. Test your skills in inter-league championships, or take on the best gamers worldwide in League vs. League Tournaments to climb the leaderboards and prove your talent on the pitch.

This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.

User Agreement: http://terms.ea.com
Privacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/en
Visit http://help.ea.com/en/# for assistance or inquiries.
EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.
recentChanges: This mid-season update introduces an abundance of gameplay improvements to continue delivering the quality of experiences you demand, including:
- All-new Squad Building Challenges, rolling out weekly
- Enhanced Leagues with improved ability to search, auto-join, and updated social features
- Full Winter Transfer roster updates complete
We‚Äôve also made some off-the-pitch enhancements to keep your game going strong. Thanks for playing!
summary: Get a free Ronaldo item and build your Ultimate Team to attack, score, and win!
title: FIFA Soccer

description: My name is Haley Peterson. I always thought I was the luckiest girl in the world. I am the best cheerleader in our school team, I had the best boyfriend Jason and the best friend Evelyn. However, all things changed that day. It's the rehearsal of national cheerleading competition finals, I accidentally fell down to the floor and broke my legs, that's goodbye to the national cheerleading championship. Later, I found Evelyn dated Jason behind my back. I feel like it is the end of the world, I am going to lose my boyfriend and my best friend in the same time. Evelyn also took my place in cheerleader team and she is going to compete in national cheerleading competition finals.What should I do?Features:- Finally Haley can leave the hospital and go back home. Check out if her injuries are all healed!- Should I go or not? It's the finals I have dreamed about forever. But now it's Evelyn's fight, not mine... Will Jason go cheer for her? I need to find the answer. - Look, it's Evelyn! If I was not injured during rehearsal, I would've been rocking this cheerleading competition. - I bet Evelyn and Jason are celebrating now. It's OK, I don't want to see them.- I can't believe that Evelyn hates me for all these years, she is my best friend! OMG my mind is in a mess. Wait, there is a message from Jason. And so much more are waiting for you to find out!More school love stories? Having problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you!You can find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/hugsNheartsGames/Or on Twitter at https://twitter.com/HugnHeartsFor more information about Hugs N Hearts, please visit https://www.hugsnhearts.com/
descriptionHTML:
My name is Haley Peterson. I always thought I was the luckiest girl in the world. I am the best cheerleader in our school team, I had the best boyfriend Jason and the best friend Evelyn.
However, all things changed that day. It's the rehearsal of national cheerleading competition finals, I accidentally fell down to the floor and broke my legs, that's goodbye to the national cheerleading championship.
Later, I found Evelyn dated Jason behind my back. I feel like it is the end of the world, I am going to lose my boyfriend and my best friend in the same time. Evelyn also took my place in cheerleader team and she is going to compete in national cheerleading competition finals.
What should I do?

Features:
- Finally Haley can leave the hospital and go back home. Check out if her injuries are all healed!
- Should I go or not? It's the finals I have dreamed about forever. But now it's Evelyn's fight, not mine... Will Jason go cheer for her? I need to find the answer.
- Look, it's Evelyn! If I was not injured during rehearsal, I would've been rocking this cheerleading competition.
- I bet Evelyn and Jason are celebrating now. It's OK, I don't want to see them.
- I can't believe that Evelyn hates me for all these years, she is my best friend! OMG my mind is in a mess. Wait, there is a message from Jason.

And so much more are waiting for you to find out!

More school love stories? Having problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you!

You can find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/hugsNheartsGames/
Or on Twitter at https://twitter.com/HugnHearts
For more information about Hugs N Hearts, please visit https://www.hugsnhearts.com/
summary: High school cheerleader breakup and revenge. Help the heartbroken girl!
title: Cheerleaders Revenge 3 - Breakup Girl Story Games

descriptionHTML:
😜 You can’t miss this! The latest crazy installment of Troll Face Quest (Youtube Memes Edition) is finally here! Never heard of Troll Face? With more than 33 million installs worldwide, this series is insanely successful! This time you’re taken on a hilarious adventure where you’ll solve brain-teasing puzzles and try to make sense of impossible situations while trolling the most famous video game characters in history.

😊 To spare their embarrassment, we’re not mentioning any names here, but the classic heroes of first-person shooters, Italian plumbers, fruit-craving ninjas, fearsome orcs, candy-clogged puzzles and innocent test subjects trapped in labs filled with portals won’t escape Troll Face’s ridiculous pranks.

😬 TROLL OR BE TROLLED?
How do you make sense of a world that makes no sense? Is it crazy, or are you just crazy? Try to keep it together as you work your way through more than 30 wacky levels, or lose it when you get trolled for the umpteenth time.

• 30+ totally crazy and funny puzzles that will make you LOL
• Experience new controls
• Unlock wacky achievements
• Conquer the global leaderboard
• Play anytime, anywhere no wi-fi needed

😁 So whether you’re a young gamer hooked on the latest and greatest MMORPG or a less young one filled with nostalgia for the days when the NES, Game Boy and Mega Drive reigned supreme, you’re sure to get a kick out of Troll Face Quest: Video Games.

We love your feedback! What’s your favorite level? Let us know in the reviews!

#puzzle, #trolls, #free, #videogames
summary: Now you can troll your favorite video game characters in this hilarious sequelüòÑ

description: Real Euro Truck : Driving Simulator Cargo Delivery is the best Truck Driving Game of this year as the user gets the ultimate chance to become a Euro Truck Delivery Driver Truck. The user is responsible to deliver goods to various locations in the map. The user would take the cargo items and drive in the city and pick up goods from various locations, user would take the truck to harbor and pickup cargo from there and later would take these goods to open world offroad tracks. The user will drive the truck on treacherous roads as the suspension and driving skills will be tested to the extreme. The main challenge is to drive the truck on narrow tracks, the user needs to keep the balance of the big American Truck on sharp turns while driving downhill. The game most advanced In trucks environment with realistic steering wheel, accelerator and brakes. The game features detailed instrument cluster, as the user would drive the truck on snow covered tracks and muddy roads. comments: So far nice game love the fact that evolving is available for all pets (I have gotten at this point) and not just some make it so I want to sheet final form and will actually use it to get that instead of some games where certain char have only one once gotten no real need to work with it. Cool concept, adorable monster design and really liking the Pokemon Mystery Dungeon like gameplay. Control can be frustrating at some point and the map menu/button for the dungeon could have been better placed so that it can be accessed easily. Overall very good game and if you don't mind having to go through mazes in-game, this is a great game for you. This sadly, is not a full version. Hoping for one soon. üòä

BE AWARE. This game is still in testing stage and I have been told that there will be a wipe when they release the real version. So honestly, don't spend too many hours into this game unless you are aware of the wipe and don't mind being a champion during their beta stage. Now back to my rating and review. This game is fun and it doesn't seem like a P2W like some other pet catching or raising games.

Hello! This game is really really cool, i cant wait to the full version xD. You guys really improved! Dungeonpets was awesome but this one is gorgeus!!. I know its a demo yet and i wonder if you can add a control pad for movment? Also sometimes items spawn behind npcs and cannot be reach xD. Will this game have online battles or something like that in the future?. Anyways great game guy!! Ill stay tunned for news! =D

A lot of fun, creatures are surprisingly  adorable! Only issue is the movement mechanic combined with the maze-like environment, it gets agitating how long it takes to navigate. Would like to see a simpler "tap and go" style movement, since removing the maze aspect would make the game too simple. Otherwise I'm actually having fun with an app store game, great job guys!
description: It's time to create a team of digital monsters and prepare yourself to explore endless dungeons, solve puzzles, infiltrate evil lairs and more to protect the Dunpet World from evil Crystal Spirits. The fusion of classic dungeon crawler RPG and virtual pets has come back and evolved in a monstrous way!The possibilities have no limits: Customize your shelter and make it unique, visit the shelter of other players and fight against their teams through the Internet!The Premiere version includes:- More than 12 creatures to discover, take care of, train and make change of form.- Two levels: one of them infinite and another one to discover!- Social features: fight against other players, visit their shelter or interact with them!- Lots of items to decorate the shelter to your liking.- Much love!The new generation of the Dunpets saga, previously known as Dungeon Pets, will hit Android in winter. Enjoy the preview of this RPG with this demo of Dunpets Colors for free!
descriptionHTML:
It's time to create a team of digital monsters and prepare yourself to explore endless dungeons, solve puzzles, infiltrate evil lairs and more to protect the Dunpet World from evil Crystal Spirits. The fusion of classic dungeon crawler RPG and virtual pets has come back and evolved in a monstrous way!

The possibilities have no limits: Customize your shelter and make it unique, visit the shelter of other players and fight against their teams through the Internet!

The Premiere version includes:
- More than 12 creatures to discover, take care of, train and make change of form.
- Two levels: one of them infinite and another one to discover!
- Social features: fight against other players, visit their shelter or interact with them!
- Lots of items to decorate the shelter to your liking.
- Much love!

The new generation of the Dunpets saga, previously known as Dungeon Pets, will hit Android in winter. Enjoy the preview of this RPG with this demo of Dunpets Colors for free!
recentChanges: New GUI. New dungeon mini-game to get chromacrystals. Bug fixing. Minor adjustments and improvements.

comments: This game is really fun! I played it yesterday and I just can't stop playing it now. Although it has, and grammar mistakes here and there, the game is overall pretty good. Also, if you don't want any grammar mistakes but you also don't want make gender preference, make "he" becomes "they" and "man" becomes "someone" that's it for now, I really reccomend it to you idol lovers!

Hey, nice game and all. It has few grammar mistakes here and there, but bearable. However, the lag is never acceptable. Please do something. Btw, I noticed some 'back' keys aren't working. Can be maitained by not using it at all and pressing the phone's back key instead. If this isn't fixed, just omit the 'back' keys you provided.

Uhm first of all, it's a great game! But I will go straight to my intentions here. As we all know, many players also have problems with lag and I expect that you already fixed it but unfortunately, it's not fixed. Then, IT'S SO HARD TO GET DIAMONDS WITHOUT PAYING REAL MONEY LIKE OHMYGOD. ALSO, IT'S DIFFICULT TO WIN A CONTEST EVEN IF MY ARTIST ARE WELL TRAINED ENOUGH COMPARE TO THE OPPONENT. That's all. I hope you'll notice this and fix the problem immediately.

I'm in love with this game. The characters, the voice acting, and i bet i would love the story as well too. But suddenly the game hang after i met Jackie in GB Pub. The screen goes black and i can't do anything with this game. Please help me :(
Potentially great game but tend to freeze or disconnect, quite buggy. Overall the game has a lot of things. AFTER PROLOGUE IT FREEZES TOO MUCH. Have to reopen the game non stop.

I recommend trying out this game for the characters, features and stories. There's a lot of activities you can do. There's no random adverts popping in your face which is good. However, there's a lot of microtransactions but you can play without them so it should be ok.

descriptionHTML:
"Stars...What kind of people are they?
Dream Maker, Hero, Idol...Or some great people?
As far as I am concerned...
The only thing that matters is they bringing joy and happiness."

You are a young protagonist who just start your own entertainment idol agency.
Starting from a mini studio, and scale up your business to an entertainment empire.
Train your artists from nobody to superstars.
You will encounter artists with different personalities!
Create your own idols dream team and be the brightest star online!

[GAME FEATURES]

★Full Japanese Dubs
★Anime Art
★Dozens of Unique Characters
★Heartwarming Scenarios
★View your idols on the go

[MONETIZATION]
Freemium with in-app purchases

[SUPPORT]
If you experience any issues with the game, you may leave us feedback via the in-game Support Center.
Facebook: www.facebook.com/GBStarlightIdol.en
Official Website: www.gamebegin.com
Email: custom@gamebegin.com
Privacy Policy: www.gamebegin.com/about-privacy.html

[App Permissions Information]
In order to provide the below services, we are requesting certain permissions.

[Essential Permission]
Read and write in phone external storage: For game patch content.

[Permission Management]
▶ Android 6.0 or higher - Settings > Applications > Select App > Permissions
▶ Under Android 6.0 - Update OS version to retract permissions; Uninstall app

※ If the app does not ask you to grant your permission, manage your permissions by following the above steps.

※If there is any wrong translation in the game
Please contact us at custom@gamebegin.com and we will fix it quickly.

Thank you!

description: Enter a world of gangster games where the world seems beyond redemption. The underworld boss is back and ready to plunder. The worldwide mafia gangs are beginning a turf war. The battle is between good and evil. Vegas crime street outlaws started as a simple street brawl between rival gangs. The fighting mafia reached Chicago city making it a battlefield for extremely adventurous mafia hero. Aiming for a worldwide turf war, this underworld mafia life needs to be stopped. The police story is not helpful in finding the mafia boss and the gangs. For the love of action games and gangster mobile games, this one is going to be so much fun worldwide. Get on the assassin mission to shoot and kill mafia leaders, corrupt politicians, drug dealers, underworld local gangs, suicide bombers and terrorist. These criminal activities have transformed once peaceful town into a city of crime. Shooting bullets, stealing, robbery, kidnapping, plunder, occupy land illegally and assassination is common everywhere. Shoot to kill in this action packed sniper shooter game. Stay in a stealth mode to hide yourself from the enemies. Shoot them to eliminate crime from the society. You are going to be a top-level highly trained secret agent assassin. Operate secret agent games under cover for pure redemption. Shoot with accurate precision, before the enemy fire a bullet at you. Your government agency has provided you with the best sniper rifle gun & weapons. One of the most challenging stealth games to test your skills! An ultimate fighting mania of underworld mafias and heroes. Knock down the gang at war. Hunt down the undercover criminals serving the crime lords. One of the best action games ever of police stickman warriors vs crime in survival stickman games. In the year 1990, City of Toonville was going through a tough time due to increase in crime & illegal activities carried out by Mafia gangster. They have many city‚Äôs public sectors & private agencies in their control & the government is unable to find the corrupt personnels. The only way to reach the Mafia Gangster internal hidden structure is to gain their trust. Join them & play by their rules. Luke Davidson Stickman, an undercover government agent has been called to blend in & join the Mafia Family in the town. He has to go through several Mafia tests to gain their trust & learn their rules first. Once he has gained their trust he can then reach out their hidden bases to kill the gangster leaders. Luke Davidson has his own set of rules; he never leaves his trails behind & burns their hideouts to ashes. No one knows who is the Mafia killer man. That Mafia Godfather is curious to know who is causing their downfall because Luke isn't leaving any evidence behind. Get ready for a new mobile game where nothing is beyond redemption. Stopping the Mafia gangster outlaws might prove to be redemption for the country. The gangster clan is working for a mafia war that seem unstoppable. Hunt the crime family clan and knock down the mafia boss. Fight to survive the underworld battle for pure redemption.Rules of Stickman Killer: Gangster Games features:‚àö Stealth mode‚àö Amazing gameplay‚àö Fast paced challenging gameplay‚àö Intuitive 1st person and 3rd person controls‚àö Play as a fighter in the most challenging mission games‚àö Ultimate action packed immersive fighter assault missions‚àö Most thrilling and dangerous third person shooting secret agent rescue mission games

descriptionHTML:
Take part in one of the BattleMinibots armoured car shows – spectacular robots fighting games of armoured car and robot warriors radio-guided vehicles. These indestructible battle cars are extremely dangerous, each with its unique weapon for death racing. Create your own armoured car minibot in the garage and upgrade its properties to make it to the try-out and become a member of the mech robot wars League!

Enjoy watching steel robot fighting BattleBots and armoured car Robot Wars shows? Always dreamed of creating your own indestructible battle cars robot and building a team to take part in the death racing show? With Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots robots fighting games ANYONE can be part of robot warriors and armoured car wars game – this car battle is thrilling, and it's free!

Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!

Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:
Excabot
Drillbot
Smile minibomb
Sawbot
Nailthrower, and other machines for car battle!

Complete super mechs tasks and earn great rewards. Get improving weapons (flame-thrower, magnets, taser, saws etc), armour to protect minibot’s body. Find the best equipment for the minibot and create your own destruction machine. There are new minibots for your collection!

Fight with your super mechs on multiple battle arena locations with additional obstacles – traps, spike strips, kill saws, hell raisers, ramrods, etc. Interact with objects on the battle arena (crates, fire extinguishers) and learn how to use the traps in your favour. Earn experience points in robots fighting games and get access to minibot customization – new armour, weapons and styles for more breathtaking car wars game.

And remember: the more achievements you unlock, the better, as only the most persistent players will join the mech robot wars League. Let the car wars game start!

comments: It was fun while it lasted. I was a big fan of the first game and this one was an awesome improvement. Unfortunately my game crashed after months of playing and forced me to play the tutorial again. UPDATE: After reaching out to Pikpok customer service they reset my story progress and gifted me several leveled up weapons that help balance out what I lost. I appreciate their rapid response and look forward to playing more!

I'm currently trying to figure out what's going on with the Elite Chapter 2 (Game 13 - Blackwell Interchange). One of the five instructions is to run along 14 empty train cars. I've tried everything and cannot achieve the star. Any ideas? This is a weak link in an otherwise great and challenging game.

3 stars because although the game is fantastic in what it is, it needs optimization for slightly older devices such as my S7 Edge. I had to scale down to 720p screen res to be able to get a good enough framerate. And yes. I already tried playing on low graphics settings (in-game) before i changed my phone's resolution.

I love this game has a couple bugs. But pikpok support has gone above and beyond each and every single time I have had a prob. Especially one person Tim has personally helped me with what ever issue I was having and never not one time switch me to someone else. That man needs a raise and a promotion. So far I have had a total of 15 issue and come to find out it's my phone not the game. Thank you Tim!!!

After i reach chapter 4, suddenly all my weapons progress are gone,  then i contact the support team,  and they dont restore my previous weapons,  but they give me MORE than what i have before. üòÑ  I really happy with this,  and i really appreciate this.  You guys should try this game. This is AWESOME. Now it's time for me to kill more zombies üòé

A nice game all around. Could use a bit of a ammo buff at points. Sometimes I will hit crates and get 3 pistol bullets multiple times in one run. Would be really dope if there was a  co-op online mode (hint) üòÄ

descriptionHTML:
The sequel to the hit zombie action game Into the Dead (70+ million downloads)!

Journey through the zombie apocalypse in a race to save your family. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and do whatever it takes to survive. Maim, mow down, and massacre the Dead - anything to keep moving! In a world where no one is safe, how far will you go to make it out alive?

FEATURES:
• Evolving story and multiple endings - complete 7 action-packed chapters, 60 stages, and hundreds of challenges
• Powerful weapons and ammo perks - unlock and upgrade melee weapons, firearms, explosives, and more!
• Varied gameplay - fire from military gun emplacements, slay the hordes from atop vehicles, stab them to stay alive, or risk going after them on foot
• Multiple, immersive environments - discover different locations, from oil fields and military bases to campsites and rural farm communities
• Ever-increasing zombie threats - adapt your tactics to annihilate different hordes, including armoured and running zombies!
• Daily and special event modes - prove your skills to win exclusive prizes
• Loyal canine companions - fend off zombies and stay protected in the field

External storage permissions are required to ensure a smooth launch experience for all users

Into the Dead 2 is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

We love to hear from our players! On Twitter? Drop us a line @PikPokGames and join the conversation with #IntoTheDead

Into the Dead 2 requires the following permissions to access game expansion files:

Storage: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
Storage: read the contents of your USB storage

description: Dive into the hidden wizard world, find and catch fantastic beasts and find out where to find them. A development game for children in augmented reality, with cognitive information about the fantastic creatures of our planet.In the game Pocket Wizard GO you can feel like a real hunter on fantastic beasts. Track the creatures with the built-in radar and follow the trail. Find all the hidden magic beasts in your city!You have to look for and catch the disguised fantastic animals in the real world with the help of a radar and a smartphone camera. Move through the streets of the city, parks and squares, even inside buildings and with the help of radar find hidden beasts. You can meet a predator like a griffin or a fire tiger right at home! Or catch a huge saber-toothed or a small magic fox at the entrance! You can also meet the phoenix, pegasus and many others. As soon as you track down the fantastic beast, rather throw a red ball into it, so it will fall into your phone. Collect all the mystical creatures in your collection!Pocket Wizard GO uses augmented reality technology and requires you to move around to find wizard animals. Be careful near the roadway, remember safety!
descriptionHTML:
Dive into the hidden wizard world, find and catch fantastic beasts and find out where to find them. A development game for children in augmented reality, with cognitive information about the fantastic creatures of our planet.

In the game Pocket Wizard GO you can feel like a real hunter on fantastic beasts. Track the creatures with the built-in radar and follow the trail. Find all the hidden magic beasts in your city!

You have to look for and catch the disguised fantastic animals in the real world with the help of a radar and a smartphone camera. Move through the streets of the city, parks and squares, even inside buildings and with the help of radar find hidden beasts. You can meet a predator like a griffin or a fire tiger right at home! Or catch a huge saber-toothed or a small magic fox at the entrance! You can also meet the phoenix, pegasus and many others. As soon as you track down the fantastic beast, rather throw a red ball into it, so it will fall into your phone. Collect all the mystical creatures in your collection!

Pocket Wizard GO uses augmented reality technology and requires you to move around to find wizard animals. Be careful near the roadway, remember safety!
summary: Find fantastic beasts in real world! Catch them with of your phone camera.
title: Pocket Wizard GO: Fantastic Beasts

comments: It's an OK game. I love the Just Dance games and how they encourage us to move more, but I feel like there's lots of room for improvement on this app, more devices should be compatible. I'd like to be able to use a second phone as the screen to play on, it would make the game a lot more portable. Maybe if there was a way to use a Kindle Fire as the screen to watch? Overall my biggest complaint is it's too hard to find a device to use as a screen. I don't hate it, but I would like more options to play, none of my devices seem compatible as the screen.

Game is good as all just dance video games. Daughter enjoyed it until noticed that she had only a few dances then had to wait. There should be at least a shorter time to wait. Or some sort of option to earn more coins. Because 2 videos weren't enough. And one of them didn't work because the connection was lost. Again game was okay as for game play. But not sure its a keeper.

I like it, I use it to exercise and have fun with my sister. Only question I have is: How accurate is the kcal Burned counter? I played for over an hour and I am told I burnt 1,252 KCals. I question the accuracy of this. You update the game often, so can you put in the game somewhere the average calories the song the user is choosing to play burns? That is my biggest concern. Otherwise, no issues. Fun, easy to use. Great way to get exercise in all the while enjoying it with family and friends.

Ok really liked this more when it had a free song selection, even tho at the time I wanted more free songs.. Being able to play a song once you get the free coins 100 per day(extra 100 for watching a video)... The cost of one song on this app... Makes this app a little less enjoyable. I believe free songs need to come back, or maybe more free coins. My children enjoy this but not alot for under fives... Children songs need to cost less coins. Songs prices should definitely not be more than 100 coins.

How can I say no to this game? It's my favourite game ever. I even have all the Just Dance games (except the kids ones) on my consoles, which are Wii, Wii U and Nintendo Switch. But anyways yeah, I'd totally recommend it. Don't forget to tell your friends, your pandas, vegetables and fruit Loops about it. Happy Just Dancing! ‚ò∫

It's fun to do and this game is perfect for me because I love to dance. Dancing is my favorite thing to go when I'm bored. I love the songs and dance moves it's awesome to play and do. Thx for making this game cause now I can do more dancing and dance moves. You guys should download this game for you new people cause it's awesome to learn but in a fun way. So if you suck and don't know how to dance then you should download this game it's perfect for you if you want to know how to do simple but hard dancing moves.

descriptionHTML:
Unleash your inner Dancer with Just Dance Now!

Enjoy Just Dance's greatest choreographies without a video game console! You simply need your smartphone as a controller and an internet-connected screen (computer, iPad, Apple TV, Chromecast or Smart TV). (1)
More info on www.justdancenow.com

Dance to your favorite hits among more than 300 available songs including 42 songs from the latest installment available only on video game consoles, Just Dance 2017!

Juju on that Beat (TZ Anthem) by Zay Hilfigerrr and Zayion McCall
Let It Go by Disney’s Frozen
Animals by Martin Garrix
Starships by Nicki Minaj
Gangnam Style by Psy
Happy by Pharrell Williams
Watch Me (Whip/ Nae Nae) by Silentó
The Greatest by Sia
Uptown Funk by Mark Ronson ft Bruno Mars
I Gotta Feeling by Black Eyed Peas
#That power by will.i.am ft Justin Bieber

Enjoy the Just Dance experience:
• Instant: you can dance to your favorite songs in just a few taps!
• Social: party with 10, 100, or 1000 players if you want! You can dance with the entire world!
• Fresh: new songs and exclusive content are added every month!
• Customize: create your own playlists with your favorite songs and earn coins to unlock new ones!
• HealthKit: See your total calories burned in Just Dance Now directly on your Healthkit dashboard!

(1) Internet connection required

While the game will work great with any connection, we recommend connecting with Wi-Fi or 4G for the best experience.

STAY TUNED!
Connect with us to get the latest Just Dance news, exclusive content, and more.
FACEBOOK: facebook.com/justdancegame
TWITTER: twitter.com/justdancegame
YOUTUBE: youtube.com/justdance

It's graphics are amazing with control but the life us the problem but its OK in a game it happened but its recovering time should be more faster and videos should be available.  :-) .After one month I knew the way how to get so many cash without any payment if anyone want to know reply my comment.

I really liked this game when it had only 20 seasons & I uninstalled it after finishing. I again installed it and started from the beginning and after completing 573 games & 1487 stars I am giving you just 2star rating because game lag all the time sometimes the ads got struck or maybe during rewind I lose my $1 but the game didn't rewind back instead crash and auto shutdown and I ahve to start the application again. Before adding 30th season please update your games stability it will be more useful.

Surprised at how good this game is... very clever concept and I'm only half an hour into it and I'm already hooked! Recommend it to anyone who's a fan of football, well in fact, anyone who's a fan of gaming in general... well worth checking out, chuffed I came across it. 5***** for all features from me. The developers really did a fine job. Get it now is my advice! Peace out people :)

Would like more customisation options for my character. This game keeps crashing for no reason and doesn't like to reward it's loyal users. It is a fun game if they just let you play it. Fun game, but the gold farming and inattentiveness to what the users want will ruin it. Great game, lots of potential if taken in the right direction, but WAY to glitchy.
Like most other games, there is too much effort to bait you into micro transactions. The older games were so much better. It's a shame the Devs have resorted to such money grabbing standards.

I like the tactic aspect of it, pretty good time waster. Took me a while to beat it, but didn't have to spend a dollar to do it. The story itself is very unrealistic and after 15 seasons I completely stopped following it and focused only on the games.

descriptionHTML:
Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft!

Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper!

Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design items to make the most unique interior design ever!

Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant!

Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala!

Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!

Craft & Build
Simply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!

Play Minigames
Play minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you!

Meet the people
Use internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend!

Explore the infinite world
You can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!

Become an interior and exterior designer
Use one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design!

Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Crafting, building & exploration of Paris, the city of art & love! Creative game
title: Paris Craft: Exploration of City of Love & Art

descriptionHTML:
Congratulations! You just found out that you are an heir of a royal family! You also inherited a royal 🏰 castle located in a secret island, far-away. Little did you know, that right now the castle is in ruins! Join Amelia and her friendly 🧚 fairy Lulu, to beat FUN and entertaining, yet challenging match 3 levels, that will allow you to restore and decorate the Royal Garden, just like it was in its former glory!

Give the Royal Garden castle mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by planting 🌳 trees, shrubs, 🌻 flowers, and reveal what was hidden beneath the castle garden’s ruins! Thousands of design options will give you freedom to explore your imagination, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your royal garden dream!

👑 ROYAL GARDEN HIGHLIGHTS 👑

⭐⭐⭐ PLAY fun and satisfying match-3 levels to earn as many Coins as you can. Swap and match Critters to crush them quickly and get the Fairy Dust you need to keep building and renovating your royal garden!

🌲⛲🌼 RESTORE the scenery of your royal garden completely, building, and planting various garden decorations throughout the green and lush scenery that will play host to the best vacations of your guests lives!

🔎🏰🔍 DISCOVER the secrets of your royal family and dive deep into the history lives to understand what founded the castle. Unlock the star-studded chapters of a gripping tale. Meet diverse and unique characters, and unravel shocking, emotional truths!


Play Royal Garden Tales for FREE, with optional in-game items for purchase. Download and play our match 3 adventure puzzle game – we hope that you like it! We are working very hard on perfecting it, so if you run into any issues or you have any suggestions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at: support@touchten.com

description: This game revolves around troubled story of high school dropout descendant Gary whose sole purpose is to bully the other naughty students and his class fellows, Gary proves himself to be incredibly evil, manipulative to other students and teachers, and highly intelligent, being a bad boy he constantly reminds others of his arrogance and vanity. This game is not about shooting or fighting but its a fun game full of adventure where you will be an interesting gangster in your school and you will break all the rules of the discipline! Your mission is to behave like a bad boy bully in high school gangster, survive and escape through hard time missions. Fight and strike slender students and high school security guards to bully in cafeteria and college hallway. Sneak into the principal office stealing important confidential notes and survive your time lock in detention, sneaking from creepy teachers and authorities.High school gangster is a third person bad boy bully game where a troubled psychopath teenager is entered into the school life to enjoy humiliating other high school students and teachers. You as a third person player; Gary, has to face the bullies of the school and save his friend from beating, throw rocks and papers, don‚Äôt seek too much attention to yourself and stop anyone from complaining to the principal about your secret hunts of the crazy adventure in this gangster high school game. You have been caught into the detention as punishment for your disciplinary actions, sneak and escape from the office while the teacher is sleeping, destroying the cameras of the campus to erase any footage of your crime recordings. Be the vicious criminal in high school and get ready for some great fun of your life.Features:‚Ä¢ Includes the complete high school gangster story with extra missions, characters, hall monitors, teachers and classroom with fellow students to bully in Game.‚Ä¢ Gorgeous graphics: high-resolution textures, dynamic lighting, shadows and particle effects‚Ä¢ Challenge your friends to see who gets to bully the high school students more while competing with mission accomplishment.‚Ä¢ Intelligent touch controls with contextual buttons only when you need them.‚Ä¢ Rescue the grand combat against city high school frontline security guards & student gang wings.‚Ä¢ Create chaos in cafeteria, fight with security guards and students.‚Ä¢ Awesome classroom fever starts in high school fever by sneaking from teacher.

High school gangster is a third person bad boy bully game where a troubled psychopath teenager is entered into the school life to enjoy humiliating other high school students and teachers. You as a third person player; Gary, has to face the bullies of the school and save his friend from beating, throw rocks and papers, don’t seek too much attention to yourself and stop anyone from complaining to the principal about your secret hunts of the crazy adventure in this gangster high school game. You have been caught into the detention as punishment for your disciplinary actions, sneak and escape from the office while the teacher is sleeping, destroying the cameras of the campus to erase any footage of your crime recordings. Be the vicious criminal in high school and get ready for some great fun of your life.


Features:
• Includes the complete high school gangster story with extra missions, characters, hall monitors, teachers and classroom with fellow students to bully in Game.

• Challenge your friends to see who gets to bully the high school students more while competing with mission accomplishment.

• Create chaos in cafeteria, fight with security guards and students.
• Awesome classroom fever starts in high school fever by sneaking from teacher.
