comments: Great game if you love getting screwed, very unfair pvp. lots of programming errors don't  always get your reward, if you have money to throw away this is the game for it. The game only works if you spend BIG$$$$$$$$$$$$$$. They should be paying me for all the data they waste when monsterwood does not work. You would have to be an idiot to spend money on a game that screws you over.

They will just banned you with no grounds! I would highly recommend not spend any money in this game if they will ban you without even looking into why someone's claiming your cheating. I have never chatted or offended anyone in a chat in this game. It was very upsetting because I truly was enjoying the game until this happened.
I love this game it gives me something to do every day. Plus they always give you opportunities to earn gems, which I like to use to get as many legendary monsters I can get.

What pisses me off even more is that I keep losing trophies due to the ban. And there's nothing I can do about it because Multiplayer and it's settings were disabled. Other players can attack but I can't. That's totally UNFAIR! It's like what I worked so hard for just went to waste. Now I'm actually having doubts in continuing to play this game.
Ever since the last update it has been locking up after a win where you go to spin the wheel.  I would say 5-10 times a day.  Will rate better if this gets fixed.
Game is very fun and addicting, please make gameplay more affordable. Everything is expensive and hard to get. It's just a game after all.
description: Battle with the ultimate monster fighting force to lead them to victory in Monster Legends! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary monsters and turn them into beasts!Collect mighty monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in action packed battles. Build a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and fighting games full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Monster Master!If you‚Äôre all about multiplayer games, you‚Äôll love Team Wars, where you‚Äôll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop. MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURESBREED & COLLECT ‚Äì UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week! - Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!BATTLE LEGENDARY MONSTERS- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries.- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.STRATEGY-BASED RPG FIGHTING GAME- RPG progression to level up your monsters and power them up for the battles ahead.- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!- Set your monster teams strategically, combining  the attackers, tanks and effect monsters that work best together- Battle games will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!- Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode, earn trophies and climb up the leaderboards. The higher you are at the end of the season, the better your rewards!- Fight in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Leader! - The monsters in your Defense Team will need to be strong to protect your trophies from being stolen by other Monster Masters.- Team Wars are the ultimate Multiplayer Games: Join or start a team, build a strategy with other players and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop!- Team up with your friends, fight and measure your battle strategy and strength against other players.BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!- Build a Monster Paradise and fill it with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!- Unlock special spots in the islands, like the Library, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab!Are you brave and skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world? descriptionHTML:
Battle with the ultimate monster fighting force to lead them to victory in Monster Legends! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary monsters and turn them into beasts!

Collect mighty monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in action packed battles. Build a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and fighting games full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Monster Master!

If you’re all about multiplayer games, you’ll love Team Wars, where you’ll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop.

Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players. Start building, collecting and battling today! Monster Legends is a beast of an action game!

MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURES

BREED & COLLECT – UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT
- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week!
- Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!

BATTLE LEGENDARY MONSTERS
- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!
- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries.
- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.

STRATEGY-BASED RPG FIGHTING GAME
- RPG progression to level up your monsters and power them up for the battles ahead.
- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!
- Set your monster teams strategically, combining the attackers, tanks and effect monsters that work best together
- Battle games will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!

MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!
- Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode, earn trophies and climb up the leaderboards. The higher you are at the end of the season, the better your rewards!
- Fight in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Leader!
- The monsters in your Defense Team will need to be strong to protect your trophies from being stolen by other Monster Masters.
- Team Wars are the ultimate Multiplayer Games: Join or start a team, build a strategy with other players and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop!
- Team up with your friends, fight and measure your battle strategy and strength against other players.

BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!
- Build a Monster Paradise and fill it with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!
- Unlock special spots in the islands, like the Library, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab!

Are you brave and skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world? Find out with Monster Legends, the action RPG that will put you in charge of a monster empire!

Download today and start training your monsters!

Check Monster Legends out on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegends
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Monster_Legends
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/MonsterLegendsGame

Other great titles by Social Point: Dragon City, World Chef and Dragon Land. Check them out!

Monster Legends is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

If you love your monsters, make them smile. Drop us a nice review here!

- Elementium is precious, that‚Äôs why you‚Äôll get a confirmation pop-up before spending it.
- This version also includes new year improvements and good wishes from the Monster Legends Factory!
summary: Fight Monsters in the best RPG action game. Win PVP wars with your monster army!
title: Monster Legends - RPG

descriptionHTML:
Are you ready to play the most fun and innovative 2048 game in the market? New 2048 is here to offer you the most classic 2048 puzzle gameplay along with 12 different variations, all in one complete package!

With rich gameplay, intuitive interface, and all the functions right at your fingertips, this 2048 number puzzle game is sure to be your favorite! Get immediate access to 2048 plus game variations like 4x4+ Board, 5x5 Board, Drop mode, Party mode, and other 12 fun number puzzles gameplay!

2048 Charm Puzzle Game Features:
♥ 12 unique & advanced 2048 gamemodes in one app
♥ Keep playing for High-slcore after collected 2048 tile
♥ Classic and simple UI, smooth sliding block experience
♥ One Undo move support to adjust coolmath strategy
♥ Reset 2048 standard anytime in case you get stuck
♥ Detailed guide and rules for each 2048 classic modes
♥ Process and high score will be automatically saved

How to play 2048 Charm:
Swipe the screen to move tiles left, right, up, and down. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one! Every swipe, a new tile will randomly appear in an empty spot on the board with a value of either 2 or 4. Slide the tiles to merge them, 2+2→4, 8+8→16 ...32 ...256 ...1024..., when 2048 tile is created, you win! Play this amazing 2048 game and have fun!

2048 Charm Game Modes:
Classic Mode: Classic (4x4), big (4x4+) amd bigger (2048 5x5) board options. This 2048 number challenge mode is an upgraded version of the original 2048 game.
Click & Joy: Click the tile, the number +1 and compose a new number with adjoining tiles. Be prepared for a new super 2048 puzzle challenge for best record!
Drop Mode: Place the falling tiles to the right position. Two tiles with same number will merge into one. This is the interesting combination of 2 classic logic puzzles games: Block crush game & 2048 Ultimate.
Party Mode: Click on the adjacent tiles with the same number, all the tiles will merge into one and double its number. Explore deep cool math logic challenge for your mind!
Merge Mode: Click on the blank spot, blocks will move closer. Start playing this awesome 2048 unlimited mode, merging the numbers and experiencing the cool math logic game.
Line Mode: Slide to connect the same number, the more you connect, the higher number puzzle game score you get. Compete with your friends to see who can reach the best score.
Spin Number: Line up numbers from small to large to generate a more larger number. The longer the line is, you have more chance to win the 2048 pro magic puzzles game.
12 Legend Mode: Only the red 1 tile and the green 1 tile can combine a 2. This is an amusing 2048 mania game mode that will get your brain trained, get fun out of it and make you think.

Lots of action, thanks for fixing the bug at level 8.  A request, please lighten the background for 8 and any other levels that have spilt "milk". Grow a variety of crops on your farm near township: hay, corn, vegetables, fruits, and berries. Farm game for you to play every day.
Develop your farm to small cartoon village, cook dozens of dishes. Prepare your farm: gather resources and open up production to bring your farm to prosperity. Craft various useful things and dozens farm craft items. Plant beautiful flowers and collect them into bright bouquets. Repair steamship and invite funny tourists to nearby cartoon city, make them happy and enjoy the gifts from them.

- Invite sheep, pig, and kitty to your family farm. Add a new pet to your zoo!
- Grow trees and do apple pie. All farmers like apple pie and fresh milk.
- Experience the quiet charm of rural life and feel like a real businessman!

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Escape from the city and become a farmer. Do farming and relax.★ ★ ★ ★ ★

But that's not all! In this game you will have an ability not only to build your farm - the whole nearby city will depend on your success.

Enlist the support of your friends, and create your own distribution network, help the development of the city and provides residents with supplies and... Who knows, maybe it is you who will one day become the mayor of Farm Town! Farm Town will create your own farm story. Leave township, go to the country and do farming!

Welcome to the exciting game about the life of a villager, living near the town.

descriptionHTML:
<> is a big simulation game of ancient war. You can experience the joy of being a king.

You are a king of a kingdom. You and your people live peacefully. However, barbarian tribes start to invide your kingdom, and make people's life hard.

As the king, you need to build armies to lead them against the barbarian tribes.

Build different types of barracks to train for different types of troops. Each type has its own advantages in the battle. You can also unlock their special skills to make them much stronger.
In the battle, you should be smart, how to arrange the army is very important. A good strategy is half the battle.And, you can use magic skills in battle.

Here, abundant props, buildings, tasks, and rich stories are waiting for you to explore.
summary: Ever dreamt of being a King? Time to make it true!
title: Kingdoms & Wars

Be the world's best chef! Get cooking and serve delicious dishes! Show off your culinary creativity to impress your hungry diners, get rewarded and progress to become a real master chef!

Put on your apron and start the cooking as you get familiar with your fully equipped kitchen! Raid the refrigerator to collect your ingredients and begin preparing your favorite foods. Chop, bake, fry or BBQ, add condiments to customize and serve a perfect culinary creation!

MANAGE YOUR RESTAURANT!
It's all up to you as you learn to run your own restaurant! Welcome your hungry diners and introduce them to your delicious menu. Find the dish that's right for them, serve their order as they wanted and earn coins for making your customers happy! Will you be able to progress to master chef?

AMAZING ANIMATIONS!
Meet all of Dr. Panda's fun friends in this exciting new game. Enjoy the beautiful animations and the fun reactions! Cook up some crazy food combinations or sneak a few extra chilies on their pizza and share some giggles as they gobble it all up.

- Unleash your creativity and be the best chef in the world.
- Over 20 ingredients and condiments to choose from!
- Learn how to run your very own restaurant!
- Make pizzas, burgers, pasta and more!
- Be rewarded and level up for your culinary talent!
- Master all the different kitchen tools!
- Play at your own pace with no time limits!
- Fun for toddlers, children, teenagers and adults alike.
- Safe for kids! COPPA compliant and no third party ads
- Try Dr. Panda Restaurant 3 for free!

Educational Values:
- Kids learn basic cooking methods for different types of recipes.  
- Get familiar with different ingredients and handy cooking tools.

Dr. Panda Restaurant 3 is a free educational game for kids offering in-app purchases to unlock additional content. These are one-time purchases which will permanently unlock the content for your account. Please check your device settings for more detailed parental options regarding in-app purchases, and feel free to contact us at support@drpanda.com if you have feedback or concerns.

comments: Adorable so far, I'm so happy to see another game come out! I really like P:ure, they're so sweet and the graphics are awesome as always. Still difficult to get coins though. The  gonna take me forever to get the good ending, haha. Other than that I'm still looking forward to finishing! ‚ù§

I really like this game but, not going to lie, I had to do a lot of the 'free charging' quests to get coins so I could pass the competition with Stacey(3). It worked in the end, I've completed Greg, Simon, and P:ure's stories (I think my favorites are definitely P:ure and Greg). The only thing I don't like is having to skip through every time... but it's better than having to go through the story each time. Graphics are beautiful though and I'm considering cosplaying Greg or P:ure.

Really enjoying the game and the art. I was especially surprised by the emotional ending I received. I wasn't expecting so much depth. I would have given five stars, but as others have mentioned, there are issues with the free charge not paying out and the translations could use some more work, but the game is great regardless.

I love the characters. P:ure is so cute and Simon is precious. But Tay is extremely unlikable and Stacey is over the top rude. Like, she's annoying and ruins the game. Also, I can't get past chapter 14. It says I need to raise my value even though it states that it's not necessary.
I LUV THIS GAME!!  The thing is that I do everything to get some more cores but it won't work „Ö†„Ö† I'm really annoyed I tried so many times but it won't work! So it forces u to pay...

Ahhh!! I loved this game!! I just finished the ending with P:ure and I'm emotional right now it was so unpredictable I didn't know that would happen... P:ure will forever hold a place in my little black heart

descriptionHTML:
"I thought… it had to be you."
The story starts when you find a girl,
whose data's been factory reset.

★[Becoming a loved one from being abandoned is…]
A repair shop owner who found the girl,
Free spirit, Tay.

★[I'll give you all my heart]
A man with a golden heart,
Full of hope and expectations, Simon.

★[Because you are the only one who sees me as I am!]
A cute boy who's bold and slightly perverted.
Love-seeking, Richard.

★[Did I really see this thing… as a girl?]
His actions speak louder than his words.
A guy who denies his feelings, Greg.

★[Why are you… trying to become different from me?]
He's intelligent and kind,
But his expression is odd sometimes, David.

★[You are the most precious person to me from now on!]
An android, just like her.
His love for her is pure, just like his name, P:ure.

Jealousy
Rivalry
Desire
and…

"Love"

A story of a Girl who's learning new emotions.
Who will be her true love?

comments: Game is fun. A lot of oppurtunity to get gems if you have patience.. gameplay is really good. However too many ads.. if you offer the oppurtunity for people to watch ads to get gems then why throw in all the extra random ads that we are forced to watch? Also i sometiimes get ads appear that you cant get rid of unless you close the game and reopen it. For trhis i give it one star.. get rid of the ads and ill give it 5

Game is fun but customer service is the absolute worst! The game kept force closing repeatedly and eventually wouldn't open back up. When I finally could play again all of my progress, guns, coins, and gems were gone! I have sent email after email to the developers and they have done nothing. I lost almost $70 and I don't recommend anyone spend a dime on this game. Very unhappy customer!
I did not recieve well over 200 "free" gems they said I would get. Pretty bummed. Makes me not want to play the game anymore. Sad.

Excellent time killer.  Just one thing through Players should have a firing option choice for assault rifles from single shot to burst and full auto.  Otherwise great game  Ps.  Finished all levels, when's the next level coming up?

Usually don't"pay" for games. Made a $9.99 in game purchase, went through. Started playing gun and upgrades along with remaining gems are now gone, after only two minutes of playing!! RIP off!! Took money and screwed me!! Will contact my bank if not remedy. Theft of service!! UPDATE 3/8/18 STILL NO REMEDY FROM DEVELOPER! WILL STEAL YOUR MONEY A D GAME GLITCHES AND SHUTS OFF TAKING ANY PROGRESS! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!!

description: Featured multiple times amongst Google Play‚Äôs recommended shooting gamesA virus has brought about the zombie apocalypse, the war against zombie has broken out and people are in immediate danger of a gory death. As a survivor and zombie hunter, it‚Äôs up to you to make the streets your battlefield and shoot your way through numerous challenging levels. ZF3D is an all new zombie shooting game with excellent graphics, unmissable if you are a fan of thrillers or horror games.Keep your finger on the trigger as you try to ensure your survival in a virus ravaged world. Upgrade your skills as a survivor and zombie terminator in frontline fighting, enhance your arsenal of weapons, such as sniper guns shotgun and rifles.Fight for survival through multiple cool game modes. Test your skills in sniper missions and lead survivors to safety in support mission. Come and experience a truly immersive 3D world and excellent graphics in this zombie action game! The zombie apocalypse may have happened, but that‚Äôs no reason to just give up. Take on the role of a zombie terminator against the undead targets and shoot your way to victory over this zombie purgatory of more than 120 levels. If you‚Äôre a FPS and shooting game fan, then ZF3D is your next adventure!Stunning 3D GraphicsA horde of zombies are upon you. Will you escape or shoot your way out? ZF3 is an amazing, fully realized 3D zombie apocalypse game completed with fantastic undead animations and graphics, it is the next level in smartphone thriller and shooting games.Awesome Sound & MusicSounds effects and music will take you into the world of the first person shooter. Feel as if you were there and experiencing a real zombie war.Numerous different undead targetsChallenge yourself against some of the toughest undead on the frontline battlefield and shoot every targets in the head. A good zombie terminator won‚Äôt waste a single bullet. Innovative Gameplay ModeAcross numerous battlefields, ramp up the action with 5 boss battles, 60 sniper missions, and 2 DLG map, many support levels and regular special events.Multiple Scenes DesignFrom urban area to the industrial zone, under the subway or on the tropical islands, even to the latest snowfield are all your battlefield, so easy to become addicted to this adventure!Cool Arsenal of WeaponsIt wouldn‚Äôt be a cool shooting game without an impressive arsenal. Choose from more than 30 different guns with which to head into combat. Blast your enemies with an MP5, AK47, Desert Eagle, FN SCAR, HK 416, and many more shotguns and rifles! Let alone various props like adrenaline and grenade. Get your trigger finger ready, the undead must be eliminated.Weapon Upgrade SystemUpgrade weapons in your arsenal, increase their power, range, firing rate and more to take down stronger zombies. You can even equip them with awesome decals! Upgrade your firepower and survive the zombie apocalypse!Special EventsTake part in special in-game combat and sniper missions to win gold, coins and other prizes!Take part in the fight to rebuild cities and civilizations following the outbreak of the virus in the latest action packed horror game FPS from FT Games!
descriptionHTML:
Featured multiple times amongst Google Play’s recommended shooting games
A virus has brought about the zombie apocalypse, the war against zombie has broken out and people are in immediate danger of a gory death. As a survivor and zombie hunter, it’s up to you to make the streets your battlefield and shoot your way through numerous challenging levels. ZF3D is an all new zombie shooting game with excellent graphics, unmissable if you are a fan of thrillers or horror games.
Keep your finger on the trigger as you try to ensure your survival in a virus ravaged world. Upgrade your skills as a survivor and zombie terminator in frontline fighting, enhance your arsenal of weapons, such as sniper guns shotgun and rifles.
Fight for survival through multiple cool game modes. Test your skills in sniper missions and lead survivors to safety in support mission.
Come and experience a truly immersive 3D world and excellent graphics in this zombie action game! The zombie apocalypse may have happened, but that’s no reason to just give up.
Take on the role of a zombie terminator against the undead targets and shoot your way to victory over this zombie purgatory of more than 120 levels. If you’re a FPS and shooting game fan, then ZF3D is your next adventure!
Stunning 3D Graphics
A horde of zombies are upon you. Will you escape or shoot your way out? ZF3 is an amazing, fully realized 3D zombie apocalypse game completed with fantastic undead animations and graphics, it is the next level in smartphone thriller and shooting games.
Awesome Sound & Music
Sounds effects and music will take you into the world of the first person shooter. Feel as if you were there and experiencing a real zombie war.
Numerous different undead targets
Challenge yourself against some of the toughest undead on the frontline battlefield and shoot every targets in the head. A good zombie terminator won’t waste a single bullet.
Innovative Gameplay Mode
Across numerous battlefields, ramp up the action with 5 boss battles, 60 sniper missions, and 2 DLG map, many support levels and regular special events.
Multiple Scenes Design
From urban area to the industrial zone, under the subway or on the tropical islands, even to the latest snowfield are all your battlefield, so easy to become addicted to this adventure!
Cool Arsenal of Weapons
It wouldn’t be a cool shooting game without an impressive arsenal. Choose from more than 30 different guns with which to head into combat. Blast your enemies with an MP5, AK47, Desert Eagle, FN SCAR, HK 416, and many more shotguns and rifles! Let alone various props like adrenaline and grenade. Get your trigger finger ready, the undead must be eliminated.
Weapon Upgrade System
Upgrade weapons in your arsenal, increase their power, range, firing rate and more to take down stronger zombies. You can even equip them with awesome decals! Upgrade your firepower and survive the zombie apocalypse!
Special Events
Take part in special in-game combat and sniper missions to win gold, coins and other prizes!
Take part in the fight to rebuild cities and civilizations following the outbreak of the virus in the latest action packed horror game FPS from FT Games!

comments: I enjoy this game, but it is a bit frustrating. Some levels you have to click on something several times before it'll allow you to pick it up. Nice game.. A must check out for people who love escape games.. Sometimes real hard logic required and sometimes its simplest of things The best thing about game is that it has 301 levels.. So this doesn't ends soon.. You have lots of level to play The bad thing is that you cannot play the game unless you have internet connection on.. It dowloads graphics from server.

Love the game! Can get a bit tricky, and sometimes you have to click on things multiple times before they work. Wish there was an easier way to get hints. But overall, so much fine and a great way to pass the time!

At first i thought it was offline but no. Im in door 4 and i cant open it without internet. I like the graphics and the game itself but i hate the fact that you need internet everytime you launch a level. I enjoy it a lot but needs internet connection. They fool us to think its offline. This is the best puzzle game but i hate when it needs an internet connection. I think i need to find some games that is offline..

It was a great game. I definitly got confused on some parts but finally got through it. The only thing that I would say that I didn't like is that you have to drag the object to other things like trying to unlock something. I understand dragging the object when you are putting something together but not other things. over all it was a good game I'm going to have to rate this one as 4.

A little Hard to play on phone . Lots of tapping sometimes items tapped on is not picked up right away. For the most part it's fun and addictive requires you to really problem solve to figure out some puzzles. If you like a challenge you love this game. Love this game

description:
Wish there was a new way to throw yourself into the world of lolcats, quickmemes and well, those real internet LOLs?! Then look no further than Trollface, the new game from the makers of the enormously popular and hilarious Trollface Quest games. Get ready to ROFL!Based on one of the most hilarious internet memes of all time, you‚Äôll take on the role of the trollface meme in this new point and click adventure. Use your mouse to explore your surroundings, and click ALL THE THINGS!Jam-packed with level after level of jokes, brain-scratching quests and challenges, you‚Äôll need to overcome the trolls, summon your inner-coolface and be a real trolling genius to advance.
Each level presents you with a troll picture and a whole new challenge that you‚Äôre going to have to click your way through. Providing hours of fun, you‚Äôll need to remember that old mantra: if at first you don‚Äôt succeed, try again! Clicking the wrong item will mean you fail the level.
 In this brand-new, downloadable trollface game, you‚Äôll need to dive into each level in search of something to click. Different items have different effects but only the right items will let you proceed to the next level. Think you‚Äôve got the right troll faces to make it to the end?
 If you‚Äôve played games like Trollface Quest 4: Winter Olympics or Trollface Quest 5: World Cup 2014, we guarantee you‚Äôre going to ROFL and fall in love with this one. Now available to download on Android, this is a brand-new trolling click and point quest with new challenges. Will you troll or be trolled? There‚Äôs only one way to find out.
So, think you know your lolcats from your advice animals? Know all the jokes and memes on the internet? Then put on your best trollface and set out on the most LOL-worthy adventure on the internet!

description: Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
descriptionHTML:
Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.

* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.

* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.

* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.

* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.

* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.

* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.

* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.

* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.

* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.

comments: Horrible. Cant play without being killed by the chinese players repeatedly. They continue to update and make it harder for everyone else. Cant shield or teleport during certain times, and can only defend with small number of troops.
This game used to be good and they they set limitations on how free to play players can advance with hard work instead of spending money making it alot harder than it was in the past.
Translated dialogue from japanese, sometimes freezes android screens. If downloaded for anime wifus not really worth.

This game is absurdly pay to win, requiring spending in the hundreds of dollars at the very least in order to remain on par with the upper levels of a given server. Because of the rng of some key elements of the game (notably, equipment) even with enormous amounts of money spent (we're talking in the thousands here) you can still be utterly unable to compete with the top players in any meaningful way. Beyond that, balance in general is poor, cities are rapidly underpopulated because new cities are constantly opened, and the app itself is glitchy and prone to crashing.

Almost 2 years later and basic glitches are NOT fixed, and every update adds new glitches and a huge dowloads... in a battle game it is NOT cool for the App to crash (all the time), or have captains or troops dissapear until you restart. When an attack is 2 minuets away, you need reaction time. Don't be fooled, game is a knock off of ZombieGirls, and you will loose the money you put into this game. Developer does NOT care.. so just know this if you start playing  this game: You will suffer and loose and any hard work you put into the game will be fruitless... and this is one of the top players on server saying this. Love the game because I got hooked, but I 100% regret getting addicted and spending money.

descriptionHTML:
After we’ve seen Phil Faily test his luck on cars and motorbikes, we take a glimpse into the life of an Ancient Faily!

While hunting for some dinosaur eggs you disturb a mighty volcano and are tossed down the side of the mountain. You are forced to keep ‘tumbling’ down the mountain avoiding obstacles and hazards in order to remain ahead of the pursuing lava flow.

In this physics based ragdoll game you must manoeuvre your way through various hazardous environments such as lava, water and clifftops, resulting in a hilarious experience.

From the developers of the Worldwide No 1 Hits FAILY BRAKES and FAILY RIDER comes FAILY TUMBLER!

FEATURES
• NAVIGATE downhill as far as you can go avoiding obstacles along the way
• AVOID lava, cliff edges, man-eating fish and whirlpools
• COLLECT your glider and soar above the hazards
• DESTROY obstacles with you shield
• COLLECT coins as you go
• UPGRADE your character’s skills and powers
• UNLOCK unique costumes and gliders
• RECORD gameplay and share to YouTube, Facebook or Instagram
• ENDLESS fast paced gameplay
• ENDLESS hilarity
• ENDLESS fun!

Faily Tumbler requires permission to external storage for the screen capture and share functionality.

description: From the streets of rough Tondo comes a young man named Joaquin ‚Äúwax‚Äù Rivera: a talented but inexperienced basketball hopeful, taking his first steps towards basketball greatness.He‚Äôll face against a cast of fascinating yet hardcore ballers, all eager to challenge him in his struggle to climb up to the big leagues. Will he make it, or will his passion burn out?SHOOTOUTFeaturing a simple yet challenging touch mechanic, prepare to engage in a battle of skill against other league aspirants in the game‚Äôs Shootout mode! Take the fight to the next level by using an array of incredible skills granted by the basketball stars of Barangay 143. From superfast shots to debilitating threats, each character has their own way of gaining an edge!RANKINGRise up the leaderboards as you improve your skill, gaining various rewards and fame in your quest for courtside glory, from your humble Tondo street corner beginnings, up all the way to the prestigious stadiums!CUSTOMIZATIONAs you play the game, you‚Äôll earn coins that allow you to buy Power-Ups that‚Äôll help you even the playing field. descriptionHTML:
From the streets of rough Tondo comes a young man named Joaquin “wax” Rivera: a talented but inexperienced basketball hopeful, taking his first steps towards basketball greatness.

He’ll face against a cast of fascinating yet hardcore ballers, all eager to challenge him in his struggle to climb up to the big leagues.
Will he make it, or will his passion burn out?

SHOOTOUT
Featuring a simple yet challenging touch mechanic, prepare to engage in a battle of skill against other league aspirants in the game’s Shootout mode!

Take the fight to the next level by using an array of incredible skills granted by the basketball stars of Barangay 143. From superfast shots to debilitating threats, each character has their own way of gaining an edge!

RANKING
Rise up the leaderboards as you improve your skill, gaining various rewards and fame in your quest for courtside glory, from your humble Tondo street corner beginnings, up all the way to the prestigious stadiums!

CUSTOMIZATION
As you play the game, you’ll earn coins that allow you to buy Power-Ups that’ll help you even the playing field. Boost your accuracy, speed up your shots and even deny skills for you and your opponent if you’re feeling confident. Whatever your playstyle is, the league’s got you covered!

Bored with your current look? Hop in the game’s shop and sport some new threads! Select from a collection of fancy outfits that showcases your own baller flavor before hitting the courts!
developerAddress: Estuar Bldg. Timog Avenue, Quezon City, NCR, Philippines
recentChanges: - League duration reduced from 24 hours to 4 hours
- Skill duration is extended and can now only be used once
summary: Follow the story of Wax and help him prove his mettle on the Barangay court!

descriptionHTML:
Word Trip - Word Connect & word search game - One of the best “no wifi” free fun word connect games - made for the best brains!

Connect the letters to find and guess the hidden words and play through multiple word connect puzzles

Classic word search and word connect game, WordTrip - Word Connect & word search game is a first of its kind free word connect puzzle game where you travel through countries as you clear the puzzles. Swipe letters on the word compass to find different words. Solve the puzzles by finding all words to make your way to each country. As you progress in the game, puzzles get trickier.

WordTrip is a free word connect brain game that tests your vocabulary, spelling, word finding and puzzle solving skills, just search and find words. Get a fun brain exercise in your free time and improve your vocabulary.

If you are a word lover and like to play word connect games, brain games, puzzle games or scrabble spellings to make different words, WordTrip - Word Connect & word search is the perfect choice for the best brain game lovers like you.

How to Play:
The rules are simple. Swipe the letters on the compass to find hidden words

Game Features:
• FREE TO PLAY GAME – Download this word connect game for FREE and play without wifi
• SIMPLE TO LEARN & HARD TO MASTER – Easy game play gets you going from the first word connect puzzle and keeps you engaged for hours
• CHALLENGING PUZZLES – Free Puzzles range from 2 letter to 7 letter. It starts easy and gets tougher as you move ahead in the game
• IMPROVE YOUR VOCABULARY – Find hidden words or guess them from the same set of letters. Flex your brain muscles in your free time and improve your vocabulary, spelling skills
• PLAY ANYTIME – No Wifi? No internet? Not a problem. You can play offline too for free!
• SYNC YOUR GAME PROGRESS – You can login using Facebook to sync your game progress across various device with or without wifi

So, why wait? Play the game now and start finding words!

comments: i would have rated it higher til i was forced to start a new mission with Pooh Bear. all of my characters are having to do things not for the usual money to used to buy things i need to upgrade and expand my kingdom, they now earn Pooh bucks for the next 20 some odd days. not everyone likes to play a game that has forced side quests. i dont like some characters cost a lot of actual money to unlock. If a child is playing this and wants their favorite character, parents are having to shell out money to keep them happy. it should be either buy it or earn it.

Grafics are amazing!!! Constantly wanting you to buy gems that help you move along in the game.  You can send characters on tasks that are suppose to drop needed parts you need to advance and they rarely drop. Not sure why different updates cause the game to crash more often. But again,  when it works, the Grafics are really cute!

It was fun until it won't stay on long enough to do anything.  I have started it 6times this morning!!!  This has been going on for awhile but today crazy.. I am going to uninstall it if there is no fix soon..  I have played this game going on 2yrs.. very frustrating..it runs even worse since y The stupid update..thanks for nothing!!!!

This game is really cute and fun. I greatly enjoy it. However, the resource cost jumps quickly to ridiculous rates and there is no ability to assist friends. I could get over the resource cost if friend visiting and helping were to be added. That would make this review go from a 3 to a 5.

Awesome game. It's Disney and you don't have to stay on it all day unless you want too.lol. The only issue I would have is that it is very difficult to get some characters. I kept trying for Mulan all the way thru when she was available and never got her. Then i got treasure chests and got alot of stone dragons and no Mulan either. But I still love my Disney game. Been playing almost since it came out. Thank you for a wonderful game.

You guys need to up the gems for watching videos 1 gem is just not enough, you guys are making it so hard to collect characters, it takes months just to collect a character worth gems it is ridiculous. Also for some reason since the pooh bear update began i keep getting kicked out of game play it is getting frustrating coz i actually enjoy playing this game. It brings out my inner child

- Play with kings of Ludo Board around world..(In development)

Show your skills on the king of board games.

★ HOW TO PLAY.. Ludo 2018 (New) : King Ludo Stars.??
1. LUDO PLAYERS: Each player gets 4 tokens(4 Player): Red, Blue, Green, Yellow.
2. LUDO GOAL: All tokens must make a full round of the board and enter into finish line.
- FINISH LINE is located at the center of the board.
3. LUDO WIN: The player, who gets all four tokens to finish line, is the winner & Become King Ludo Player.
4. LUDO DICE(DIE) ROLL: To Make Move. Be Ludo Dice King 2018
5. LUDO DICE(DIE) ROLL SIX: To Start: Move Out of home by ROLL A SIX.(On dice or die)
6. LUDO COMPETITION: While moving, if other player’s token comes on the same square, then your token will be sent back home.
- Hit other players to send them home.
7. LUDO RACE: Race Ludo Players from the home to the finishing point.
- Be king of the board game.

★ HISTORY OF LUDO:
In 6th Century India, Ludo game were played by kings.
Addictive Ludo 2018 game is based on a best Ludo board games, popular in many countries with different name such as Pachisi, Parchís, Sorry, Chińczyk, Fia med knuff, Covece ne ljuti se.

Ludo in Sweden: Fia med knuff

description: The hardworking doctor never gets to rest since he is so dedicated to his work and his patients!! He is definitely the most certified gynecologist for a reason!! The reason being that he takes care of all the pregnant mommy with utmost attention!! He makes sure their emergency surgery goes as smoothly as possible!! Similarly, it is time for yet another surgery!!! This time the patient pregnant mommy is expecting triplet babies!!! She must be in a lot of pain carrying three babies together!! Help her relieve like you always do and perform the best kind of mommy care ever!! Using the best surgical instruments that you have collected from all around the world assure the safety of pregnant mommy surgery!! Triplet baby surgery is three times more hectic than a twin and single baby surgery!! Using the best of your hospital facilities and care you have to make sure that the mommy goes through a peaceful labor period and prove yourself as a worthy gynecologist. Your anesthesia has to be very secure which will assure the pain and calm mommy would go through during operation!!! The life and safety of both pregnant mommy and the triplet baby lies in your hand in these baby games!! The game follows a full surgery game simulation which also amounts to adding common biological in players!! Pregnancy operations are jobs which require ultimate focus and concentration! Mistakes can not be entertained!! The mommy must first go through some body examinations before stepping into the operation theatre!! After that and only after that must you take her for the operation surgery or things can get in a critical condition!! You need to make sure that pregnant mommy gets enough mom care so make sure that she sleeps long and well and after that she must eat all healthy foods to keep her fresh and full and safe!! Then proceed to warming her up before triplet baby pregnancy surgery officially begins!! This includes taking certain tests such as taking the blood test and blood pressure!! Then also taking her oxygen level and providing her with enough sugar level security!! After that ensure a safe anesthesia injection to give her!! After the anesthesia sinks in you must check her ultrasound to ensure safety of all triplet baby!! You must put a numbing gel on her stomach before cutting it to get out the triplet baby!! Once that is done follow the instructions on the screen and cut the stomach, then get out the triplet baby and give them baby care!! Stitch the mommy stomach and the give her baby!! This way your operation games surgery is complete!!*** HOW TO PLAY TRIPLET BABY MOMMY PREGNANT SURGERY OPERATION***       ‚Ä¢	Start game ‚Ä¢	Select mommy ‚Ä¢	Play scene by scene ‚Ä¢	Follow the finger indicator as it guides‚Ä¢	Play through all levels like that ‚Ä¢	After first round is finish you can play with other mommy character the same way ‚Ä¢	There are multiple tests before surgery, perform them‚Ä¢	Then give mommy anesthesia injection ‚Ä¢	Presume surgery ‚Ä¢	You have triplet baby at the end!!
descriptionHTML:
The hardworking doctor never gets to rest since he is so dedicated to his work and his patients!! He is definitely the most certified gynecologist for a reason!! The reason being that he takes care of all the pregnant mommy with utmost attention!! He makes sure their emergency surgery goes as smoothly as possible!!

Similarly, it is time for yet another surgery!!! This time the patient pregnant mommy is expecting triplet babies!!! She must be in a lot of pain carrying three babies together!! Help her relieve like you always do and perform the best kind of mommy care ever!! Using the best surgical instruments that you have collected from all around the world assure the safety of pregnant mommy surgery!!

Triplet baby surgery is three times more hectic than a twin and single baby surgery!! Using the best of your hospital facilities and care you have to make sure that the mommy goes through a peaceful labor period and prove yourself as a worthy gynecologist. Your anesthesia has to be very secure which will assure the pain and calm mommy would go through during operation!!!

The life and safety of both pregnant mommy and the triplet baby lies in your hand in these baby games!!
The game follows a full surgery game simulation which also amounts to adding common biological in players!! Pregnancy operations are jobs which require ultimate focus and concentration! Mistakes can not be entertained!!

The mommy must first go through some body examinations before stepping into the operation theatre!! After that and only after that must you take her for the operation surgery or things can get in a critical condition!!

You need to make sure that pregnant mommy gets enough mom care so make sure that she sleeps long and well and after that she must eat all healthy foods to keep her fresh and full and safe!!

Then proceed to warming her up before triplet baby pregnancy surgery officially begins!! This includes taking certain tests such as taking the blood test and blood pressure!! Then also taking her oxygen level and providing her with enough sugar level security!!
After that ensure a safe anesthesia injection to give her!! After the anesthesia sinks in you must check her ultrasound to ensure safety of all triplet baby!! You must put a numbing gel on her stomach before cutting it to get out the triplet baby!!

Once that is done follow the instructions on the screen and cut the stomach, then get out the triplet baby and give them baby care!! Stitch the mommy stomach and the give her baby!! This way your operation games surgery is complete!!

*** HOW TO PLAY TRIPLET BABY MOMMY PREGNANT SURGERY OPERATION***
• Start game
• Select mommy
• Play scene by scene
• Follow the finger indicator as it guides
• Play through all levels like that
• After first round is finish you can play with other mommy character the same way
• There are multiple tests before surgery, perform them
• Then give mommy anesthesia injection
• Presume surgery
• You have triplet baby at the end!!
summary: Become the doctor of mommy in triplet baby pregnancy surgery operation games!
title: Triplet Baby Mommy Pregnant Surgery Operation

comments: Great game. Annoying you can't do multiple upgrades at once though. Especially seeing as they take so long to complete, n need horseshoes to speed them up, and horseshoes seem impossible to win and wayyyy expensive to buy $$$$ fix the horseshoe prices n you'd get 5 stars from me

As many others have said, this game is very addicting! Graphics are beautiful and it is very easy to learn to play. Only thing I would to see added in the future would be bathing, cleaning stall, hooves ECT, And having to use some of your money for feed, for them and if you don't feed them, their stamina and speed go down. That is pretty complicated stuff to add, haha, but it would add some more fun to the game. I also must, say I logged into facebook and didn't get my horseshoes, I think it might have been that my phone died while I was waiting for it to load, but it says I got them and I have not.

I believe that an update of there being a free 65 horse shoes is given when the player is breeding a tier 3 or 4 horse, and that we can choose a 65 horseshoe cost for the horses in a hybrid area, and make the lady saying we need to breed a horse says to breed a horse and they give us a free 65 horseshoes and we go on from there. I hope you consider this, thanks and bye love the game!!!! ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§üåå

Just to add another side of the game so the user is not doing the same thing all the time. But as is its a good game and can b won without purchases. Great job devs keep up the good work.

Fun, easy game. You build up your horse through training and upgrades. At a certain point you can race against other players and bet on your horse. You get to name your first horse. I wish you could name all your horses. I also wish you could race all your horses. As it is once your next tier horse is ready, the lower tier horse is done.
played alot of horse racing games this one beats all. graphics are good and gameplay is easy. its a hard challenge if you dont know what your doing. would live to have more than 10 energy though

In this crazy dentist clinic hospital entertaining app, you need to take the role of best crazy dentist. Use all your dental skills to perform the fun treatment of decayed teeth. Your duty is help those poor patients and to bringing them back from shock and distress.

Features:
★ Select from 4 adorable patients!
★ Tons of different levels and activities to play.
★ Includes dozens of awesome mini-games.
★ Fight bacteria to prevent tooth decay!
★ lots of Dental tools commonly seen in a clinic.
★ Select ingredients to make your own toothpaste!
★ Superb gameplay with kid friendly interface.
★ Enjoyable kids sounds, animations, expressions and beautiful high quality HD graphics.

Team is continuously working for improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions.

comments: Waste of money. No matter what you spend you never get decent cards. They stack the odds so no matter how you buy cards you'll always get ripped off. Mom's box is supposedly random yet I've bought hundreds of boxes I've never got anything worth a damn. I've played over a year and wasted a hundred bucks on this game w no reward. I strongly recommend you don't spend a dollar on this game. It won't help. The game will still screw you. Money will not help on this game.

Such a fun, entertaining, and addictive game. I love all of these cartoons it's so cool to have them all in one game! The  Only problem is that it can run slow and it lags. But all around it gets an A +.

This game is pretty much pay to play. The only way you will get good cards is is you pay for them. They have free gems you can earn, but getting those are hard as hell too. When you try to show proof of you earning the free gems they make up excuses as to why they won't give them to you. Overall it's fun but you are going to dump a lot of money in this game just to be disappointed.

I loved this game at first played constantly but recently it messing up bad for me. Whenever I try to battle in any way it picks my cards for me and plays for me. I can't figure out how to fix it and have uninstalled and reinstalled a few times and has to start over every time which SUCKED!! Since I had a TON of great cards!! Each time the game would work fine for a bit and I could battle and be able to pick my own cards.Then one day it stopped working again and again. Super dissatisfied and disappointed.

Don't bother downloading this game.  The customer service in this game is terrible.  I submitted a ticket because several combinations i researched in game disappeared.  I got a response that the game would fix itself and my ticket was being closed.  The problem didn't fix itself and i can't remember every combo lost. I submitted another ticket and I'm waiting for a response but after how my first ticket was handled I'm not confident they'll fix it. I've only been playing a few days but if the game is this buggy already then i don't recommend downloading it.
Really good fun to begin with but then you hit lvl 6 and it becomes insanely difficult. Like they just decided to suck all the fun out of it. Shame because I was really enjoying it up until then.

comments: I wouldn't say that this bg app is difficult. It's currently limited in features. Skill expectations are low, but it's great to relax with. Love the "king for a day" feature, gives you a goal beyond just winning the current game.  It currently only supports single game mode which is fun for a quick game, but I prefer more of a challenge. So, I'm hoping that they'll add more features in the future. A 3-pt match with the use of doubling cube would be nice. Only drawback is that players don't appear to be very experienced and getting a game with a bet higher than 2600 is impossible, which makes this boring for me. Was just promised tournament mode if I update. I reinstall to latest version. Not even the promise of tournament mode now. Just lost a üåü for that. App lost another üåü. Tourney room is back. I'll be d***ed if I'm paying $5 to play it though.

comments: Intrusive ads THAT CANNOT BE SKIPPED ruined the game. Funnily enough, these ads only begin to show after they asked you to rate the game. Btw, Disneyland does not exist in the fallout universe. It should not cost 2500 caps for a new back pack when you barely make 4 caps a day. You are forced to beg (watch ads), if you want any chance of progressing. It also have numerous spelling errors, even when you have to choose language it says "engilsh".  It's clear they don't know anything about Fallout at all.

Great game, English translation needs work, but it's improving! Version 1.6f has broken a couple things. The stats section of the pipboy is filled in green, and there's a lot of lag in general now, used to be butter smooth. I know this is in development, and my rating isn't affected by these blips.

Some things that can make this game better  First, make a more obvious warning at low health, or even prevent us from doing it on accident. Sometimes I tap on reflex and get instantly killed because of it.  Second, make the early game a little easier. I find it too luck based, where not getting enough caps to buy first aids often gets you killed.

The game is great, it's fun and a good spin on the fallout franchise for mobile. The radio is a nice touch too. However the English translation is a bit off or at times missing. It's a little sad since I'm really enjoying it but sometimes get stuck behind dodgy translations.
Intrusive ads, too much rely on chances, and the hunger and thirst bar function only to travel! Otherwise, it's okay.
Some Russians attempt at a legendary game feature. UTTER SHITE

comments: Seen to many players leave because of this. Players with over a billion in chips. Goes to a small table with players having 30k or 40k. Goes all in every hand and kills the table. Players ask him why he does it and not play bigger tables. His answer because game allows me to and I can knock out player after player. Regulate players if they have X amount of chips play on bigger tables. Let the smaller players gain chips and enjoy the game.

It appears that I have reached a certain point where my free play is being met with bot resistance. I've gained over ten million in one day and lost it all and more in suck outs. This game is super fun whilst the going is good, but I fear the algorithms are programmed to entice you to pay real money, which of course you'd have to be mental to do once you realise how loaded this game is. Play for free = fun

I will give a better review when I get the chips and rewards points I paid for. Its been 3 days now and no reply email to my problem with no chips/but I paid issue. And during this time I cannot play the tables I would have been able to do so. Hurry up!!!

Need to stop people from making it impossible to win buy betting so high you can't play because they Jack the bet so high.Not fair to those of us that are trying to play a fair game.They get all most all their chips by basically cheating to rest of us out of ours.           Need to have a section that explains how some of these games are played and the rules.

Pretty much agree with most if not all the nagative reviews. And thanks to a fellow reviewer am switching to zynga poker. The amount of ads is rediculous. Let me just so no to 6 different ads in a row as soon as i log in. Ill be sure to not contact your "concierge" and move on to something better. Maybe an app that actually appriciates feedback.

I really enjoy this game .At first I just added it for one of the games on app like to gain points for gift cards.And of course to learn how to play poker. Now if their no points given for this game I would still play it. I totally enjoy this game , and the people that play it. Its truly an enjoyable game. This game is a keeper know matter what.tthe only thing I wish is that their was more coins given .

description: If you are in search for a new BMW e30 m3 drifting simulator game because the old drifting games have lack of high-quality graphics and uniqueness you got where you should.E30 M3 Drift Simulator 2018 is a drifting game with superior 3D graphics and amazing real car. This drift game has 4 open worlds maps. description: The breakaway hit Road Drivers: Legacy returns with more dynamic arcade racing road trip. Hop in the sports elite car of your dreams and race down the legendary high speed highways in Road Drivers: Legacy!Cop pursuits and shooting! Be the best!Road Drivers: Legacy is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the world. Endless racing is now redefined!Try cool cars in city!This offline racing adventure challenges you to race, speed and crash your way to victory while you protect your turf and uncover a string of mysterious accidents and deaths in the racing community.Drive via dumb cars, take a long road trip.Sport and Muscle CARSChoose from a selection of 30+ cars from the hottest manufacturers like BMW, Chevrolet, Dodge, Ford, Honda, Infiniti, Jaguar, Koenigsegg, Mazda, Nissan SkylineTry out the best game in 2017!KEY FEATURES‚ú≠ Stunning 3D graphics‚ú≠ Smooth and realistic car handling‚ú≠ Different new cars to choose from: sport cars, roadsters, muscle cars!‚ú≠ Detailed environment‚ú≠ Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.‚ú≠ Basic customization through paint and other‚ú≠ Online Leaderboards and AchievementsGAMEPLAY‚ú≠ Use steering wheel, accelerometer or game buttons to steer‚ú≠ Press brake button to slow down‚ú≠ Buy better cars to have better handlingTIPS‚ú≠ The faster you drive the more scores you get‚ú≠ When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash‚ú≠ Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cashAre you ready for the challenge? descriptionHTML:
The breakaway hit Road Drivers: Legacy returns with more dynamic arcade racing road trip. Hop in the sports elite car of your dreams and race down the legendary high speed highways in Road Drivers: Legacy!

Cop pursuits and shooting! Be the best!

Road Drivers: Legacy is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the world. Endless racing is now redefined!
Try cool cars in city!

This offline racing adventure challenges you to race, speed and crash your way to victory while you protect your turf and uncover a string of mysterious accidents and deaths in the racing community.
Drive via dumb cars, take a long road trip.
Sport and Muscle CARS
Choose from a selection of 30+ cars from the hottest manufacturers like BMW, Chevrolet, Dodge, Ford, Honda, Infiniti, Jaguar, Koenigsegg, Mazda, Nissan Skyline
Try out the best game in 2017!


KEY FEATURES
✭ Stunning 3D graphics
✭ Smooth and realistic car handling
✭ Different new cars to choose from: sport cars, roadsters, muscle cars!
✭ Detailed environment
✭ Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.
✭ Basic customization through paint and other
✭ Online Leaderboards and Achievements

GAMEPLAY
✭ Use steering wheel, accelerometer or game buttons to steer
✭ Press brake button to slow down
✭ Buy better cars to have better handling

TIPS
✭ The faster you drive the more scores you get
✭ When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
✭ Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cash

Are you ready for the challenge? Show your friends what a speed demon looks like!


Road Drivers: Legacy will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.
recentChanges: A long-awaited update with cops and shooting!
Just try it out and have fun!
summary: Play the best racing in 2017! Cop pursuits and shooting! Be the best!
title: Road Drivers: Legacy

comments: I have only played the first hour or two.  Controls: This game seems great. The sharp turns allows for skill based movement. It feels sharp and the total opposite of clunky like meny mobile games are. It's really tight controls and brilliant mechanics allow for very nice gameplay  Gameplay: I love it. Its simple and yet so advanced. The heath comeing back from hitting the same color means you need to track how you look while you move down a beautiful level. You don't need to go for score you can play casual. The more advance and tricky things you can do allows for both casual and hardcore gamers to get along with this game  Flaws: I've played and hour or two and I get the feeling it's not gonna change up that much I fear I might get bored however so far not once have I been. I also wish you could upgrade you character as opposed to changing to another as I only like the look of the first character.  Dispite this this game is brilliant so far and I hope it stays brilliant. I rated 5 stars but it's more like a 4.9 due to my personal taste in games

descriptionHTML:
Let's get started skateboarding in the famous cities in the world.
The cities are beautifully colored and you can break the colors of obstacles with full of thrills!
Compete your ultimate speed with your friends and, of course, win them over!

+ Complete the mission then receive the rewards
summary: Let's get started skateboarding in the colorful cities in the world.

description: World Connect is a puzzle game that will delight the traveler in you.Start your global tour and collect the souvenirs as much as you can. If you combine four blocks of the same types, you can discover a new landmark. Then, you can move on to the next destination.Whenever you clear a destination, you can collect souvenirs of the country. How many souvenirs can you find? Match the Blocks to travel all over the world. Enjoy your trip! ‚óÜ Easy to play hard to master. * Touch and move the blocks on the board. Match four of them together to combine them and discover a new Landmark. Can you find them all? * Move and merge as many blocks as you can. But beware each time you make a move: otherwise, you might find yourself stuck with random building blocks. Be a smart tourist and plan your trip strategically to solve the puzzle and visit the next destination. * Build a final landmark that represents each and every destination of the world, and accomplish a worldwide success and an unforgettable tour. ‚óÜ Strategies based on various items* World Connect require users to come up with their best strategy skills. Connect the blocks and rediscover the historical treasures of each country.* The swap item can change the position of two blocks of your choice supporting you to match cells better. * The bomb item completely deletes the 3 cells of your choice helping you from cleaning up the board. But try to avoid wrecking important building block though.* The upgrade items will level up a cell of your choice. Who never dreamt of building the Eiffel Tower or the Triumph Arc in a single tap?  It will ease your experience and help you gather all the souvenirs! ‚óÜ The Ultimate Matching Puzzle for the next level gaming experience * Have an enhanced experience in World Connect with mind-blowing music made by a professional. With World Connect, you will visit your dream vacation spot in a second!* Compete and challenge with your friends and families! Let's find out who collected the most souvenirs!Take the first tap on a global tour to become a traveling master! ‚óÜ Required permissions * Device photo, media, and file access: Required to load and show in-game ads.Facebook  https://www.facebook.com/Soulgitgame/  Twitter  https://twitter.com/soulgitgames  Privacy Policy: http://soulgit.com/privacy-policy/en.html Service Operation Policy: http://soulgit.com/term-of-use/en.html
descriptionHTML:
World Connect is a puzzle game that will delight the traveler in you.
Start your global tour and collect the souvenirs as much as you can. If you combine four blocks of the same types, you can discover a new landmark. Then, you can move on to the next destination.
Whenever you clear a destination, you can collect souvenirs of the country. How many souvenirs can you find?
Match the Blocks to travel all over the world. Enjoy your trip!

◆ Easy to play hard to master.
* Touch and move the blocks on the board. Match four of them together to combine them and discover a new Landmark. Can you find them all?
* Move and merge as many blocks as you can. But beware each time you make a move: otherwise, you might find yourself stuck with random building blocks. Be a smart tourist and plan your trip strategically to solve the puzzle and visit the next destination.
* Build a final landmark that represents each and every destination of the world, and accomplish a worldwide success and an unforgettable tour.

◆ Strategies based on various items
* World Connect require users to come up with their best strategy skills. Connect the blocks and rediscover the historical treasures of each country.
* The swap item can change the position of two blocks of your choice supporting you to match cells better.
* The bomb item completely deletes the 3 cells of your choice helping you from cleaning up the board. But try to avoid wrecking important building block though.
* The upgrade items will level up a cell of your choice. Who never dreamt of building the Eiffel Tower or the Triumph Arc in a single tap? It will ease your experience and help you gather all the souvenirs!

◆ The Ultimate Matching Puzzle for the next level gaming experience
* Have an enhanced experience in World Connect with mind-blowing music made by a professional. With World Connect, you will visit your dream vacation spot in a second!
* Compete and challenge with your friends and families! Let's find out who collected the most souvenirs!

Take the first tap on a global tour to become a traveling master!

◆ Required permissions
* Device photo, media, and file access: Required to load and show in-game ads.

https://www.facebook.com/Soulgitgame/

https://twitter.com/soulgitgames

description: The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! Become an admiral of invincible navy fleets in the best 3D interactive strategy game of naval warfare. Build your naval base and lead your powerful fleet into countless epic sea battles. Grow stronger by forging alliances with friends and build an empire together. Wage war against pirates, sea monsters, and players from around the globe!  Fighting for world domination now in a mobile MMO!Enter a post-apocalyptic world engulfed by the ocean and thriving with pirate activity. Command the most iconic battleship, destroyer and aircraft to destroy your enemies in all out naval warfare! Why not join an alliance for true MMO glory and battle in the ultimate naval showdown ‚Äì The Bermuda. Hunt the pirates and sea monsters wherever you may find them! descriptionHTML:

Build your naval base and lead your powerful fleet into countless epic sea battles. Grow stronger by forging alliances with friends and build an empire together. Wage war against pirates, sea monsters, and players from around the globe! Fighting for world domination now in a mobile MMO!

Enter a post-apocalyptic world engulfed by the ocean and thriving with pirate activity. Command the most iconic battleship, destroyer and aircraft to destroy your enemies in all out naval warfare! Why not join an alliance for true MMO glory and battle in the ultimate naval showdown – The Bermuda. Hunt the pirates and sea monsters wherever you may find them! comments: I'm not much of a dance gamer but I love simulation games. This one in particular is very innovative with their design and gameplay. I was skeptical of how I was going to like it at first but it proved me wrong and I immediately took to it. The controls are easy to learn and I don't even mind all of the ads. Honestly, a really great game.

The game is great, very time consuming and like the dance options to choose from when making your routine.  The only thing that I hated was the changing of the clothes. The clothes u had on from previous outfits stayed on you. For example....doing a ballet class outfit change, it kept the pants I had on from the hip hop class when I was trying to choose tights. Then I go to the hip hop closet and try to take the pants off but they wouldn't come. I had to uninstall the game bc it got very frustrating and made me not want to play it. Fix that issue and I will reinstall the game.

It's really Fantastic BUT I didn't give 5 stars because 1.spa part is damaged it makes the game freeze 2.I don't like the mascaras they're not natural 3. Why the character is very pathetic,insecure and not confident. She must be a more confident girl when interacting with others. Please consider these problems.. I'm looking forward to playing the next sequel. Thanks a lot

I get through one scene and the app closes itself. Really irritating because I get into the game after three adds finish the scene and wait for the loading screen but the app closes. If it is fixed I would love this game .
Something that keeps happening to me. I dance off with another player. And i always win. Then it does firwworks and nothing else! What is wrong with it?!
I really enjoyed this game however have to keep doing the same thing over and over just because I have to pay ¬£6 for the doctor. A big let down and kinda boring now

descriptionHTML:
Have you ever dreamed of just dancing on stage, the spotlight on you, the crowd going wild? This is your moment to compete – you’re a rising star! You've been accepted to step up and dance in the exclusive Fame Dance School - and now your hard work REALLY begins.

Your new dance school is cutthroat - you have to step up and impress your teachers AND the tough headmistress who had doubts about you since the beginning. Will you go for ballet dance or hip hop dance? You’ve got to decide and just dance your heart out in the dance studio. Choose your dance classes and master new moves in ballet dance, hip hop dance, jazz and Latin dance. But there’s drama off-stage too…Sam, only the hottest guy at dance school, has eyes on you. This could be perfect, right?! But guess what: He has a girlfriend, and no other than the cold-hearted (but great dancer) Victoria. This girl is not playing around and will compete with you to make your life a living hell, so watch out! Are you ready for a dance battle? And when the end-of-year dance school duet gets closer - the tension rises! Who will step up and compete to get the lead part, and be the ultimate rising star? Just dance in your dance classes and hope for the best. Will it be you, or...?

Features:
>> Make your own dance school choices every step of the way - build your path to being a rising star!
>> Which dance classes do you want to compete in? Pick from ballet dance, hip hop dance, and more – set your own schedule in the dance studio
>> Advance to the next level of dance classes by completing tasks
>> Rock your audition! Just dance and repeat the moves in the exact order your teacher showed you
>> Being a ballerina is hard work - practice your plies, pirouettes, and ballet dance moves in the dance studio!
>> Pick out a killer dance outfit before you compete in your big performance!
>> It’s battle time – step up and show off your hip hop dance skills in the ultimate dance battle!
>> Professional dancers need to stay fit. Lift weights, hula hoop, and bike at the gym
>> You’ve mastered your jazz technique - show off that fancy footwork in the dance studio!
>> Show everyone that you're a versatile dancer – just dance and amaze them with your Latin dance moves.
>> Uh oh, you're caught in a love triangle. It’s a dance battle for the heart… who will you choose?
>> It’s time to perfect your look! Give yourself a makeover with new clothes, makeup, a hairstyle and accessories. You’re a rising star!

ABOUT US
Crazy Labs is a casual games brand, under which TabTale develops and publishes fun and addictive games. Crazy Labs partners with independent development studios across the globe to create engaging mobile content for audiences of all ages.
Like us: https://www.facebook.com/crazylabsgames
Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/Tabtale
Visit us: http://tabtale.com/
Follow us:@CrazyLabsGames
Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/+Tabtale/posts

CONTACT US
Let us know what you think! Questions? Suggestions? Technical Support? Contact us 24/7 at Talk2Us@Crazy-Labs.com.

PRIVACY:
The app is free to play but certain in-game items may require payment. The app includes:
- advertising for TabTale and some third parties that redirect users to our sites, apps or third-party sites
- social networks links to connect with others while playing
- the option to accept push notifications to inform of exciting news (e.g. updates)
- an age-gate to prevent access to some features to protect children (e.g. restrict behavioral advertising or information sharing).
Privacy is important to us. The app may enable data collection for legal purposes (e.g. respond to support queries; enable, analyze and improve the app’s features and services; personalize content including targeted advertising). For more information refer to our Privacy Policy: http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/. Note that referred third parties are subject to their own policies. Use of the app is subject to our Terms of Use: http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/.

comments: Best game I have played as an anime geek. Just gonna put it out there, the developers and Facebook page they've created have been very helpful and accommodate most all gamers in case of game gliches. Thanks Manga Clash!  -InoShikaCho - Sunny 64

First issue: I played this game like over a year ago and it worked perfectly fine. Now I try to login on that Account again, and it suddenly doesnt exist anymore. Second issue: everytime I click on accept on the team names menu on the new account, thss game force closes... cant even play this game i loved so much. Samsung A5(2016) hope you can fix this somehow. Edit: Second issue is solved, first one still there. Maybe a help for the first one: There should be a nickname(satar2332,uki23,uki01,wolle12 not sure which one it was) with charakters on the server Aizen. Tia

So...  tried to send them a help request but I couldn't because the "Network Busy" thing. Welp..   EDIT: Okay, so now the game automatically stops. But not frequently, which is good. EDIT: Tried to send another help request bit it didn't go through. I have a strong WiFi connection and can't seem to figure out what's wrong, whether or not it's me. And yes, my airplane mode is off, I'm not using any of my mobile data and yes, I logged out and logged in multiple times but that didn't change anything, I still got the same message "Network Busy".

So I enjoy the game. Paid for not one but two failed recharges, the second purchase was because the first failed. Should've bumped me to vip5 and should've gotten the bonuses for the events for 2000 recharge and the first recharge bonuses. This wasted my real money and I'm very displeased.

Fraud company. Did a recharge and i didnt get what i paid for. Than i report it but the dev dont want to even look into the matter and just stop replying to my message. All this 5 star rating is because of the event where they ask for 5 star rating in exchange of some reward. Its actually a fun game but beware they will steal your money. So recharge at your own risk.

Like the game if it wasn't for the bs network errors and logging me out. That is the most frustrating part of the game is not being able to play it, if you buy a product you expect it to actually work.

descriptionHTML:
“We're ship-wrecked. Stranded on a deserted island. Us Orcs are frightened, we won't survive if no one takes the lead...”

Help us! Lead us! We will follow you to fortune and glory, and together we WILL conquer this dangerous new territory!

Strength and honour!

GAMEPLAY:
Orcs is based on the loved incremental / idle game concept and extends it with fortress building and quests.
Orcs is simple fun, specially if your into tapping.

FEATURES:
+Tap for wood, the faster you tap the more boni you get.
+Upgrade your axe and orcs, and increase your revenue stream.
+Build your fortress, unlock new features as you go.
+Level up your Orc squad, to become stronger.
+Send them on quests to conquer, make new friends and drive the story along.

If you were looking for a well crafted idle game with that extra touch, look no longer you found it.

Do you have a burning question? Leave us a message!
