comments: LOVED the game. It's fast paced, addicting and has great graphics. The only thing I wish it had was stats on profits and production. I always lost track on the update too. It would be extremely rad if they added a little slot on the screen for that. But overall amazing game and would rate 5 stars if they added those !üëå

Changing my review because after this newest update I haven't received any gold bars for daily logins and cannot find my free crate. The weed leaf has an exclamation point but nothing when i click on it. Bot very happy and i have played for a long time.

PROBLEM! PROBLEM! PROBLEM! PLEASE HELP! As I open the game it tells me I HAVE to update to version 2.0.7! That's ok, but when I hit the "Update" button, it takes me to the PlayStore page with only the option to uninstall or open........there is no UPDATE button to complete the process. Please help me! It is a fun game, if I could get back to it to play!

His rating because I've had great customer service, but today a new issue! I'm getting the same update message as a fellow reviewer, and after I updated, I opened it... Guess what? It tells me I have 2.0.6. yet I need to update to 2.0.6. I'm sure you all see the dilemma? I have the version they say I need to update to, that said I click update... Playstore says... Unintall or open... I love 5he game fix it please

Simple game. Love that i can set it up to still collect while I'm at work. Hate that you have to watch so many ads, but at the same time glad i don't have to spend money in the game to get far. All in all, 4 out of 5 stars from me

This game is a fun time killer and also highly addictive. I would rate higher, but as of lately I haven't been getting jars from videos and my profit per sec9nd went down to 24aa with the lights and a tournament boost from 107aa just with lights.

description: This time gear up for a shooting game adventure like never before!! This comes with the biggest battle between military and its soldiers again the terrorist enemy!! You must counter your team against the evil attacks of the enemy who are trying to put and throw you down mercilessly!! This game is a do or die situation and you must be very aware in concentration!!Enemy can be in any corner just make sure to keep your head and eyes in the game!! Since this is a shooting target game you have to keep your eyes on the target precisely in any way since as told before, they are hiding for their survival as the hunter preparing for assassination and attacking!! You and your military team is unsafe from all angles!! Keep your weapons and your shooter sniper guns prepared at all instances to fight against the terrorist attack at any point in the game!!Your team is dependent on orders from you. One wrong move and the entire survival team may go down and lose to terrorist and we cannot let that happen at all!! Keep your guns loaded and if they finish reload again!! Be prepared for shooting at all instances!! Target shooting is the goal of this fighting game!! This is an online shooter war where everyone is a hunter for the sake of their survival and their pride!! These war games require constant alerting from the military soldiers in order win and counter against the terrorist attack with their shooter sniper!! You must destroy the enemy in this assassination gun games!! This is exactly what the shooting game requires!! This is a terrorist attack and battle, remember that!Their purpose is to spread terror and your survival team as the military soldier can not let that happen at all costs for it may be disrespectful to your teams pride!! Shooting games must require ultimate focus and concentration!!Once you start the game you‚Äôll be landed on the war simulator plain setting!! The action begins straight away so run to the rescue!! Using onscreen controls find places to hide and locate your enemy!! As soon as you locate a terrorist enemy target began shooting game!!! Remember, if the terrorist attack enemy outnumber your military team you will lose and may have to repeat so keep an eye on when you‚Äôre using your sniper to attack the enemy!! Don‚Äôt shoot your own team member!! That is also important to keep a note off!! Don‚Äôt let the enemy terrorist get to you and take them over before they get a chance to exploit your team!!*** HOW TO PLAY COUNTER TERRORIST ATTACK SHOOTER SNIPER MISSION ***‚Ä¢	Begin the game ‚Ä¢	Select team ‚Ä¢	Select sniper gun and weapons ‚Ä¢	Get into the battle ground ‚Ä¢	Follow the navigation to look out for the target‚Ä¢	Once spotted, begin target shooting ‚Ä¢	Avoid being shot by the enemy‚Ä¢	Keep team members safe ‚Ä¢	Keep in touch with team members and inform them about enemy on the rise ‚Ä¢	Win against enemy using weapons and counter their shooting *** FEATURES OF THE GAME COUNTER TERRORIST ATTACK SHOOTER SNIPER MISSION ***‚Ä¢	Shooting simulation ‚Ä¢	3D graphics ‚Ä¢	Gun sounds‚Ä¢	Thrilling game play
descriptionHTML:
This time gear up for a shooting game adventure like never before!! This comes with the biggest battle between military and its soldiers again the terrorist enemy!! You must counter your team against the evil attacks of the enemy who are trying to put and throw you down mercilessly!! This game is a do or die situation and you must be very aware in concentration!!

Enemy can be in any corner just make sure to keep your head and eyes in the game!! Since this is a shooting target game you have to keep your eyes on the target precisely in any way since as told before, they are hiding for their survival as the hunter preparing for assassination and attacking!!

You and your military team is unsafe from all angles!! Keep your weapons and your shooter sniper guns prepared at all instances to fight against the terrorist attack at any point in the game!!

Your team is dependent on orders from you. One wrong move and the entire survival team may go down and lose to terrorist and we cannot let that happen at all!! Keep your guns loaded and if they finish reload again!! Be prepared for shooting at all instances!! Target shooting is the goal of this fighting game!!

This is an online shooter war where everyone is a hunter for the sake of their survival and their pride!! These war games require constant alerting from the military soldiers in order win and counter against the terrorist attack with their shooter sniper!! You must destroy the enemy in this assassination gun games!! This is exactly what the shooting game requires!! This is a terrorist attack and battle, remember that!

Their purpose is to spread terror and your survival team as the military soldier can not let that happen at all costs for it may be disrespectful to your teams pride!! Shooting games must require ultimate focus and concentration!!

Once you start the game you’ll be landed on the war simulator plain setting!! The action begins straight away so run to the rescue!! Using onscreen controls find places to hide and locate your enemy!! As soon as you locate a terrorist enemy target began shooting game!!!
Remember, if the terrorist attack enemy outnumber your military team you will lose and may have to repeat so keep an eye on when you’re using your sniper to attack the enemy!! Don’t shoot your own team member!! That is also important to keep a note off!!

Don’t let the enemy terrorist get to you and take them over before they get a chance to exploit your team!!

*** HOW TO PLAY COUNTER TERRORIST ATTACK SHOOTER SNIPER MISSION ***
• Begin the game
• Select team
• Select sniper gun and weapons
• Get into the battle ground
• Follow the navigation to look out for the target
• Once spotted, begin target shooting
• Avoid being shot by the enemy
• Keep team members safe
• Keep in touch with team members and inform them about enemy on the rise
• Win against enemy using weapons and counter their shooting

*** FEATURES OF THE GAME COUNTER TERRORIST ATTACK SHOOTER SNIPER MISSION ***
• Shooting simulation
• 3D graphics
• Gun sounds
• Thrilling game play
summary: Prepare to fight against terrorist enemy as military soldier in shooting games!
title: Counter Terrorist Attack Shooter Sniper Mission

comments: I bought the Premium offer because it was very cheap and I consider the developer really deserves it.  This game is amazing. Not because of the realism but of the fun. There should be implemented new more levels because we really need them. The game is fun and amazing! I don't regret spending one dollar for it. Really recommend it!

Ok at the start. Slows down and gets laggy at inappropriate times. Such a shame that such must related to the name of the game. Without the creases, it would have a 5 star rating. Still, well done for the general concept. I don't know about the long term progression in the game, let alone that of a following one, but expected to see some graduation process. Trousers, T shirt, shoes, Shirt, briefcase, blazer, glasses, etc. I'll carry on to wait and see.

The game is great.  Except it gets very laggy after a while. I did like the 5 lives and then 9 minutes between plays because this game is  easily time consuming.  Says me who bought the paid version lol

Might as well call it Drunk Life. The physics are off just enough that at key points of the game the hero just rag dolls and dies horrifically. That uses up your 3 lives and your forced to wait or watch an ad or pay for premium. That's pretty lame and I just end up closing the game. Not interesting enough to wait for 10 minutes to play again.
Good game, needs more levels. It has told me several times that I unlocked a new hero but when I went to pick one they were all still locked.

The game itself is good but it's ruined by the forced videos or pay to play. Just list the game for a dollar or 2 and you'll sell plenty. But because of your tactics I'm not going to pay, I'll just move into a better game.

comments: Too scary man. Awesome game! Finished it in hard mode, was worth downloading. Scariest character - Granny. She just runs after you like a freak.  A very deep story and really enjoyed it. Best in the series. Well done, DVloper!

I just love  Slendrina Series, and played almost all games, but I would appreciate this game, if it was a little easier. It's easy, but most frustrating thing is , that slendrina's mother bothers a lot, she comes after each second, and doesn't leave me. We even don't get the chance of visiting houses and finding keys. You just run and run from her and she keeps following you. Please make Slendrina's mother patient,  and a little tired so she don't keep following you. It will be a pleasure to me if you just listen to my opinion, and upgrade the game with easy gameplay. Also, it would be better for me if you please reply to my comment. Please pay a little attention to what I am saying, and keep making new Slendrina games. I would be really grateful, if you just listen to me. This is the best horror game series I have ever played, I love it. Slendrina series is best ever. Must download any of the games from DVloper. And a big thanks to DVloper, for such amazing games. Love you!
The dumbest and most boring game ever. Could give you hints where the keys are. Don't even bother downloading it
It could be a lot better.If you die you have a extra life if you watch a advert....But never any adverts available. So you have to start again...I give up.Uninstalled
Think I was gud game had no issues finding objects . Mother a bit annoying but hey all games need a challenge
It was awesm game  loved to play it...very scary it give heart attack when slendrina comes closer to u Nd granny does not give a time to breathe hhhhhhhhN but whatever its awesm

descriptionHTML:
It's time again with a new scary adventure with Slendrina.
This time it will be your mission to find out the dark secret that hides in the dark forest.

You need to find some keys and tools to succeed.
And as always, watch out for Slendrina and turn around as soon as you see her.
You must also be careful so you do not face Slendrinas mother.

If you want to send an email to me, please write in English or Swedish.
Thank you all for your kind ratings you have given me! You are the best!

The game is free but it Contains advertising.

Good luck!
summary: Another scary game in the Slendrina series.
title: Slendrina: The Forest

description: ** Winner of 5 Webby Awards - Draw a Stickman Franchise **** Played over 100 Million Times around the Globe **Grab your pencil and get ready for the most creative DRAW A STICKMAN adventure yet, with the first 3 levels FREE! Imagination is the key, as you enter a magical storybook land full of mystery and wonder, unusual creatures and enigmatic puzzles!  Create your own original stickman and then watch it come to life in DRAW A STICKMAN: EPIC 2!  Challenge yourself to unlock every secret, collect every drawing and share your creativity with the world!BRING YOUR DRAWINGS TO LIFE!Unleash your creativity as you draw a Stickman from your own unique perspective, and then watch your animated Hero come to life before your eyes!  Make every idea a reality by saving unlimited drawings in your Sketchbook, and sharing them with friends!A NEW STORYEmbark on a perilous journey through time!  Draw your Stickman and create a friend!  But be warned‚Ä¶.disaster falls upon your ally!  It‚Äôs up to you to become the hero! Maneuver your way through the magical world of EPIC 2 in a quest to save your partner!YOUR DRAWINGS MATTERCreate and save unlimited drawings in your sketchbook!  Use them throughout your adventure!SHARE AND RECEIVE DRAWINGS WITH FRIENDSWith the new share feature, you can now send your creations to your friends!  They will then be able to use your drawings in their own epic adventures!  FIGHT EPIC BATTLESFace off against inked-out goblins, tongue-lashing frogs, fire-breathing dragons, and BIG bosses!  You must use your own strategies to solve intriguing challenges and puzzles, while battling all new villains!Jump in to this action-packed adventure that allows for endless creativity! As you explore each colorful environment, choose from an assortment of drawing pencils and tools to help you successfully overcome every obstacle along the way.New features and enhancements allow you to choose from a larger color palette, along with a variety of pencil sizes.  With the new share feature, send your drawings to your friends!  Unlock hidden Color Buddies, locate puzzle pieces, and enjoy new drawing pencils for Wires, Eggs, and Ice! This is an experience like no other, personalized by you!DRAW A STICKMAN: EPIC 2 is the sequel you‚Äôve been waiting for and is sure to offer hours of entertainment to avid gamers and creative minds alike!
descriptionHTML:
** Winner of 5 Webby Awards - Draw a Stickman Franchise **
** Played over 100 Million Times around the Globe **


Grab your pencil and get ready for the most creative DRAW A STICKMAN adventure yet, with the first 3 levels FREE!


Imagination is the key, as you enter a magical storybook land full of mystery and wonder, unusual creatures and enigmatic puzzles! Create your own original stickman and then watch it come to life in DRAW A STICKMAN: EPIC 2! Challenge yourself to unlock every secret, collect every drawing and share your creativity with the world!


BRING YOUR DRAWINGS TO LIFE!

Unleash your creativity as you draw a Stickman from your own unique perspective, and then watch your animated Hero come to life before your eyes! Make every idea a reality by saving unlimited drawings in your Sketchbook, and sharing them with friends!


A NEW STORY

Embark on a perilous journey through time! Draw your Stickman and create a friend! But be warned….disaster falls upon your ally! It’s up to you to become the hero! Maneuver your way through the magical world of EPIC 2 in a quest to save your partner!


YOUR DRAWINGS MATTER

Create and save unlimited drawings in your sketchbook! Use them throughout your adventure!


SHARE AND RECEIVE DRAWINGS WITH FRIENDS

With the new share feature, you can now send your creations to your friends! They will then be able to use your drawings in their own epic adventures!


FIGHT EPIC BATTLES

Face off against inked-out goblins, tongue-lashing frogs, fire-breathing dragons, and BIG bosses! You must use your own strategies to solve intriguing challenges and puzzles, while battling all new villains!


Jump in to this action-packed adventure that allows for endless creativity!


As you explore each colorful environment, choose from an assortment of drawing pencils and tools to help you successfully overcome every obstacle along the way.


New features and enhancements allow you to choose from a larger color palette, along with a variety of pencil sizes. With the new share feature, send your drawings to your friends! Unlock hidden Color Buddies, locate puzzle pieces, and enjoy new drawing pencils for Wires, Eggs, and Ice! This is an experience like no other, personalized by you!


DRAW A STICKMAN: EPIC 2 is the sequel you’ve been waiting for and is sure to offer hours of entertainment to avid gamers and creative minds alike!
summary: Get ready for the most creative DRAW A STICKMAN adventure yet!
title: Draw a Stickman: EPIC 2 Free

comments: It's a beautifully made game with a good story line involved. Sure it can be pay to win and all that, but nothing that a bit of hard work can't catch up to.  The controls are easy enough to understand and the combat system is just as simple. It does offer a few unique things such as the shared resource for bigger and better attacks, but it only adds to the depth of the combat system. All in all it's a good game and well thought out.

I used to love this game hence  I moved to the English server... having played on the Chinese server, I noticed the drop rate for this server is super low. Also the packages in the game ate way overpriced. Some skins in the Chinese server are free (ie moonlight blossom yuki onna) whereas in NA server you have to pay to get it. Honestly if the playing field is equal between the NA and the Asia server were equal, I'll stay in the NA server. Right now I'm going to move back to the Asia server even tho I can barely read the story.

I love absolutely everything about this game. Its perfect...accept for one very big detail. Sadly, the characters that have unique and strategic skills are amazingly fun but will never amount to anything in pvp. The good characters are all too easy to play with and it becomes dull due to the lack of thought it takes to win. PVP is a disaster in gameplay and matchmaking. Otherwise, this game is very good.

I loved the game when I played the beta. Turn based rpg with different parables within the story mode. Unique unit designs. I cant get very far with the game because the audio echoes itself to the point where its almost hard to understand what is happening. Its a good thing there is subtitles. The game prides itself on its audio aspect by recommending "use earphones for best experience" before starting, and I would really love to hear the game.

i really liked the game it has everything to be best game. But dont be soo greedy. please make some more events and make some balance in duel or whatever because of course i cant win against someone like 45lvl when I'm 30 no? And the summoning rate is low mystery amulets are only one for a week lol i think it will take 10 years to get ssr for me. I dont want to leave this game please make something thanks you.

I've played a lot of turn based strategy games and mobile apps. I'm convinced nothing out there right now beats this game in style, gameplay mechanics and rewarding the player for their efforts. Just an incredible game with amazingly small things that go a long way. The big things they do even more so. I encourage everyone to try this game out. A sheer masterpiece in my eyes

descriptionHTML:
Google Play Best of 2017: Most Competitive Game

200+ million downloads smash hit now available worldwide!

Background:
In a time when demons and humans coexisted… Evil spirits from the underworld have begun a quest for power, strength, and dominance. The balance between the two worlds is now in jeopardy.
Fortunately, there's a group of gifted humans who can read the stars and draw amulets. They have the power to connect the two worlds, and even tame the spirits. They are willing to lay everything on the line to maintain peace and order between the two worlds. They are known as Onmyoji.
The gate to this magical world of spirits and beauty will now open for you…


Features:
■ Clash with real players worldwide in strategic turn-based battles.
■ Customize your team to become the ultimate Onmyoji.
■ Summon powerful spirits called “shikigami” to fight by your side.
■ Hundreds of shikigami to discover, each with their own unique skills, skins and side stories.
■ Team-up with your friends and guild mates to battle epic bosses and win awesome rewards!
■ All-star voice cast, featuring Rie Kugimiya, Jun Fukuyama, Miyuki Sawashiro, Tomokazu Sugita, Yuki Kaji and more!
■ Breathtaking soundtrack written by legendary composer Shigeru Umebayashi.

description: Real Air Combat War: Airfighters Game  You‚Äôre an air force fighter pilot and participating in air combat war. You‚Äôre going to air battle mission and your duty is to eliminate all the fighter aircraft of the enemy. Perform the aerobatics to dodge the enemy air planes. There are many fighter helicopters and fighter jets ready for air attack against you. This sky fighter game is a modern flight simulator game in all spitfire plane games, air combat war games and air war games. Prove that you‚Äôre the real airborne fighter pilot hero of air strike games and air combat fighter games of all air force games. In Real Air Combat War: Airfighters Game you‚Äôre fully ready to attack on the aircraft carriers, fighter jets, helicopters and all fighter planes of your enemy. Real Air Combat War: Airfighters Game  This air combat air war is a full action packed air battle game. Everyone likes air fighter games and enjoys the fun of air fighter combat using airplane shooting games. This dog fight combat flight simulator is a complete war birds, war fighter and aircraft game. Attack on the enemy‚Äôs warplanes with your fighter jet and air fighter thunder planes finish your air battle mission. Fly your best gunship helicopter for assault air combat war. Huge variety of different air combat fighter jets for brand new battle war missions with different air attack helicopters. Use your fighter aircraft flying skill and become a real air attack hero of this passionate air battle and air combat war game. Real Air Combat War: Airfighters Game  In this arcade flying jet fighter game enjoy realistic and stunning war field and battle field environment with amusing thunder air crafts roaring sound effects. Enjoy the thrilling warplane game missions and use wide range of latest missiles for air attack. In Real Air Combat War: Airfighters Game you are fully loaded with ammunition, armors and different missile systems. This air force game has realistic air fighter games physics for air combat war. Choose different fighter jets before going to air war for air attack on enemy aircraft carrier. This dogfight has real gunship battle with full of supersonic missiles to finish your enemy. comments: Lots of fun,(design + simulation of your tank + real physics).   One thing I need is to control the motor separately.   Example  if my hangar has two 2*5 tread(not linked with one to one) placed with two separate engine if I push forward both the tread are moving forward.I need to control both the tread separately one moving forward and another one backward

Personally I think it's to limiting for a free to play title. I enjoyed the game play it was simple enough. But it forces you to watch adverts or pay money to get fuel. It doesn't regenerate like every other fuel in every other free to play game. I played till the fuel run out, watched several ads, run out of that too and couldn't play no more till the following day when I could watch more adverts. Sorry that's a poor system and one I won't be spending any more time or money on.

Absolutely wonderful. No complaints whatsoever. Not pay to win at all, and the gamplay is seamless, graphics engine is amazing, and attention to detail is on point. Even to the smallest things, like how your soldiers look happy when you win a battle! To be honest, i (previously) never had a game on my phone for much longer than a few weeks, but ive had STR for several months! IF YOU GET THIS GAME: STAY WITH IT! The higher level you become, the slower thing start to progress, but trust me! The game is still great! There really are just so many low level players because people get rid of this game once they dont level up as often. So all things considered,the only negative is the player/level count.

This is a very well made game and has a neat concept to it. The major game breaking issue is the fuel cost and the time it takes to regenerate. You can burn all your fuel within 5 minutes of play, then you can watch 5 ads per day for 5 minutes more of play. You have passive fuel that builds up but it is so slow it will only generate ~20 minutes more a day. So 30minutes a day non consecutive play without dumping cash into the game over and over breaks this otherwise good game for me.

Good game except the the oil usage to gain  ratio is a little steep. Maximum oil is like 1000 and each battle costs 100 with relatives costing 200. And an oil generator that only produces a small amount. Need to have a better way to get that go go juice

üò± OMG this game is so haunted slendrina X is a very Gud game I had also played the all parts of slendrina but when I played slendrina X i was so scared to play ND yeah I m very excited for the next part. Plssss DVloper don't end the slendrina series Plss make the new series of slendrina..
I love the change in mechanics used in this game. We get to fight? Amazing. DVloper, do not stop what you're doing.

Astounding game play. It's not impossible to beat and not so easy that when you finish it, you get no satisfaction.  Perfect balance of challenge and accessibility to all gamers. And it's free. Wow, just wow. Thank you Dvloper, what a fun ride! Tips for other players: don't get caught up on what you can't interact with, be patient and explore the whole castle, because to finish it, you will need to be familiar with every floor and every hiding spot. Get familiar with the enemies too; time your encounters, because what kills you the most is when Slendrina ambushes you after you've just finished dealing with her husband or the pets. Entering a room re sets Slendrina's spawn counter, so don't get too surprised when you see her, cross a threshold and she immediately spawns again. You can move backwards to avoid looking at her, but when she spawns, she is a TANGIBLE object, which means that if for some reason you are moving into a direction which should be clear without looking, but feel like there's something in the way, it's probably her, just waiting for you to turn around. Very very creepy atmosphere and design in the castle. Beware being blocked in the attic; don't fight anything there, because Slendrina spawns even more frequently in that spot, especially the slide puzzle, she kept doing it to me, spawning behind or next to me while I tried to figure it out. Her husband will follow you up there too, so don't get conned into a surprise threesome.
OMG!!!! I love this part but I'm very excited about the next part but please dv loper dont end the slanderena series make new games of the series of slanderena

descriptionHTML:
The Survival Hunter Games 2 is a blockbuster hit loaded with new and even better features! Download today and experience for yourself one of the best first person shooter games available on the market!


✲✲✲GAME STORY✲✲✲
We are an advanced civilization. One that has survived, and even thrived from the apocalypse. We are a world with many technical and otherworldly advances that boast the ability to open portals to other dimensions. This was done in order to study the effects of different consequences and alternate reality. It seemed to be safe enough, with all the safety precautions that were taken, but then the unthinkable happened.

After the sustainment system failed during a massive power outage, the safety shield that kept the portal from being accessed by either side was lowered, and the vacuum ripped several agents from their stations, trapping them in these alternate dimensions...

As one of these agents sucked inside the portal, you are now trapped in a dimension where the world is drastically different, and all because of a choice made by a handful of men several millennia ago. This world is a treacherous place filled with dangers at every turn. You must remain alive in this bleak world until help can reach you... IF help can reach you.

✲✲✲GAME PLAY✲✲✲
The game comes fully loaded with amazing features! Our new game interface is extremely user friendly, and boasts easy to play touch screen controls that allow you to effortlessly run, jump, sprint, reload, aim, shoot and more!

The new menu screen includes map style level select and settings screen. Gain game insight in between maps during loading with tip screens, and begin each game with mission style instructions! Before you begin your first level, you can watch a short video ad in order to earn a power up. You may opt not to watch, but you'll lose out on the advantage.

As soon as the game begins, a timer will begin to count down. If you are able to beat the level quickly enough, you will earn a permanent weapon, which can be used in all other levels! If you do not beat the clock, you can still advance through the game, just without the permanent weapon.

Fight stronger, more intelligent enemies, who make this game an intense battle of wit, stealth and skill! Enjoy hand-to-hand combat and precision aiming to take down enemies. Collect your blocky weapons and get ready to aim and shoot!!

Features:
-User friendly interface with touch pad controls
-Timers
-Power-ups
-Ammo and weapon collection
-Jump, aim and run
-Mini-map to spot your dangerous foes
-Mission orders
-Hand-to-hand combat
summary: Your mission is to survive and kill every enemy you come in contact with
title: The Survival Hunter Games 2

description: Dead or alive, save or kill. When the doomsday virus is spread to this place, you wish to become a hero to save people, or just is a prey which is swallowed by zombies? Crowds of zombies are coming to you! Lift your gun, open fire to release your fury! Fight for yourself, fight for your families and friends, fight for the humanity!!   Zombie shooter: fury of war is one of FPS zombie shooting game, you need to hunt zombies, keep alive and save the survivals. Kinds of weapons can let you hunt zombies by any way you prefer. Whether you like accurate short-bursts or like the rain of bullets, whether you like a close battle or single shot from long distance, you can feel good shooting pleasure by using different guns in this game. On the critical moment, the freezing grenade, time bomb, you can choose suitable equipment to help you to escape from the dangerous ground. There are some elements in the scene of this game can be interacted by shooting, like you can eliminate groups of zombies by shooting the petrol can, or you can shoot the item box to get random rewards.   The dreadful virus creates different kinds of zombie, there are some zombies like big monster and some others can fast moving on the ground. There are even several zombie captains can be challenged by you. Fire on their weakness, it can help you to beat the strongest zombie captain. beat these zombies, find and hunt the zombie captain, then gain rewards and buy more powerful weapon.Exciting and exquisite game graphics will make you immerse in this zombie world, pull the trigger, shoot , gain the rewards, buy new guns, upgrade equipment, you will step on the way of hero!!!Game features:Free FPS game;Exciting and exquisite game graphics;Different kinds of guns and equipment;Can switch the scope mode as you wish;Exciting zombie boss fight;

description: Slendrina is back in a new scary game!Slendrinas baby has grown and has become as evil as her mother. So be extra careful when you are running around in the cellar corridors. You must also be prepared to meet Slendrinas father. If you see him then turn around as soon as possible!Try to find 8 pieces of a key. Once you find all the pieces, you can open the safe which is in the cellar. Inside the safe there is a secret that you must take with you out of the house.You also need to find keys to open certain doorsand health injections that give you a little more health when you have been injured.If you like Slendrina the Cellar, House of Slendrina and Slendrina Asylum, then you will love this new horror game.Thank you all for your kind ratings you have given me! You are the best!If you want to send an email to me, please write in English or Swedish.The game is free but it contains advertising.Have fun!
descriptionHTML:
Slendrina is back in a new scary game!

Slendrinas baby has grown and has become as evil as her mother. So be extra careful when you are running around in the cellar corridors. You must also be prepared to meet Slendrinas father. If you see him then turn around as soon as possible!

Try to find 8 pieces of a key. Once you find all the pieces, you can open the safe which is in the cellar. Inside the safe there is a secret that you must take with you out of the house.

You also need to find keys to open certain doors
and health injections that give you a little more health when you have been injured.

If you like Slendrina the Cellar, House of Slendrina and Slendrina Asylum, then you will love this new horror game.

Thank you all for your kind ratings you have given me! You are the best!
If you want to send an email to me, please write in English or Swedish.

The game is free but it contains advertising.


Have fun!
recentChanges: 1.02 *Now it's a little easier to play on easy difficulty.
*Slendrinas baby stops chasing you a little quicker than before.
summary: Another scary game in the Slendrina series.
title: The Child Of Slendrina

comments: This game is great! Though there are things I would change about the new race mode and some things in arcade mode. For example, instead of having to pay a dollar USD to cut the rope tire, why not pay a thousand coins to get rid of it for the next 5 or 10 times it needs to show up, and have us pay the dollar to get rid of it for good. And in arcade, if you accidentally missed your reward,why not have it double the next reward rather then keep the amount the same all the time, otherwise, I wouldn't change a thing besides those two things, I love it ^^
The climbing game is the only thing I hate, it's such BS. My knife will slide and hit a branch after it went into the wood. That's not supposed to happen. But overall great game.

Not perfect but it's really good, hate the tires though, not willing to pay any amount of money to remove them. It would be better if after 1-5 thousand score on race, the tire would be removed or maybe throw a knife 10 times through the tire and it would be gone. Kinda silly to pay to  remove something that would make for much better gameplay if the player could play the game and earn it gone. (Mostly doing this for the 500 coins but this is an honest review)

Great visuals, smooth physics, and addicting Gameplay. Great game, my only thing I'd change would be the end-game knives, past 10k all the knives kinda suck, and have awful 'flipability', making it pointless to save up for anything above 10-15k. If you added a better variety of knives into the game this would be a 5 star.
Its a good game. It can be frustrating though at times when the knife lands perfect but it doesnt count it. And at times the flip and fall are not accurate. But overall i really good game
You can thank Rusty Cage on YouTube. Also it shuts off ever few minutes and I don't know why

comments: Great game! Don't hesitate to download! Install now! I thought it wont be as addictive as the last game I played but I was all wrong. The concept of the game is brillant and the idea of having a princess save her own makes the game much better. It's addictive and the graphics are sooo magnificent. I'm thankful for this gane because it relieved my stress by entertainment.

I was skeptic at first, but when I started playing it, I saw how entertaining it can be. The game is really simple, you don't have to be a brain genius and to top it off, it has the most adorable graphics, with a cute character description. Sometimes I found myself raging while playing because I couldn't get an objective right, but this game is an awesome experience.
I really want to like the game but the ads are really bad!  Game says in app purchases but I don't see where you can buy things in game. Such as the ability to buy something to remove ads.

nice gameplay..graphics is superb when I played it on oppo f1s device, the fireflies really glows,,very nice lighting effect.. but when I play it on asus tablet, the graphics is a bit simpler, the fireflies dont glow much,, i guess my asus tablet cant render high graphics. *I like the previous look of the dragon more than the updated

Once Upon A Tower is alright. I love the combination of colors and cartoon design. And the concept, a princess saving herself (although being endless), is above average.   However, this is where compliments end and criticisms begin. To start, there is no music. To fix it, add some music or short melodies (I'd recommend music which fit themes of medieval or adventurous). The next problem is the control. It's not bad, but I think a directional pad option will allow for better precision (Ex. To whack something while in air).   I also think the concept is reaching below its unlimited potential due to the size of the tower. Because it's so thin, the space for movement is moving one or two spaces before going down. Although it creates good time-based platform action, it doesn't give good exploration action. These result in a somewhat repetitive wait, and wishing the dangers below was visible.   If the tower had various rooms and enemies, I would think more of the game. But as it stands, the two objective compliments I can give are the aesthetics and the (better than normal) idea. All this being said, I think Once Upon A Tower is 3/5 stars.
Good game, when you bored you can play this game. Only problem is; if you succesfully complete stage 1 loading screen come all time. Actually this is not a problem but loading screens are boring.

description: The One Stop Phonics Game Shop - Secret Game Version!22 Phonics games covering 8 English Phonics Subjects and Topics3 Alphabet / ABC Games‚Äì Helps students learn the difference between upper and lower case letters with a matching and hidden words game. Then play the sound matching / Phonic game to help them learn the sounds, not just the names, of the letters3 CVC / Three letter word Games ‚Äì Moving from ABC to blending sounds to make simple Consonant ‚Äì Vowel ‚Äì Consonant words. Here you can find a picture / Vocab matching phonics game, a sound quiz to recognize the sounds that make up these simple words and a hidden words phonics game to again help with expanding vocabulary. Consonant Blends ‚Äì Learning how to blend consonants in words like sleep and brown is a challenge for ESL and English students. The three games here will help them master this. A Vocabulary matching game, a sounds and phonics game and hidden words game.Wh/Ch/Sh/Th (digraphs) Phonics games - three separate sounds and three games to help learn them. Matching words,  hidden words and phonics sounds games Vowels Word and phonics game - The vowels are the trickiest wounds in English, different spellings for the same phonic sound. There is a matching game, a hidden words game and a sounds game to match the phonics. Rather than do one for each vowel i have mixed them here so would need some introduction first. Magic E - 3 Matching, phonic sounds and hidden words games to help with this tricky English phonics rule. This is the last of the three game subjects and helps students get used to magic and silent E. Syllables - Two syllable games allowing students to move from single syllable words and learn how to blend longer words and get used to looking for syllables rather than whole words. We have inculded a quiz with syllable sounds and a syllable game for students.Lucky Dip - here we have a sentence game of scrambled sentences and a lucky dip quiz that has past tense, adjectives, verbs, nouns and lots lots more.Over 22 Phonic Games all for free in this app including Sound matching, hidden words, scrambled syllables and words, quizzes and picture and word matching.Hidden behind the pictures is a little bonus game for students, parents and teachers to take a break from! The blue bird is the clue! As Education moves on Students and schools are looking for moe interactivity in lessons and these phonics games help to acheive that. Although simple they are targetted for specific lessons, and can be played for a shirt time. They are aimed to enable teachers to just give the game and let students play the phonic game they need, rather than have to teach the students how to use the app. There is also an ad free version of these phonics games with a little additional content in the quizzes and sound games, just in case school prefer to have phonics games with no ads. It will also be availible on the websitewww.makingenglishfun.com if you would like to play in classrooms or on PC. I am a teacher of English and use phonic games when needed in my lessons, i wanted simple ones to save time and when i couldnt fine them i decided to try to make my own, i hope these are useful for your teaching of phonics as well. Please get in touch with suggestions, corrections or ideas!
descriptionHTML:
The One Stop Phonics Game Shop - Secret Game Version!

22 Phonics games covering 8 English Phonics Subjects and Topics

3 Alphabet / ABC Games– Helps students learn the difference between upper and lower case letters with a matching and hidden words game. Then play the sound matching / Phonic game to help them learn the sounds, not just the names, of the letters

3 CVC / Three letter word Games – Moving from ABC to blending sounds to make simple Consonant – Vowel – Consonant words. Here you can find a picture / Vocab matching phonics game, a sound quiz to recognize the sounds that make up these simple words and a hidden words phonics game to again help with expanding vocabulary.

Consonant Blends – Learning how to blend consonants in words like sleep and brown is a challenge for ESL and English students. The three games here will help them master this. A Vocabulary matching game, a sounds and phonics game and hidden words game.

Wh/Ch/Sh/Th (digraphs) Phonics games - three separate sounds and three games to help learn them. Matching words, hidden words and phonics sounds games

Vowels Word and phonics game - The vowels are the trickiest wounds in English, different spellings for the same phonic sound. There is a matching game, a hidden words game and a sounds game to match the phonics. Rather than do one for each vowel i have mixed them here so would need some introduction first.

Magic E - 3 Matching, phonic sounds and hidden words games to help with this tricky English phonics rule. This is the last of the three game subjects and helps students get used to magic and silent E.

Syllables - Two syllable games allowing students to move from single syllable words and learn how to blend longer words and get used to looking for syllables rather than whole words. We have inculded a quiz with syllable sounds and a syllable game for students.

Lucky Dip - here we have a sentence game of scrambled sentences and a lucky dip quiz that has past tense, adjectives, verbs, nouns and lots lots more.

Over 22 Phonic Games all for free in this app including Sound matching, hidden words, scrambled syllables and words, quizzes and picture and word matching.

Hidden behind the pictures is a little bonus game for students, parents and teachers to take a break from! The blue bird is the clue!

As Education moves on Students and schools are looking for moe interactivity in lessons and these phonics games help to acheive that. Although simple they are targetted for specific lessons, and can be played for a shirt time. They are aimed to enable teachers to just give the game and let students play the phonic game they need, rather than have to teach the students how to use the app.

There is also an ad free version of these phonics games with a little additional content in the quizzes and sound games, just in case school prefer to have phonics games with no ads.

It will also be availible on the website

www.makingenglishfun.com if you would like to play in classrooms or on PC.

I am a teacher of English and use phonic games when needed in my lessons, i wanted simple ones to save time and when i couldnt fine them i decided to try to make my own, i hope these are useful for your teaching of phonics as well.

Please get in touch with suggestions, corrections or ideas!

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Desert Craft Exploration, an exciting new game where you can build break and explore!

Desert Craft Exploration is loaded with fun. You are given unlimited blocks to build whatever you can imagine in a desert map!

Features :

- Unlimited building and breaking
- Unlimited blocks in your inventory!
- Unlockable blocks!
- Exploration of an infinite desert map!
- Beautiful desert terrain with cactuses!
- Awesome desert craft graphics!

Stop waiting! Play Desert Craft Exploration today!
summary: Desert Craft Exploration is an exciting new building and breaking game!
title: Desert Craft Exploration

descriptionHTML:
Tap the ball carefully and follow the color pattern on each obstacle to cross it!

The goal of the game is to tap a ball through various obstacles with colored patterns, making sure that your ball matches the color you go through.


Be careful not to pass through the wrong color, or you’ll have to start again.
summary: You must follow the color pattern on each obstacle to cross it!
title: Color Switch

This is pretty sweet.  Its a great way to make stylized graphics  A lot of reviewers were complaining that it has a ton of ads tho, but you can get rid of them for 99 cents.  If you like this, dont whine just pay the piper or play something else.  Develepers have to eat, ya know???  If you want a free alternative, (or if you are curious about how this stuff works) i suggest looking into the open processing language.  You can learn to make your own cool stuff like this by finding a couple of algorithms online   Also, if you have a good graphics card in your pc/mac and you are interested in this stuff  check out touch designer.  You can make some really amazing realtime art  But seriously, support these developers if you like the program.  Its that simple.  99 cents is not much money!!  Ok luvya byebye

description: Bomber Adventure game has 5 lands and 250 to explore.To pass each level you must strategically place bomb to kill all enemies and destroy obstacles to find out the key.The way to control is nearly same with classic bomber game.You should collect more gold you can, so can use it to buy some power up items to improve your strength.You will die when colliding enemy, or time is over, or in range of bomb explossion.A little with other game bomber, bomb still explode when you get bomb explossion control, but you can blast bomb before predefinded time by press it.you will become super hero, super bomber if you explore all levels.Some enemies have special skill, they can chase you if you stand near them, specially the bosses can release bomb to destroy you.If which level is so difficult, you can play previous one to get more golds, and come back current level, buy more useful items to go through it.
descriptionHTML:
Bomber Adventure game has 5 lands and 250 to explore.
To pass each level you must strategically place bomb to kill all enemies and destroy obstacles to find out the key.
The way to control is nearly same with classic bomber game.
You should collect more gold you can, so can use it to buy some power up items to improve your strength.
You will die when colliding enemy, or time is over, or in range of bomb explossion.
A little with other game bomber, bomb still explode when you get bomb explossion control, but you can blast bomb before predefinded time by press it.
you will become super hero, super bomber if you explore all levels.
Some enemies have special skill, they can chase you if you stand near them, specially the bosses can release bomb to destroy you.
If which level is so difficult, you can play previous one to get more golds, and come back current level, buy more useful items to go through it.
summary: Become super hero with Bomber Adventure
title: Bomber Adventure

descriptionHTML:
If there’s one thing pretty much everyone can agree on, it’s pie!

Open up your own pie shop and you can be sure there’ll be crowds of customers craving for a piece of your heart-warming, mouth-watering delicacies straight out of the oven!

Cook delicious fillings and bake juicy pie recipes as fast as you can to serve all your diverse clientele: satisfied pie lovers attract more pie lovers!

HIGHLIGHTS

🥧MANAGE your own Pie Shop and cook and bake through 100 thrilling and delicious levels!

🥧UPGRADE your kitchen with chef-worthy appliances to prepare your pie recipes more efficiently and serve more and more clients!

🥧WIN awesome daily rewards by spinning the roulette and get more coins and gems to keep spicing up your pie business!

🥧TRANSFORM your pie shop into a famous bakery and prove both your cooking and management skills!

Offer your customers a menu filled with diverse pie flavours, from grandma-traditional recipes to exotic haute-cuisine delights!

Manage your pie business efficiently and soon you’ll be making crusty treats and cream-filled desserts for hundreds of clients. Make your shop known as a cozy place to enjoy both comfort food and exotic recipes from all over the world!

Open your shop, get into the kitchen and rock the restaurant scene one pie at a time!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
